review: Jeg har i dag fors√∏gt at tr√¶ne i PureGym Vejlevej, Fredericia. Mit kort er blevet sp√¶ret grundet en situation som skete for 3 dage siden. Jeg kunne forst√• p√• manageren som var p√• arbejde i dag (26/10/23 kl. 13.30) at hovedkontoret har besluttet at bandlyse mig i 2 √•r for trusler hvilket er l√∏gn. Manageren sagde desuden at der ikke er lyd p√• overv√•gningen men at jeg har truet en af medlemmerne Den rigtige version er at, jeg blev skubbet og truet af et medlem som tydeligt er p√• steroider i PureGym. Han var igang med at bruge 2 maskiner (T√•rne med kabler) og jeg tog selvf√∏lgelig den han ikke var igang med, men da jeg konfronterede ham med reglerne gik  han amok over han ikke m√•tte bruge begge maskiner p√• samme tid. Han skubbede mig v√¶k og truet mig voldsomt. Politiet kom og afh√∏rte os begge. Politiet lukkede sagen (for 3 dage siden 23/10/23 og ville ikke se p√• overv√•gningen og vurderet at der ikke var tale om trusler eller lign. Men if√∏lge denne manager har hovedkontoret taget en helt anden beslutning.Derfor har jeg talt med politiet i dag og lavet en anmeldelse p√• det medlem som skubbet mig og truet mig som tydeligt kan ses p√• overv√•gningen. Manageren siger hun har set videoen og synes ikke jeg bliver skubbet til, men vi vil alligevel gerne have adgang til det video materiale. Derfor har jeg talt med min advokat og vi har valgt at k√∏re en sag p√• dette grundet PureGym's beslutning. Manageren sagde hovedkontoret har bandlyst mig for trusler og fordi jeg har taget billede af det medlem som har angrebet mig fysisk og truet mig.P√• det grundlag er vi i gang med at k√∏re en sag og vil gerne anmode om, at hovedkontoret kontakter mig da jeres kontaktservice er den rene jungle.
translated_review: I have been trying today to train in PureGym Vejlevej, Fredericia. My card has been jammed due to a situation that happened 3 days ago. I could understand on the manager who was working today (26/10/23 at 13.30) that the head office has decided to ban me for 2 years for threats which is a lie. Furthermore, the manager said that there is no sound on the surveillance but that I have threatened one of the members The right version is that I was pushed and threatened by a member who is clearly on steroids in PureGym. He was igWhen I confronted him with the rules he went crazy over not having to use both machines at the same time. He pushed me away and threatened me violently. The police came and interrogated us both. The police closed the case (three days ago 23/10/23 and didn't want to look at the surveillance and estimated that there were no threats or the like. But according to this manager, the head office has made a completely different decision.I spoke to the police today and made a review on the member who pushed me and threatened me which clearly can be seen on the surveillance. The manager says she has seen the video and doesn't think I'm being pushed to, but we still want to have access to the video material. Therefore, I've talked to my lawyer and we've chosen to run a case on this because of PureGym's decision. The manager said the head office has banned me for threats and because I've taken a picture of the member who has attacked me physically andOn that basis, we are running a case and would like to request that the head office contact me as your contact service is the pure jungle.

There are two women in the bike room who have really loud music, I go in and nicely ask if they won't turn down, where one of them breaks out that it's only for an hour and that they should be allowed to be here, I explain that the same thing applies to me and she just keeps repeating herself, so I'll just go out again. Later I get an email with a warning because of my inappropriate advocacy and then find out that it's aOne of the two women was an instructor. I am not given the opportunity to defend myself and tell my side and try to send a complaint to member service, but are also rejected and get a short answer that they maintain the warning. It is pure principle for me and it is so unfair that I have been a member for 10 years + and always behaved properly. To be treated like this after all the time that faithful member is completely too bad.Update: I have sent an email but have not received an answer yet.

title: S√• stiger prisen igen igen
review: Jeg fik for nogle dage siden en mail om at mit medlemsskab stiger i pris endnu engang. Det er ca. 1 √•r siden det skete sidst (og for under et √•r siden steg mit All-In ogs√•). Der st√•r nogle fine floskler om, at det skyldes, at mit medlemsskab har en lavere pris end et tilsvarende i dag. Det er helt korrekt, men jeg kan ikke rigtig se problemet? Man kunne lige s√• godt skrive: 'Vi har desv√¶rre ingen intentioner om at bel√∏nne loyale kunder med h√∏j ancennitet, da vi √∏nsker at maksimere vores profit". Hvis man f√∏lte, at man fik noget for de ekstra penge, var det m√•ske en anden snak, men jeg har ikke oplevet nogen forbedringer siden I blev til PureGym (ny maling med kikset farvesammens√¶tning samt cringe 'motivationscitater' g√∏r ingen forskel for min daglige tr√¶ning).Personligt er jeg nok ved at n√• mit m√¶tningspunkt for hvad jeg gider betale for at tr√¶ne i et (ofte) propfyldt center.24-10-2023: Jeres svar nedenfor kan jeg desv√¶rre ikke rigtigt bruge til noget. Det er jo bare et standardsvar, der ikke rigtigt adresserer problematikken. Jeg kan stadig  ikke se problemet i at kunder med h√∏j ancennitet betaler mindre end nye? Selv hvis man udelukkende k√∏rte sit regnskab/medlemsdatabase i Excel, burde dette v√¶re til at h√•ndtere.Det er fint, at man i jeres app kan se hvorn√•r der er mindst belastning, og det er sikkert nyttigt for mange. Det er det desv√¶rre ikke for mig, da jeg har nogle bestemte tidsrum i l√∏bet af ugen, hvor det passer med min tr√¶ning.Jeg vil begynde at se mig om efter alternativer.
translated_review: I received an email a few days ago saying that my membership is rising in price once again. It is about 1 year ago it happened last (and less than a year ago my All-In also rose). There are some fine punks saying that it is because my membership has a lower price than a similar one today. That's quite correct, but I don't really see the problem? You might as well write: 'We unfortunately have no intention of rewarding loyal customers with high ancestence, since we want to maximize our profit'.I've never seen any improvements since you became PureGym (new paint with a lazy color scheme and cringe'motivation quotes' make no difference to my daily workout).Personally I'm probably reaching my saturation point for what I'd like to pay to train in a (often) packed center.24-10-2023: Your answer below I can't really use anything. It's just a standard answer that doesn't really address.I still don't see the problem in customers with high anthinality paying less than new ones? Even if you ran your accounting/member database in Excel only, this should be manageable.It's fine that you can see in your app when there is the least load, and it's probably useful for many. Unfortunately, it's not for me, as I have some specific time during the week when it fits with my training.I'll start looking for alternatives.

review: Jeg m√• desv√¶rre konstatere, at PureGym har nogle betydelige ulemper, som g√∏r det sv√¶rt at anbefale. For det f√∏rste er det problematisk, at man skal betale hele 70 kr, hvis man glemmer sit kort. Det virker som en form for skjult gebyr eller hemmeligt abonnement, hvilket desv√¶rre er en praksis, der er alt for udbredt blandt PureGym.Desuden f√∏les det som om, man bliver bundet til at v√¶re en ekstra pengemaskine. Priserne er simpelthen alt for h√∏je i forhold til alternativer som Fitness X, hvor man kan tr√¶ne for blot 150 kr. Det er √¶rgerligt, at man skal betale en formue for at have adgang til ordentlig tr√¶ning.Men ulemperne stopper ikke her. I mit lokale fitnesscenter er der desv√¶rre alt for varmt. Det g√∏r det utroligt ubehageligt at tr√¶ne, og det er sv√¶rt at holde ud i l√¶ngere tid. Derudover bliver der spillet musik alt for h√∏jt, s√• det f√∏les n√¶rmest som om, de pr√∏ver at omdanne stedet til et diskotek i stedet for et seri√∏st tr√¶ningscenter.Alt i alt er jeg desv√¶rre ikke tilfreds med min oplevelse hos PureGym, og jeg ser mig n√∏dsaget til at melde mig ud.
translated_review: Unfortunately, I have to say that PureGym has some significant drawbacks which make it difficult to recommend. Firstly, it is problematic that you have to pay as much as 70 kroner if you forget your card. It seems like a kind of hidden fee or secret subscription, which unfortunately is a practice that is too widespread among PureGym.In addition, it feels as if you are being tied to being an extra money machine. Prices are simply too high in relation to alternatives like Fitness X where you can train forIt's too bad that you have to pay a fortune to have access to proper training.But the downsides don't stop here. Unfortunately, my local gym is too hot. It makes it extremely uncomfortable to train and it's hard to last for a long time. In addition, music is playing too loud, so it feels like they're trying to turn the place into a disco instead of a serious gym.All in all, I'm not satisfied with my experience at PureGym, andI'm gonna have to resign.

review: Jeg har l√¶nge tr√¶net i puregym i Br√∏ndby Strand. Der har de et rum kun til kvinder hvor de kan tr√¶ne. Tidligere "chef" var superflink og im√∏dekommende overfor os som kunder og efterkom mange af vores √∏nsker vedr. Maskiner osv.Nu er der derimod kommet en ny leder, og han minder mest af alt en tidligere medarbejder der nu har f√•et en vigtigere rolle og nyder den magt han besidder. Servicen er v√¶k, vores √∏nsker kan slet slet ikke komme p√• tale og bliver udelukket lynhurtigt uden at der bliver lyttet til det. Sedlen hvor der st√•r hvilke tider mandlige medarbejder kommer og g√∏r rent er hevet ned og nu h√¶nger der en ny seddel hvor der st√•r de pludselig kan troppe ind. Vi f√•r straks at vide hvad vi IKKE M√Ö, uden at det overhovedet var samtale emnet. Man g√∏r normalt alt for at blive bedre, det er desv√¶rre ikke tilf√¶ldet her og jeg h√•ber inderligt at vi fortsat kan have et center med mulighed for at tr√¶ne i et rum, kun for kvinder, under ledere der √∏nsker vores tilstedev√¶relse b√•de som folk der tr√¶ner og som kunder.. Det er ikke sv√¶rt at banke p√• et par minutter f√∏r man tr√¶der ind i et rum der kun er egnet for kvinder, man tropper ikke bare op uden en advarsel n√•r rummet bevidst kun er beregnet til kvinder.
translated_review: I have long trained in puregym in Br√∏ndby Strand. There they only have a room for women where they can train. Former "chief" was super nice and welcoming to us as customers and complied with many of our wishes about machines etc.Now, however, a new leader has arrived, and he most of all recalls a former employee who has now gained a more important role and enjoys the power he possesses. The service is gone, our wishes cannot be discussed at all and is excluded quickly without listening to it. SThe time when the male employee comes and cleans is down and now there is a new note that says they can suddenly step in. We are told immediately what we DO NOT have to, without it being the conversation topic at all. You usually do everything to get better, that is not the case here and I sincerely hope that we can continue to have a center with the opportunity to train in a room, only for women, under leaders who want our presence both as people who train and as customers..It is not difficult to knock in a few minutes before entering a room that is only suitable for women, you don't just troops up without a warning when space is deliberately intended only for women.

review: Tr√¶ning i butikken her er h√•rdt! Ikke s√• meget p√• det fysiske plan, men mere p√• det mentale. 5 uger er g√•et siden sidste anmeldelse og ja, intet er h√¶ndt. translated_review: Training in the shop here is hard! Not so much on the physical level, but more on the mental level. 5 weeks have gone since the last review and yes, nothing has happened. The center has 3 types of elliptical cross trainers, of which the 2 are kaput. Repair is not possible, so they need to be changed, well so. But 4 machines are in arrival, the message says. Also, 2 fully functional machines must be removed, which the more serious users use. The center must henceforth consist of 7 identical and uninspiring machines, from a time when Fresh Fitness had kr"We can't do anything" and the poor girl is another victim, for a degressive and paternalistic way of management. But why then all these user surveys really? A lifted eyebrow in answering these, immediately triggers a cascade communication of this and that. We want, we have, we do. But none of it holds. Hvis man ikke invisterer i enten flere vifter, √•bner vinduer/d√∏re ogs√• om aftenen, eller reparerer ventilationen, ret hurtigt, s√• ser jeg ikke anden mulighed end at opsige mit abonnement, og finde et andet sted at tr√¶ne.
translated_review: I usually work out at the Craftsman's Town in Greve, where they have a fine gym with well maintained equipment and clean and neat rooms.Indoor climate, however, is incredibly bad! Because of fear of theft or people lurking in to train in the evening (I assume), they close all the windows and doors at 18-19 when the last staff goes home, where they have dismantled door handles and handles on windows. As the ventilation system is of older vintage and rarely works, the rooms are filled with co2, which makesit was almost impossible to use the fitness machines because you can't breathe. Today it was so serious that I was forced to interrupt my training because I couldn't breathe, and was nearly ready to walk out of the building to recover. If you don't teach in either more fans, windows/doors also open at night, or repair the ventilation, quite quickly, then I see no option but to cancel my subscription, and find another place to train.

review: Jeg har i dag 5/9 benyttet mig af jeres fitness center p√• Visionsvej ved Eternitten.Da jeg ankommer g√•r jeg som s√¶dvanlig direkte ind til en maskine if√∏rt mit tr√¶ningst√∏j og s√¶tter min pose ved siden af. Hun har tilsyneladende jagtet mig fra jeg kom ind (hun stod ikke i indgangen).Hun fort√¶ller mig, at jeg IKKE m√• medbringe denne pose i centret og den skal ned i et skab i omkl√¶dningsrummet.Jeg forklarer, at jeg har tr√¶net mange √•r i Fitness World p√• samme lokation, hvor det aldrig har v√¶ret et problem. Hun svarer, at de tidligere m√• have overset det, da det st√•r i jeres betingelser.Jeg har selvf√∏lgelig forst√•else for hvis det var en stor taske som var i vejen med t√∏j eller lignende, men vi snakker en lille F√∏tex pose som fylder mindre end hvis jeg skulle placere indholdet hver for sig p√• gulvet.Jeg har i √∏vrigt sendt denne klage til Pure Fitness. Denne mail modtog jeg ikke et svar p√•.OPDATERING 13.09.2023: jeg har f√•et et svar nedenfor fra PureGym som understreger vanviddet. Jeg medbragte som n√¶vnt en shaker, vand og strap til armen. Alts√• INGEN personlige ejendele. ‚ÄúSikkerhedsm√¶ssige √•rsager‚Äù kan de pakke sammen. Desuden har de fortsat ikke svaret p√• min mail. Jeg kan kun anbefale folk at frav√¶lge det firma.
translated_review: Today 5/9 I have taken advantage of your fitness centre at Visionsvej at Eternitten.When I arrive, I go straight to a machine wearing my workout clothes and put my bag next to it. The bag contains water, protein shake and arm strap. As I turn around, a dark-haired female employee is standing in my neck. Apparently she has chased me from when I came in (she was not in the entrance).She tells me that I must NOT bring this bag in the centre and it must be in a closet in the dresser.I explain that I have trained many years in the Fitness World at the same location where it has never been a problem. She answers that they must have missed it in the past as it is in your terms.I understand if it was a big bag that was in the way of clothes or the like, but we are talking a small F√∏tex bag that takes up less space than if I had to place the content separately on the floor.I have also sent this complaint to Pure Fitness. I didn't receive an answer to this email to.Updating 13.09.2023: I have received an answer below from PureGym which emphasizes the madness. As mentioned, I brought a shaker, water and strap to my arm. So NO personal belongings. ‚Ä¢ Security reasons‚Ä¢ they can pack up. Moreover, they still have no answer to my email. I can only recommend people to deselect the company.

review: Jeg har nu tr√¶net i fw/PureGym i et goodt stykke tid. Gode faciliteter, godt udstyr og personalet er super venligt, dog er der ting der undre mig lidt.Som sagt har jeg tr√¶net her i over et √•r og har det f√∏rste √•r altid haft en gymbag/taske med ind til min tr√¶ning. Har en del forskellige ting med i tasken som jeg gennem min tr√¶ning skal bruge, fx headphones, tr√¶ningsb√¶lte, straps, wristwraps, opvarmningstr√∏je, Squat sko og drikkedunk. F√∏r indtil fornyeligt har de aldrig sagt noget til det, (andre centre jeg har tr√¶net i har heler ikke haft noget imod det). indtil for 1-2 m√•neder siden hvor jeg 2 gange som den eneste af flere personer med en taske fik at vide jeg ikke m√•tte have den inde i centeret, de forslog i stedet en mullepose hvilket jeg ikke helt forst√•r. For det f√∏rste g√∏r det tr√¶ningen merkant mere besv√¶rlig da man har sv√¶rt ved at have samling p√• sine ting, for det andet forst√•r jeg ikke hvad forskel det g√∏r om jeg har en tr√¶ningstaske eller en mullepose med, hvad er grundlaget for dette? For det tredje f√∏les det lidt som om der bliver forskelsbehandlet p√• medlemmerne. fx var jeg i dag i fitten hvor jeg havde min taske med, jeg fik som den eneste at vide jeg skulle g√• ud og ligge den i omkl√¶dningen, der var b√•de en pige og en √¶ldre h√¶re der ogs√• havde tasker med, men de fik intet at vide. Nu har jeg l√¶st op i reglerne og ja der st√•r "ingen tasker i centeret" men hvorfor ? hvad er problemet med en tr√¶ningstaske i et tr√¶ningscenter? Vil bare gerne have uddybet hvorfor min tr√¶ning lige pludselig skal irriteres af s√•dan en regel. Hvad er grunden? Og nej "det er p√• grund af brandfare" k√∏ber jeg alts√• ikke, en mullepose er vel liges√• brandfarlig. Nu ved jeg selvf√∏lgelig godt det ikke er dig der svare p√• beskeden eller personalet der laver reglerne, derfor undskyld for tonen. Fortsat god dag - Hilsen et lidt utilfreds medlem.
translated_review: I have been training in fw/PureGym for a good while now. Good facilities, good equipment and staff are very friendly, but there are things that amaze me a little.As I said, I have been training here for over a year and have the first year always had a gym bag/bag with me for my training. Have a lot of different things in the bag that I need through my training, e.g. headphones, training belt, straps, Wristwraps, heating shirt, Squat shoes and drinking bottle. Until recently they have never said anything to it (other centers I have been working with)has been training you haven't had anything against it). Until 1-2 months ago, when I was the only one with a bag to know I wasn't allowed to have it inside the mall, they suggested instead a mullet bag which I don't quite understand. First of all, it makes the training more difficult because you find it difficult to have a collection on your things, second of all I don't understand what difference it makes if I have a training bag or a mullet bag with, what is the basis for this?I feel a little discriminated against on the members. For example, today I was in the fitt where I brought my bag, I was given as the only one to know I should go out and put it in the dress, there was both a girl and an older army who also had bags with them, but they were told nothing. Now I have read up the rules and yes it says "no bags in the center" but why? what is the problem with a training bag in a gym? Just want to elaborate why my training should suddenly irritateI don't buy, a bag is as flammable. Now, of course, I don't know you're answering the message or the staff making the rules, so I'm sorry for the tone. Continued good day - Greetings a little disgruntled member.

translated_review: Has for the first time the answer to an email from Puregym and it sounds like this:Have long jumped over to give a review, but now I can't help it.Since the only thing that is connected to us "old" fitness gyms in the center is a community.The centre at Randersvej in Esbjerg needs a proper overhaul.It's dirty and many machines need service.When we address that, nothing happens.When a friend punched a hole in the head of a training bench (there is a lack of plastic fittings on some iron) and the diaperThere's no sign of anything happening either, and it's been a month since.Shipping rope is missing... said nothing happens... so now we've bought our own!People go in and train with the shoes they go out in... no charge.It's always new members who can get benefits and free things... maybe you should do a little sometimes to keep on the "old" members instead of letting them go.We're a little bunch of gyms who have been on Randersvej road since they opened, and, to put it mildly, the center has fallen in quality...draStiff.The only thing that keeps us there is our community... and we can thank ourselves for that. We could find ourselves somewhere else, but we'd like to see just a little thing happen so we can stay where we'd like to be the Love Gifts Fitnisses

For en k√¶mpe k√¶de som pure, m√• der v√¶re mange som bliver ber√∏rt af denne aggressive og forvirrende m√•de at f√∏re prisstrategi p√•. Jeg bliver i centeret fordi det ligger belejligt t√¶t p√•. translated_review: Misleading Price ChangesAs of March 3, 2022, I changed my subscription to the cheapest one, which was 149,- per month. review: Jeg troede at overgangen fra Fitness World ville bringe mere godt med sig. Men lidt klatmaling hist og pist var hvad det kunne blive til. Og et nyt tema med virkelig kiksede farver. Jeg tr√¶ner p√• Lygten i K√∏benhavn NV, og det er alts√• slidt. Flere af skiverne i lokalet ovenp√• mangler deres coating, fordi den er slidt af. Der mangler h√•ndv√¶gte rundt omkring. Grebene til fx kabelt√•rnene er slidt og beskidte. Der er n√¶rmest ingen spejle nogle steder mere, og de er for mange nyttige under tr√¶ning, for at se fx ens holdning under en √∏velse. Toiletterne er en historie for sig, og selvom jeg har klaget flere gange, er de fortsat mega beskidte, l√∏se h√•ndtag, konstant klamt og v√•dt gulv, v√¶ggene er m√∏gbeskidte. Jeg tror aldrig fugerne i gulvet er blevet ordnet. Jeg har selv v√¶ret ansat i Fitness World og stod for reng√∏ringen, s√• jeg er udem√¶rket klar over opgavens omfang. Men det her er bare klamt.Og generelt savner jeg bare, at man som medlem af Fitness World f√∏r i tiden kunne bev√¶ge sig frit i alle centrene. S√• hvis man var i Jylland kunne man tr√¶ne der, selvom man boede i N√¶stved normalt. Nu er der forskellige prisniveauer og det er sv√¶rt at gennemskue forskellen, da alle centrene for mig virker ens. Jeg synes de forskellige medlemskaber er for forvirrende.
translated_review: I thought that the transition from Fitness World would bring more good with it. But a little climb painting here and there was what it could become. And a new theme with really shaky colors. I work out on the light in Copenhagen NV, and it is so worn out. Several of the discs in the room upstairs are missing their coating because it is worn off. There are no dumbbells around. The blades for e.g. the cable towers are worn and dirty. There are almost no mirrors in some places more, and they are too many useful during training, to see e.g.The toilets are a story for themselves, and although I have complained several times, they are still very dirty, loose handles, constantly disgusting and wet floors, the walls are dirty. I don't think the joints in the floor have been fixed. I myself have been employed in the Fitness World and was responsible for cleaning, so I'm perfectly aware of the scale of the task. But this is just creepy.And generally, I just miss the fact that as a member of the Fitness World in the past, you could move freely in all the centers. So ifYou were in Jutland you could train there even though you lived in N√¶stved normally. Now there are different price levels and it is difficult to see through the difference, as all the centres for me seem similar. I think the different memberships are too confusing.

name: Laila

review: Vil aldrig nogensinde anbefale PureGym til nogle. Jeg m√∏der op fysisk i centeret d. 30/5-23, hvor jeg skulle blive tilmeldt. Jeg f√•r at vide, at jeg vil modtage et link per mail med en formular jeg skal udfylde indenfor 24 timer for at jeg er medlem. Jeg modtager aldrig den mail og jeg v√¶lger efterh√•nden at droppe at blive medlem hos PureGym. Pludselig, d. 17/8-23 modtager jeg post p√• e-boks om at jeg er r√∏get i inkasso, pga. manglende betalinger - som de if√∏lge dem selv har gjort mig opm√¶rksom om flere gange. √Öbenbart var jeg blevet medlem, selvom medarbejderen sagde jeg f√∏rst skulle udfylde formularen. Jeg kontakter kundeservice og siger der er sket en misforst√•else, da jeg ikke har modtaget noget som helst. Men jeg bliver gang p√• gang henvist til inkasso-selskabet uden at der bliver vist nogen som helst forst√•else for min situation. Jeg kontakter inkasso-selskabet og finder ud af, at medarbejderen tastede min mail forkert ind p√• trods af at jeg stavede det for hende. Inkassoselskabet fjerner inkasso-gebyret og jeg betaler, og derefter kontakter jeg PureGym igen (deres chatservice) hvor jeg vil annullere mit medlemskab samt √¶ndre min mail. Jeg f√•r at vide at mit medlemskab udl√∏ber den 31/8 og hun f√•et √¶ndret min mail. Jeg logger derefter ind p√• min side efter at jeg har nulstillet koden, og sjovt... jeg er inde p√• min mands konto, som tilf√¶ldigvis ogs√• har afmeldt sit medlemskab og har sidste dag den 31/8. Lige nu sidder jeg med deres chat-kundeservice igen og har bedt dem om at dobbelttjekke om, mit medlemskab stadig er i gang - medarbejderen har v√¶ret i gang med at unders√∏ge det de sidste 15 minutter....... ??. Jeg har nu betalt de ca. 800kr ind til dem, som jeg "skylder" for at f√• det overst√•etJeg er frustreret og ked over den manglende forst√•else for min situation. Jeg fik ikke engang et "Vi beklager at medarbejderen fortalte noget forkert/skrev din mail forkert" eller noget som helst
translated_review: Will never ever recommend PureGym to anyone. I will physically show up at the center on 30/5-23 where I should be registered. I am told that I will receive a link by email with a form I must fill in within 24 hours to be a member. I never receive that email and I choose to gradually drop joining PureGym. Suddenly, on 17/7-23, I receive mail on the e-box that I have gone into debt collection because of lack of payments - which according to them they have made me aware of more ganApparently I had become a member, although the employee said I had to fill out the form first. I contact customer service and say there has been a misunderstanding as I have received nothing. However, I am repeatedly referred to the debt collection company without any understanding of my situation. I contact the debt collection company and find that the employee entered my mail incorrectly despite my spelling for her. The debt collection company removes collection feesand I pay, and then I contact PureGym again (their chat service) where I will cancel my membership as well as change my mail. I am told that my membership expires on 31/8 and she has changed my mail. I then log in to my page after I reset the code, and fun... I'm in my husband's account, which happens to have canceled my membership and have last day on 31/8. Right now I'm sitting with their chat customer service again and have asked them to double check for my membership.Ab is still in the process - the employee has been investigating it for the last 15 minutes.......?.. I have now paid the approximately 800kr in to them that I am "apologizing" for getting it over I am frustrated and sorry for the lack of understanding of my situation. I didn't even get a "We regret that the employee told something wrong/wrote your mail" or anything

review: Jeg blev konfronteret af en medarbejder i Kennedy Arkaden (Puregym). Hvor jeg blev fortalt at jeg ikke m√•tte have en taske med til mit udstyr (Alts√• v√¶gtl√∏ftningsb√¶lte, straps etc). But I had to use a small net? It's a bad rule because in practice it doesn't change whether I have my equipment in a net or a bag (the net should be nicely large with the equipment). (And I've been working out there for almost 3 years without anyone having said anything to it). Anyway's employees insisted that he just followed.The rules, despite the fact that I have never experienced it with other employees who have always been nice.

name: Elin
title: d√•rlig service
review: Gl vardevej, Esbjerg har altid v√¶ret et godt og stemningsfyldt center.- Et center man ligefrem gl√¶dede sig til, at tr√¶ne i- fordi der altid har v√¶ret i m√∏dekommenhed fra alt og alle - De sidste m√•neder er det g√•et j√¶vnt og st√∏t ned ad bakke.- Bla. reng√∏ring, rekvisitter, samt generel almen service fra personalet.Ikke et smil ikke et hej eller lignende fra personalet, snarere tv√¶rtimod.Dette p√• trods af returnerede evalueringsskemaer.Jeg er s√• ked af, at efter 10 √•rs tr√¶ning i centeret, fornemmer jeg det falder fra hinanden. I g√•r blev vi bedt om, at benytte et andet center hvis vi fortsat ville tr√¶ne p√• vores gamle hold, da de ikke l√¶ngere prioriterede vores seniorhold (formiddagshold) Vi fik et ultimatum p√• en dag, at holdet var flyttet til den anden ende af byen  Uden hensyntagende til mange af os er seniorer som bidrager godt i kassen og som er en stabil indt√¶gt til centret Hvor er jeg bare ked af det.
translated_review: Gl vardevej, Esbjerg has always been a good and atmospheric center.- A center you were actually looking forward to training in- because there has always been a greeting from everything and everyone - In recent months things have gone downhill and steadily.- Bla. cleaning, props, as well as general service from the staff.Not a smile not a hello or the like from the staff, rather on the contrary.This despite returned evaluation forms.I am so sorry that after 10 years of training at the center, I sense it falYesterday we were asked to use another center if we would continue to train on our old team, as they no longer prioritized our senior team (history team) We got an ultimatum in one day that the team had moved to the other end of the city Without consideration many of us are seniors who contribute well into the box and which is a stable income to the center.

review: Jeg synes at det er super √¶rgerligt at man som enlig mor ikke kan tage sine b√∏rn med i pure gym Karlslunde. Vi fik s√• at vide at der ikkem√•tte v√¶re b√∏rn og m√•tte g√•. Jeg er ked af, at det ikke er muligt at have rolige og stille b√∏rn med (det er trods alt for√¶ldrene som skal holde styr p√• dem, s√• de ikke generer nogle), for det g√∏r det utrolig sv√¶rt at kunne f√•r det hele til at h√¶nge sammen  Det kunne de godt tage til overvejelse!!
translated_review: I think it's really a shame that, as a single mother, you can't take your children into pure gym Karlslunden. I try to adjust trainings as far as possible when the children are cared for, but yesterday one was in the pure gym centre, and sat just as quietly next to me without disturbing anyone. We were told that there shouldn't be children and had to leave. I'm sorry that it's not possible to have quiet and quiet children with (after all, the parents are supposed to keep track of them so they don't bother some people) because theyT makes it incredibly difficult to get it all together They could think about it!!

name: Peter Bach
title: Tak til hele holdet bag PureGym
review: Jeg har haft den mest vidunderlige oplevelse hos PureGym i Broen, Esbjerg. Fra den venlige og im√∏dekommende modtagelse ved indgangen til de moderne og veludstyrede tr√¶ningsfaciliteter, har jeg intet andet end ros til overs for dette sted. Personale her er virkelig dedikeret til at hj√¶lpe medlemmerne med deres tr√¶ningsm√•l. De er altid til r√•dighed for at besvare sp√∏rgsm√•l, give vejledning om √∏velser og tilbyde motiverende st√∏tte. Det er tydeligt, at de virkelig bryder sig om medlemmernes trivsel. Tr√¶ningsudstyret er topmoderne og godt vedligeholdt. Der er et bredt udvalg af maskiner og frie v√¶gte, der passer til alle niveauer af fitness. Renlighed og hygiejne er ogs√• en prioritet her, og det er noget, jeg virkelig s√¶tter pris p√•. At tr√¶ne p√• PureGym i Broen, Esbjerg, har v√¶ret en positiv og motiverende oplevelse for mig. Jeg f√∏ler mig virkelig inspireret til at n√• mine tr√¶ningsm√•l her. Hvis du s√∏ger et fremragende tr√¶ningscenter med en venlig atmosf√¶re og moderne faciliteter, s√• kan jeg varmt anbefale PureGym! Tak til hele holdet bag PureGym for at skabe s√•dan et fantastisk sted for os medlemmer. Jeg ser frem til mange flere fantastiske tr√¶ningssessioner her! Bedste hilsner,Peter Bach
translated_review: I have had the most wonderful experience at PureGym in the Bridge, Esbjerg. From the friendly and welcoming reception at the entrance to the modern and well-equipped training facilities, I have nothing but praise for this place. Staff here are really dedicated to helping members with their training goals. They are always available to answer questions, provide guidance on exercises and offer motivational support. It is clear that they really like the well-being of members.The bull is state-of-the-art and well maintained. There is a wide range of machines and free weights to suit all levels of fitness. Cleanliness and hygiene are also a priority here, and this is something I really appreciate. Training at PureGym in the Bridge, Esbjerg, has been a positive and motivating experience for me. I feel really inspired to achieve my training goals here. If you are looking for an excellent gym with a friendly atmosphere and modern facilities, then I can highly recommend PureGym!Thanks to the entire team behind PureGym for creating such a great place for us members. I look forward to many more amazing training sessions here! Best regards,Peter Bach

Igen kom der ingenting. Dette pr√∏vede jeg i et par dage f√∏r jeg gav op. Herefter havde jeg ikke forventet at jeg kunne komme ind og tr√¶ne s√• jeg blev v√¶k. Jeg fik heller ikke en f√∏rste rykker hvilket jeg syntes er totalt uprofessionelt. De vil s√• have mig til at betale for Juni selvom at jeg ikke har v√¶ret inde og tr√¶ne pg.a at de ikke sendte mig muligheden for at betale.Det eneste gode jeg kan sige er at da jeg skrev med en p√• deres hjemmeside tog de rykkerne fra p√• min regning.
translated_review: Today I woke up to see an email about another mover from Puregym off. In May I enlisted in Puregym where I was told by one of their employees that I would get an email where I could give my card information that I could then put in.There was never an email so I could give my card information by the result I go to their side and try to get an email again so I can register them. Again, nothing came. I tried this for a few days before I gave up.I didn't expect me to come in and train so I got away. I didn't get a first mover either, which I think is totally unprofessional. They want me to pay for June even though I haven't been in and training because they didn't send me the opportunity to pay.The only good thing I can say is that when I wrote with someone on their website they took the reminders off on my bill.

name: Posten

review: Ingen hj√¶lp at hente fra PureGym da jeg glemte at taste min bils reg nr ind p√• standeren en enkelt gang. Det kostede mig 875 kr at holde p√• en halv√∏de p-plads i en 30 min. Det foreg√•r elektronisk i dag s√• undskyldningen med at det er noget administrativt holder ikke.Det er ikke rimeligt at firmaer som PureGym kan alliere sig med p-selskaber, som s√• ligger p√• lur og kan udskrive gebyrer p√• 875 kr for 30 min p√• en √∏de plads. Men det har man vurderet ikke er umagen v√¶rd.2023-07-12:Hej Igen PureGym.Jeg ved fra lignende tilf√¶lde at i som forretningsdrivende kan ud√∏ve indflydelse p√• P-selskabet og i kan bevise at jeg var der i 30 min. og at jeg havde lov at holde der i 2 timer. Men det ville i ikke bruge ressourcer p√•... Jeg har som enkeltperson ingen chancer, da jeg jo selvforskyldt, havde glemt at registrere mig.I kunne ogs√• sagtens koble medlemmers bilers reg. nummer op p√• medlemskabet s√• man automatisk har to timer at holde i n√•r man skanner medlemskortet ved indgangen. Men det har i ogs√• valgt ikke at bruge ressourcer p√•...N√•r man skal registrere bilen separat p√• en iPad efter man er kommet ind, og ikke f√•r en p√•mindelse om det, vil der altid v√¶re nogen der glemmer det en enkelt gang. Det er ikke rimeligt at det skal koste 875 kr og lidt som at blive pisset p√•, n√•r I kun har et skuldertr√¶k til overs for det. I kunne i det mindste g√∏re fors√∏get for at hj√¶lpe et medlem.
translated_review: No help to pick up from PureGym when I forgot to enter my car's reg number into the booth once. It cost me 875 kr to keep on a half-dead parking space for a 30 min. "Not our problem" was the answer when I asked for help. So I quit membership June 6, just to find out that PureGym keeps charging membership fee to.o.m July! No other reason than "because we can" there is a lack of legislation in the area regarding the right to charge membership fees long after you have volunteered.it's not reasonable for companies like PureGym to be able to ally themselves with parking companies, which then lie on nap and can print fees of 875 DKK for 30 minutes in a deserted space. PureGym could easily make an appointment with the parking company so that the free parking you get is automatically activated when scanning your access card.But it's not worth it.2023-07-12:Hello Again PureGym.I know from similar cases that in as a starterYou can influence the P-company and you can prove that I was there for 30 minutes and that I was allowed to keep there for 2 hours. But you wouldn't spend resources on... I have no chances as an individual, since I had forgot to register myself for self-inflicted.You could also easily connect members' cars' reg. number up to membership so you automatically have two hours to hold in when you scan the membership card at the entrance. But you have also chosen not to spend resources on...When you have to registerRere the car separately on an iPad after you get in and don't get a reminder about it, there will always be someone who forgets it once. It's not fair that it should cost 875 kr and a little like being pissed on when you only have a shoulder pull to spare it. You could at least try to help a member.

review: K√∏bte et forl√∏b med en mega fed tr√¶ner i mit tr√¶nings center og det et mega fedt forl√∏b og han g√∏r det mere end super godt Desv√¶rre bliver forl√∏bet lidt √∏delagt n√•r it supporten p√• app og betaling minder om et levn fra 90erne og app og hjemmeside ik vil tale sammen F√∏rst hver gang jeg pr√∏ver og √¶ndre min brugers kode ord bliver jeg kastet ind p√• oprette et medlemskab jeg er klar over der m√•ske kan v√¶re problem med og at f√• det nye system til og l√¶se de gamle fintnes world medlemmer men come on det over en m√•ned problemet har st√•et p√• center sendte end dag mail til it support hvor jeg bad dem kontakte mail men ikke en gang det har man kunne g√∏re Der udover oprettet jeg en betalings aftale men den kan √•benbart se fra den m√•ned det er i kun den n√¶ste m√•ned og frem s√• kostet mig en rykker Der ingen tvivl om service og tr√¶nerne er super dygtige og dejlige mennesker men n√•r ting er afh√¶ngige af it og software i et forl√∏b og svar tid er mere end 2 uger i 8 ugers forl√∏b vil sige det mest minder dovenskab og ned prioritering fra ledelsens side Med de ord vil jeg nu tage hjem fra tr√¶ning ^^
translated_review: Bought a programme with a big fat trainer in my training center and it's a really cool programme and he does it more than super well Unfortunately, when the IT support on the app and payment reminds of a relic from the 90s and app and website, he won't talk to each other.Every time I try and change my user's code word, I'm thrown into creating a membership I'm aware there may be a problem with and getting the new system to read the old fineness world members but come on it over one mThe problem has been at the center sent than day mail to IT support where I asked them to contact email but not even it has been possible to do There besides I created a payment agreement but it can apparently see from the month it is in only the next month and then cost me a pusher There is no doubt about the service and the trainers are super skilled and lovely people but when things depend on IT and software in a programme and answer time is more than 2 weeks in 8 weeks' time will say the most reminiscent lazines and down priormanagement's attitude In those words, I will now go home from training ^

review: Jeg tr√¶ner i pure gym p√• Vanl√∏se torv, hvor air condition oftest ikke virker - det bliver s√•ledes ulideligt at tr√¶ne og man m√• g√• hjem f√∏r tid. Man betaler dog stadig urolig mange penge om m√•neden for IKKE at kunne gennemf√∏re sin tr√¶ning. Jeg kommer minimum fire gange om ugen og det er kun ca √©n gang om m√•neden, at air con virker. Jeg har kontaktet manager i det p√•g√¶ldende center, samt flere medarbejdere - de siger allesammen, at de er fuldst√¶ndig enige med mig i, at det er ulideligt at v√¶re der, men de k√¶mper selv med hovedkontoret, som N√ÜGTER at g√∏re noget ved problemet. Jeg har ogs√• kontaktet hovedkontoret og forklaret om problemet og i √∏vrigt bedt om kompensation for de mange timers tr√¶ning jeg g√•r glip af, idet jeg m√• forlade centeret f√∏r tid for at kunne tr√¶kke vejret igen. Jeg blev affejet med et plat svar om, at s√•dan skulle air con v√¶re - alts√• give absolut ingen luft - og mit sp√∏rgsm√•l om kompensation blev fuldst√¶ndig ignoreret. Det skal lige siges, at medarbejderne i centeret (som heller ikke kan tr√¶kke vejret) √•bner d√∏re og vinduer n√•r de er der og s√• er det jo klart, at Air con ikke virker. Jeg er derfor begyndt at komme uden for bemandet √•bningstid, men der virker det s√• heller ikke. Mit sidste fors√∏g p√• at skabe forbedring bliver denne anmeldelse og hvis I stadig ikke er villige til, at g√∏re noget ved problemet, s√• ligger Loop heldigvis lige ved siden af. Til sidst vil jeg n√¶vne den eneste positive ting, som jeg kan komme i tanke om, og det er at der n√¶sten ikke er flere medlemmer tilbage i netop dette center, s√• man st√•r aldrig nogensinde i k√∏ til en maskine ;-) m√•ske I p√• hovedkontoret skulle begynde, at overveje HVORFOR vi er s√• f√• tilbage i centret og hvorfor Loop f√•r flere og flere medlemmer - man kan sgu ikke ligefrem kalde jer konkurrencedygtige.
translated_review: I exercise in pure gym in Vanl√∏se square, where air conditioning often doesn't work - so it becomes unbearable to train and you have to go home early. However, you still pay a lot of money a month to NOT be able to complete your training. I come at least four times a week and it's only about once a month that air con works. I've contacted the manager in that center, as well as several employees - they all say they agree with me that it's intolerable to be there, but they combI have also contacted the head office and explained the problem and asked for compensation for the many hours of training I miss, as I have to leave the center before time to breathe again. I was swept off with a low answer that such air con should be - that is to say give absolutely no air - and my question about compensation was completely ignored. It should be said that the employees in the center (which can also not tI have therefore begun to get outside manned opening hours, but there it does not work either. My last attempt to improve will be this review and if you are still not willing to do anything about the problem, Loop will, fortunately, be next to it. Finally, I will mention the only positive thing that I can think of, and that is that there are hardly any more Members left in this particular area.This center, so you're never ever in line for a machine;-) maybe you at head office should start thinking about WHY we're so few back at the center and why Loop gets more and more members - you can't exactly call yourselves competitive.

review: Jeg har generelt v√¶ret glad for at v√¶re medlem, og komme til deres hold, men deres kundesservice er elendig, og jeg er kun stadig medlem, da jeg er utrolig glad for specielt en intrukt√∏r, men jeg overvejer at finde noget andet. Jeg skrev til dem, da jeg havde sat mit hold p√• pause, som jeg havde f√•et hj√¶lp til over telefonen, da det stadig var FitnessWorld. Da kunne jeg i hvert fald godt finde et telefonnummer. Min pause var blevet slettet p√• fakturaen. Trods at der stod p√• min app, at jeg var p√• pause. Da jeg skrev blev jeg beskyldt for at lyve, og nu vil de ikke svare mig p√• mails. Udover det synes jeg det er suspekt, at de ikke l√¶ngere g√∏r det muligt for at f√• hj√¶lp over telefonen.Man skal ogs√• lige v√¶re opm√¶rksom p√•, at de sender smser n√•r et hold man er meldt til er aflyst, men de sender ikke smser, hvis man er p√• venteliste, og kommer p√• et hold pga afmelding, s√• det kan hurtigt komme til at koste et gebyr, hvis ikke man er opm√¶rksom p√• dette. translated_review: I am deeply disappointed by the customer service I have received from this gym. In connection with the move I had to cancel my membership personally at the center, here it was not registered correctly and I have experienced a number of difficulties as a result.PureGym offers to refund a small amount as a form of compensation while claiming that I have not terminated my membership. Unfortunately, my expectations have not been met. I cannot recommend this company to anyone, and I give them only one star for their inadequate service and lack of justice. S√• kan v√¶re sv√¶rt at holde et morgenholdet ude for kbh. Samtidig har de det med at overfylde nogle holdsale i eftermiddagstimerne, hvilket er ubekvemligt om sommeren, is√¶r hvis centeret er et sted hvor de ikke m√• st√∏je, og derfor ikke kan √•bne vinduerne under timer med h√∏j musik.Om jeg kan anbefale PureGym kommer an p√• hvilke center det er. Roskildes er mega godt. God plads, gode tr√¶nere. Fedt centerDen ved Frederiksberg sv√∏mmehallen havde et godt yogahold i weekend f√∏r corona, og deres sv√∏mmehal er ok. Fedt at man kan sv√∏mme f√∏r eller efter sin tr√¶ning. Hvis de stadig har det. Dem i N√¶stved er ret meh og som sagt bliver tr√¶nerne udskiftet meget. Den bedste er den ved siden af stationen, hvor der er et godt sammenhold i centeret, hvis man g√•r op i det. Dens holdsal er bare meget sm√•t.
translated_review: I have been a member of PureGym (formerly fitness world) for 4 years about. I have used the teams very much. The quality of these teams can vary a lot. Some are super good where you really get spanked for the money, others are miserable.The reason why I cut off an extra star is that their trainers are being replaced a lot (in the three N√¶stved centers), and because they have this rule that a team stops if not at least 10 comes each time. So can be hard to keep a morning team out of kbh. At the same time, I have been a member of PureGym (formerly fitness world) for 4 years about.they have the feeling of overfilling some classes in the afternoon hours, which is inconvenient in the summer, especially if the center is a place where they are not allowed to noise, and therefore cannot open the windows during hours of loud music.Whether I can recommend PureGym depends on which center it is. Roskilde's is mega well. Great space, good coaches. Cool centerThe at Frederiksberg swimming pool had a good yoga team this weekend before corona, and their swimming pool is ok. Great that you can swim before or after your training. If they still have done. Those in N√¶stved are quite meh and, as I said, the coaches are replaced a lot. The best is the one next to the station, where there is a good cohesion in the center if you care about it. Its teamroom is just very small.

name: Pernille R.
title: Opkr√¶ver betaling for opsagt medlemsskab
review: Jeg har for nogle dage siden modtaget en regning for min datters medlemsskab, som jeg opsagde i maj m√•ned. Normalt betales den automatisk, men jeg havde stoppet betalingsaftalen i banken, da vi ikke l√¶ngere var medlem. Jeg gjorde derfor Pure Gym opm√¶rksom p√• fejlen. Det giver slet ingen mening, da jeg selv har meldt mig ind i et andet center, og min datter aldrig fik brugt sit medlemsskab.Jeg havde ingen mulighed for at opdage, at det kun var sat p√• pause, da Pure Gym ikke har sendt en bekr√¶ftelse til mig som betaler. Kun til min datter, som selvf√∏lgelig ikke er opm√¶rksom p√•, at der kan komme andet end reklame fra Pure Gym i hendes mail. P√• trods af at jeg straks tog fat i Pure Gym ang√•ende fejlen, sender de stadig en rykker (!) og efter lange mail korrespondancer kr√¶ver de stadig, at jeg betaler. Jeg kan nu se, at jeg ikke er den eneste, der har problemer med betaling og rask sender folk til Inkasso uden varsel, s√• jeg antager, at Pure Gym er ligeglade med deres (tidligere) kunder, og har som f√∏rste prioritet at presse penge ud af folk. Kundeservice kender de i hvert fald ikke til.  HOLD JER LANGT V√ÜK!
translated_review: A few days ago I received a bill for my daughter's membership, which I resigned in May. Normally it is paid automatically, but I had stopped the payment agreement at the bank when we were no longer a member. I therefore made Pure Gym aware of the error. But Pure Gym claims that I have paused the membership and activated it again a month later. It makes no sense at all since I myself joined another center and my daughter never got to use her membership. I had no possibility of it.oath to discover that it was only paused as Pure Gym did not send a confirmation to me who pays. Only to my daughter, who of course is not aware that there may be anything other than advertising from Pure Gym in her mail. Despite the fact that I immediately grabbed Pure Gym about the error, they still send a reminder (!) and after long mail correspondence they still require that I pay. I now see that I am not the only one who has problems with payment and healthy send people to Inkasso without notice,so I assume Pure Gym doesn't care about their (previously) customers, and has the first priority of pushing money out of people. Customer service they certainly don't know about.

name: Mikkel Larsen
title: I burde overveje PoorGym
review: Er fornyeligt flyttet til Nyborg og jeg m√• sige jeres afdeling i Nyborg er det mest ringe fitness center jeg har v√¶ret i. Stort set alle maskiner er f√∏r krigen, og vi snakke slaget p√• reden i 1764. Det er ikke unormalt der er et par maskiner der ikke virker, men som ikke er skiltet med e ikke virker, i g√•r var jeg p√• tre forskellige maskiner der ikke virkede. V√¶rst er nok at der ikke er et eneste vindue i centeret der kan lukkes op, hvilket vil sige at i det tidsrum der ikke er personale, s√• er alt (d√∏re) lukket. D√©t kombineret med et halv sl√∏jt ventilation system, der kun t√¶nder hver 15-20 min. og k√∏rer m√•ske 5 minutter g√∏r at der er s√• d√•rlig luft og ulideligt varmt. Jeg har v√¶ret i center uden vinduer, men s√• er der store fan/propeller i loftet over det hele, s√• man i det mindste ikke skal st√• i 25 graders varm stillest√•ende sved luft.Hvorfor er d√©t man v√¶lger at bruge penge p√• at f√• det malet, i stedet for at f√• lavet et par vinduer der kan √•bnes?Herreomkl√¶dningensrummet er s√• lille s√• hvis man er tre personer derinde, s√• er der ikke mere b√¶nkplads, no kidding. Det er fuldst√¶ndig uproportioneret lille ifht. centeres st√∏rrelse, samt jeg ser der n√¶rmest ikke er nogen der tager bad fordi man st√•r fuldst√¶ndig blottet for al trafik rundt i rummet, d√©t er fuldst√¶ndigt absurd man ikke lige s√¶tter et par skydeluger for indgangen til bad afdelingen, men det er vel bevidst fordi i ved der ikke er s√• mange der har lyst til at tag bad n√•r man st√•r helt blottet og endda foran et gigantisk spejl???, men s√• spare i penge p√• varmt vand! En lille sidste ting er at n√•r man kommer til centeret bliver man i indgangen m√∏dt af en lille metalplade med ekstremt skarpe hj√∏rner og kanter. Den er helt bukket opi flere hj√∏rner og kommer man i sandaler, klipklappere eller lign. er der stor fare for man sk√¶r sine f√∏dder ret alvorligt, det er absolut ikke i orden. Kanten som jernpladen ligger over er kun til evt fragtm√¶nds pallel√∏fter (kanten er s√• lille at en k√∏restolsbruger sagtens kan k√∏rer over uden problem), men det kunne alts√• l√∏ses p√•lagt mere forsvarlige m√•der end det er nu. Men det pr√¶senter meget godt centeret som det er, ringe, tr√¶t og ude af form.Jeg ved der er rigtig mange der er flygtet ned til et nybyggede center med nye maskiner og som endda er billigere, kun ca. 200 meter derfra, det burde jeg ogs√•, men jeg har en autocamper og k√∏rer meget ifht. arbejde og derfor er det meget rart kunne benytte de forskellige center, men det her er dog under lavm√•let. Kom nu lidt ind i kampen, og selv om det er provinsen. Centeret er virkelig godt bes√∏gt (s√•l√¶nge det vare) s√• jeg begriber ikke det skal v√¶re s√• et fitness museum i s√• d√•rlig stand.Edit: svar : Jeg er okay med p√• at n√•r det er varmt udenfor s√• er det ogs√• varmt indenfor, s√• dum er jeg tros alt heller ikke! Men tak for info. Jeg kan s√• oplyse dig om det er rart med lidt gemmentr√¶k af frisk luft, n√•r det er varmt udenfor. Dette center ligger p√• en p-plads ved en slags mini udend√∏rs center, der er ingen boliger i n√¶rheden og den eneste larm er den musik i selv spiller, s√• det kunne man jo bare slukke, s√• er man ogs√• fri for at skulle overd√∏ve jeres musik med ens eget musik. S√• undskyldning om det ikke kan lade sig g√∏re er noget vr√∏vl. Desuden k√∏rer dette centers ventilation absolut ikke hele tiden. Man kan m√¶rke det hvis man er p√• en maskine ud foran en luftdysse i l√¶ngere tid at den kun k√∏rer 5 min og holder pause i 15-20min f√∏r man kan m√¶rke den igen. Der lugter tit som en gammel skole madpakke n√•r man tr√¶der ind i centeret, hvis de to d√∏re der er ikke er √•bne. Dette er jo ogs√• et tydeligt bevis for ventilationen ikke virker korrekt, eller s√• har i bare indstillet den at k√∏rer minimalt for at spare p√• str√∏mmen. I kunne for min skyld bare slukke ventilation hvis der var nogle vinduer.Selv tak.
translated_review: Has recently moved to Nyborg and I must say your department in Nyborg is the most poor fitness center I've been in. Virtually all the machines are before the war, and we're talking the battle of the nest in 1764. It's not uncommon there are a few machines that don't work, but which are not signposted with e doesn't work. Yesterday I was on three different machines that didn't work. Worst is enough that there isn't a single window in the center that can be opened, which means that in the time that isn't staff, then everything is (doors) lThis combined with a half-slow ventilation system that only turns on every 15-20 minutes and drives maybe 5 minutes makes it so bad air and unbearably hot. I've been in the center without windows, but then there are big fan/propels in the ceiling all over the place, so at least you don't have to stand in 25 degrees of hot standing sweat air.Why is it you choose to spend money on having it painted, instead of having a couple of windows that can be opened?It's completely unproportioned small according to the size of the center, and I see there's almost no one taking a shower because you're completely devoid of all traffic around the room, it's totally absurd you don't just put a few sliding hatches for the entrance to the bath department, but it's probably conscious because you know there aren't so many people who want to take a bath when you're standing completely exposed and even in front of a giant mirror??, but then save in money.a small last thing is that when you get to the center you are greeted by a small metal plate with extremely sharp corners and edges. It is completely bent up into several corners and you come in sandals, flip-flops or the like. there is a great danger of cutting your feet quite seriously, it is absolutely not all right. The edge over which the iron plate is located is only for any carrier's pallet lifts (the edge is so small that a wheelchair user can easily run over without a problem), but it could be solved.But it presents very well the center as it is, poor, tired and out of shape.I know there are a lot of people who have fled to a newly built center with new machines and which are even cheaper, only about 200 meters away, I should, but I have a motorhome and run a lot according to work and therefore it's very nice to use the various centers, but this is under the lows. Come on a little into the game, and even if it's the province.I don't understand it should be so a fitness museum in such bad condition.Edit: answer: I'm okay with that when it's hot outside, it's also hot inside, so stupid I don't believe everything either! But thanks for info. I can tell you if it's nice with a little hiding of fresh air when it's hot outside. This center is in a parking space at a kind of mini outdoor center, there are no homes nearby and the only noise is the music in itself, so it couldYou just turn it off, and you're free to drown your music with your own music. So excuse if it's not possible is nonsense. Besides, this center's ventilation doesn't run all the time. You can feel it if you're on a machine out in front of an air nozzle for a long time that it only drives 5 minutes and takes a break for 15-20 minutes before you can feel it again. It often smells like an old school lunch pack when you enter the center, if the two doors aren't open. This is also a tyou have just set it to run minimally to save power. translated_review: Fitness World was a Danish company, and it worked. We were satisfied. Then British Puregym took over and then nothing has worked: Our cards have not worked, so we haven't been able to get in together many times (training tastes i.e. the most expensive subscription), and customer service is arrogant and educational. As we approach the reception for now 117th time with the problem and irritable says that now we have had enough, and now we want you to fix the problem, the company sends us a warning for "bad behavior" and claimswe have not spoken "good" to the employee, i.e. we are being accused of something that does not fit at all and that a responsible manager would be able to deny by looking at the surveillance video: we are dissatisfied (yes quite rightly!), but none of us have behaved badly or spoken uglylyly to the employee. review: Det her er for s√• vidt en helt generel betragtning, dog vil jeg komme med eksempler direkte fra mit lokale center. Og nej, du f√•r ikke at vide hvor det er, det er ligegyldigt. Det kunne jeg sikkert godt.Der er flere grunde til at jeg ikke lige nu f√∏ler trang til det. Men det skal lige huskes, at med Fitness Worlds aggressive tilgang p√• pris og markedsf√∏ring fjernede de effektivt de fleste sm√• fitnesscentre. De lavede endda en k√¶de "Urban Gym" for lige effektivt at st√∏vsuge markedet. Hov... Urban er vist da lukket nu? Jeg kan ikke huske hvor mange penge der skulle bruges til at g√• fra "FitnessWorld" til "Puregym", men det var vist et 3-cifret millionbel√∏b.Naivt troede man som medlem (eller jeg gjorde) at der lige kom en eller anden form for renovering, nye maskiner eller...?Det synes ikke at v√¶re tilf√¶ldet. I det mindste ikke hvor jeg tr√¶ner. Det er bare navnet der √¶ndres. Jeg kalder det for gammel vin p√• nye flasker. Staffage. Eller bedre: nu g√∏r vi det her, s√• glemmer de sikkert alt det der IKKE er godt.  !Jeg vil v√¶dde p√•, at et navneskift ikke kommer til at √¶ndre noget som helst relevant i forhold til de ting, oftest sm√•ting, der efter min mening skulle have v√¶ret i fokus. Det er s√• sm√• og simple ting, at mit bud er at var det en anden virksomhed blev det ordnet/fixet/l√∏st med det samme!Det er klart at mine betragtninger er meget subjektive, alts√• i forhold til hvad JEG mangler osv i mit lokale tr√¶ningscenter, men her er lidt fra godteposen:1. Hvorfor er det at det skal tage en evighed at f√• repareret eller udskiftet en legextension? jo jo, der er da en mere ovenp√•... But why? Det ville tage mig eller en anden 20 min at fixe det. Eller m√•ske endda en ansat? Men det m√• de vist ikke.HVORFOR BLIVER MASKINER OG UDSTYR IKKE FIXET INDEN FOR RIMELIG TID? - og det er sgu max 48 timer!2. Hov - der faldt et ur ned. I stykker. Et nyt koster max 129,00 i F√∏tex. Hvorfor skal der g√• 4-5 uger f√∏r et nyt kommer op - hvis det kommer? FORDI ALT ER TOPSTYRET - DER SKAL TILLADELSE TIL. OG S√Ö SKAL VI DA LIGE SE OM IKKE DER LIGGER ET P√Ö FJERNLAGERET - M√ÖSKE FRA URBAN?3. Den der ting til landmine ville alts√• sidde meget bedre hvis den blev rykket 1,5 meter. Skal jeg g√∏re det?Det er 2 bolte der skal skrues p√•. Nej nej. a. vi skal da lige h√∏re om det er ok overhovedet at flytte den og b. hvis det er ok skal det v√¶re vores egen teknikker. Nej fra HQ. Det havde nok ogs√• taget 6 uger at f√• den flyttet4. I  Kettlebells. Indr√∏mmet - der s√¶t i competition fra 8-32 kg. S√• er der en 36 og en 40. Foresp√∏rgsel: kan man m√•ske k√∏be en 36 og 40 mere? Du ved, s√• der s√¶t hele vejen til 40 kg? Igen: vi skal lige se om der er nogen p√• lager. Fair nok, det ville vi andre ogs√• have gjort. Der hvor det s√• bliver liiiidt stramt er, n√•r der IKKE er nogen p√• lager og det er en negativ til at K√òBE. Jeg mener, FitnessWorld har med sikkerhed mulighed for at k√∏be langt billigere end os d√∏delige, men i dagens DK vil det kunne k√∏bes af almindelige mennesker for hmmm.... 2500?Det DET jeg mener med at det sgu er ligegyldigt med et navn for at v√¶re smart, eller signalere udvikling eller hvad det nu g√•r ud p√•...De mange penge kunne v√¶re g√•et til at f√• malet lidt her og der i mit center, f√• skiftet spejle der er smadret, f√• udskiftet lidt meget slidte maskiner, m√• et par nye (ja - gerne fra fjernlager). I det hele taget vise interesse for MEDLEMMERNE der efter min bedste overbevisning IKKE er eller bliver imponeret over en meningsl√∏s og ligegyldig navne√¶ndring - og da slet ikke hvis det ikke f√∏lges op p√• anden m√•de. Mine penge skal sgu da ikke g√• til at √¶ndre et navn?????Brug pengene p√• at ans√¶tte mere personale. Personale der ved hvad service er. (Uffe Holm har et rigtig godt tilbud til dem der gerne vil vide hvad service er) Ja ja, reng√∏ring er vigtig, men det er vigtigere at have TID og BLIK for medlemmerne.Ans√¶t noget personale der kan andet end at g√∏re rent og udlevere et medlemskort, som kan spotte et medlem der er ved at splitte sig selv eller en maskine ad. Kan hj√¶lpe dem. Give dem en god oplevelse.Brug penge p√• at √¶ndre hele konceptet? Jeg ved godt at der g√∏res - halvhjertede - fors√∏g p√• at skabe f√¶lleskab med vilje... det kommer bare ikke l√¶ngere end til videoreklamerne. Hold? Ikke i mit center. Jeg VED at der p√• det sted tidligere har v√¶ret p√¶nt mange hold - jeg har selv haft en del af dem... Men de fleste fitnesscentre har et ambivalent forhold til hold. De KAN v√¶re gode for bundlinjen, men oftest er de det ikke. Og s√• er det no go for PureG. Desv√¶rre for DET er noget der helt af sig selv giver f√¶llesskab.Har meget mere, men kun 109 tegn tilbage  Nok ingen reaktion fra Puregym  desv√¶rre.God dag til alle. L√¶s, l√¶r, l√∏ft og lev.
translated_review: And no, you're not gonna know where it is, it doesn't matter. And the staff are doing their best under the conditions set out by one of the most rigid organizations I've ever gotten acquainted with.And just to take it in the run: yes, I can just train somewhere else. I could probably do that.There are several reasons why I don't feel the need for it right now.In addition, with Fitness World's aggressive approach to price and marketing, they effectively removed most of the small fitness centers. They even made a chain "Urban Gym" to just effectively vacuum the market. Wow... Urban is now closed? I don't remember how much money needed to go from "FitnessWorld" to "Puregym" but it was shown a 3-digit million amount.Now it was thought as a member (or I did) that there was just some kind of renovation, new machines or...?It doesn't seem to v v v.honour the case. At least not where I work out. It's just the name that changes. I call it old wine in new bottles. Staffing. Or better: now we do this, they probably forget everything that is NOT good.! I bet a name change isn't going to change anything relevant to the things, mostly small things, that in my opinion should have been in focus. It's so small and simple that my bid is that it was another company it was fixed/fixed immediately!is clear that my considerations are very subjective, i.e. in relation to what I am missing and so on in my local gym, but here's a little bit from the good bag:1. Why is it that it should take an eternity to repair or replace a legextension?Yes, there is one more upstairs... But why? It would take me or another 20 minutes to fix it. Or maybe even an employee? But I don't think they should.WHY DOES MACHINES AND EQUIPMENT NOT FIXET WITHIN RIMELY TIME? - and that's max 48 hours!2. Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa!A new one costs a maximum of 129.00 in F√∏tex. Why should it be 4-5 weeks before a new one comes up - if it comes? BECAUSE everything is top-managed - THERE IS TO BE AUTHORIZED. AND WE WILL WE SEE IF IT IS NOT A REMOVED - MAYBE FROM URBAN?3. So that thing to landmine would be much better if it was moved 1.5 meters. Should I do it? It's 2 bolts to be screwed on. No. a. We should hear if it's okay at all to move it and b. If it's okay it should be ours to do it?Ace's own techniques. No from HQ. It might have taken 6 weeks to get it moved4. In Kettlebells. Granted - there's a set in competition from 8-32 kg. Then there's a 36 and a 40. Query: maybe you can buy a 36 and 40 more? You know, so that set all the way to 40 kg? Again: we need to see if there's anyone in stock. Fair enough, we other people would have done that too. Where it gets a little tight is when there's NOT someone in stock and it's a negative to BUY. I mean, FitnessWorld has with certainty possibleI mean, it doesn't really matter with a name to be smart, or signal development or whatever it is...The big money could have gone to get a little painted here and there in my center, to change mirrors that have been smashed, to replace a little very worn machines, a few new ones (yeah - like from remote storage).If my best conviction is not or is impressed by a meaningless and indifferent name change - and certainly not if it is not followed up in any other way. My money shouldn't go to change a name????Use the money to hire more staff. Staff who know what service is. (Uffe Holm has a really good offer for those who want to know what service is) Yes, cleaning is important, but it is more important to have TIME and VIEW for members.I know that there are - half-hearted - attempts to create community on purpose... it just doesn't get any further than the video ads. Keep? Not in my center. I KNOW that there have been a lot of teams in that place in the past - I have had a part of them myself... But most gyms have an ambivalent relationship with them.team. They CAN be good for the bottom line, but most often they are not. And then it is no go for PureG. Unfortunately for IT is something that quite of itself gives community.Has much more, but only 109 characters left Probably no reaction from Puregym unfortunately.Good day to all. Read, learn, lift and live.

Da jeg sagde at jeg ikke ville slippe sagen f√∏r jeg var blevet tilbagebetalt, kom han med en beregning der ikke matchede det jeg har betalt for meget, der var tydelige fejl som eksempelvis at jeg skulle betale dobbelt medlemsskabspris for Juni m√•ned. Han gad ikke diskutere det yderligere.Puregyms svar under denne anmeldese er ikke korrekt, jeg f√•r ikke hele det skyldige bel√∏b refunderet, de har v√¶ret villige til at give mig et symbolsk bel√∏b tilbage, men ikke hele bel√∏bet. In October last year I am either by a technical error in their system or by an employee, been enrolled in Puregym's All-In membership, which cost me 119kr(later 139) extra a month until I discovered it recently. 1087kr too much has been withdrawn from my account. I have tried to use their form system which they do not reply to. Now I finally got through to a chat conversation where I really had to fight, just to hear that they were only willing to refund eWhen I said that I wouldn't let go of the case until I had been repaid, he came up with a calculation that didn't match what I paid too much, there were obvious errors such as that I had to pay double membership price for the month of June. He didn't want to discuss it further.Puregym's answer during this notification is not correct, I don't get all the amount due refunded, they have been willing to give me a symbolic amount back, but not the whole amount.illegal practices and are very irresponsible.

name: Erik Humblebug

Og efter hvad jeg kan se, er det let styrketr√¶ning, som vi taler om.I samme center er der en planche, der fort√¶ller, at cardiotr√¶ning bl.a. giver kondition. Og styrketr√¶ning giver styrke og udholdenhed.Derfor er jeg g√•et til ledelsen og fortalt, at den personlige tr√¶ner giver en tr√¶ningsvejledning, der ikke virker, hvis m√•let med tr√¶ning er v√¶gttab og kondition.Svaret fra centerlederen har v√¶ret, at betingelsen for, at jeg fortsat kan tr√¶ne i centret er, at jeg holder inde med kritikken.Jeg  startede i centret den 1. september 2022. Desv√¶rre har jeg p√• det seneste oplevet, at der kommer f√¶rre og f√¶rre i centret. Jeg synes det er logisk, n√•r personalet vejleder medlemmer i at opholde sig i centret s√• lidt som muligt. Du er ikke mere velkommen, hvis du gerne vil v√¶re der til l√¶ngere tr√¶ningssessioner.Jeg har for ca. 2 m√•neder siden, gjort personalet opm√¶rksom p√•, at jeg skal orienteres skriftligt i forbindelse med, at mit center √¶ndrer navn fra Fitness World til Pure Gym.Nu har Pure Gym bare vedtaget med sig selv, at det beh√∏ver de ikke. Derfor er medlemmerne dd. ikke orienteret om deres rettigheder som medlemmer efter navneskiftet.Det er efter min mening b√•de sl√∏set og arrogant. Medlemmerne fylder √•benbart ikke ret meget i Pure Gym. For mig er det en naturlig del af en virksomheds service at orientere medlemmerne, n√•r der er √¶ndringer p√• vej, ogs√• selv om det kun er et navneskifte.

I think it is logical when the staff advises members to stay at the center as little asyou are no longer welcome if you want to be there for longer training sessions.I have about 2 months ago informed the staff that I have to be informed in writing that my center changes name from Fitness World to Pure Gym.Now Pure Gym has just decided with itself that they don't have to. Therefore, the members are not informed of their rights as members after the change of name.It is in my opinion both sloppy and arrogant.quite a lot in Pure Gym. For me it is a natural part of a company's service to inform members when changes are on the way, even if it is only a name change.

Her tr√¶net i centret i mange, mange √•r. Virkelig ugennemt√¶nkt beslutning, der er taget oppefra

In addition, I have a roommate who uses the center considerably more often, who has the same experience)There is a lack of general management of the center, otherwise it wouldn't be so wrong... There is a consistent lack of hand alcohol in half of dispensations. - All toilets are grossly disgusting. It is immediately similar that no toilets are checked more than 2-3 times a day, which is absurd when you think about the amount of people using the centerStaff should go round every hour in peak hours, but rarely move from the desk, even when there are more at work. In addition, the toilets smell rancid, suggesting a lack of ground cleaning (other than emptying trash can and cleaning mirror) - no water vending machines, which means that you are forced into disgusting toilets to fill your water bottle. - More cabinets in the men's dressing rooms do not work, which means that it can be difficult to find a closet when you have to work out in busy peIt is absurd to take so much money in continuous when the booth at the center is so poor. One toilet door in the men's changing room has been missing a lock for almost 2 months. The same applies to the light in the sauna. One feels ridiculous when SATS in real earnest requires 409 kr (without study or √¶)I'm looking forward to competition coming near √òrestaden, because hopefully it will be the end of Sats Fields or their poor service level.

name: Frida Budtz

Men derefter er der s√• sket en fejl i mit medlemskab. Nu virker det ikke l√¶ngere til centeret ved vesterport, men det p√• N√∏rrebro. Og sats siger nu, at jeg skal betale 409kr. For at beholde mit medlemskab i vesterport centeret. Jeg v√¶lger i stedet at opsige mit abonnement, da jeg synes det er alt for dyrt. Jeg er ogs√• irriteret, da jeg ikke rigtig synes sats tager fejlen p√• sig. Men jeg er alts√• tvunget til at betale m√•neden ud + en m√•ned. Som de siger kan jeg stadig bruge mit medlemskab i den periode‚Ä¶, men ikke i vesterport centeret‚Ä¶ kun p√• N√∏rrebro. Hvor er det bare frustrerende, at jeg ender med at betale for DERES fejl! Det eneste der reder mig er nogle kuponer jeg i min tid har optjent, som g√∏r det muligt for mig at f√• 12 tr√¶ninger i vesterport centeret.Generelt skuffet over den fesne service og mangel p√• anerkendelsen af at det er DEM der har lavet en fejl.
translated_review: I started my membership autumn 2022. I was physically down at the center at western port and started it. I only had to pay to use machines and it should be in the center. I have previously had membership at N√∏rrebro, but have moved since. I am told that it costs 299kr. per month.For many months it goes without problems where I train at the center at western port. For a period their check-in machines do not work, but they are cute and just let people through. But then there is a fit no longer works to the center at western gate, but it at N√∏rrebro. And rate now says that I have to pay 409kr. To keep my membership at western gate center. I choose instead to cancel my subscription as I think it's too expensive. I'm also annoyed because I don't really think the rate is wrong. But I'm forced to pay the month out + a month. As they say I can still use my membership during that period... but not in the west gate center... onlyon N√∏rrebro. How frustrating it is that I end up paying for THEIR mistakes! The only thing that saves me is some coupons I have earned in my time, which allow me to get 12 trainings at the Western Port Center.Generally disappointed by the festive service and lack of recognition that it is the DEM that has made a mistake.

Der er et bredt udvalg af maskiner og frie v√¶gte, som kan tilfredsstille enhver fitnessentusiast. Desuden er der et stort udvalg af holdtr√¶ningstimer, som kan passe til alle niveauer og interesser.Personalet i SATS er venlige og hj√¶lpsomme, og de er altid klar til at guide og hj√¶lpe, hvis man har brug for det. Tr√¶nerne er erfarne og kyndige, hvilket betyder, at man altid er i gode h√¶nder, uanset hvilken type tr√¶ning man √∏nsker at fokusere p√•.Sammenlignet med andre fitnesscentre, jeg har v√¶ret medlem af, er SATS klart en klasse for sig. translated_review: I have recently switched to the SATS gym, and I must admit that it has been a great decision! After experiencing a number of competitors' offers, SATS shines through with its high quality and service level.First of all, the cleanliness of ATS is remarkable. The entire centre is always impeccably clean and tidy, creating an inviting environment to train in. The staff is very attentive to hygiene and it is clear that they prioritise the health and well-being of their members.There is a wide range of machines and free weights that can satisfy any fitness enthusiast. In addition, there is a wide range of team training lessons that can fit all levels and interests.The staff in ATS is friendly and helpful, and they are always ready to guide and help if you need it. The trainers are experienced and knowledgeable, which means that you are always in good hands, no matter what type of training you want to focus on.Compared to other gyms I have been a member of, SATS is clearly a class separately. If you're looking for a clean, well-equipped and professional fitness centre with a strong focus on customer satisfaction, I can highly recommend SATS.

translated_review: Been a member since 2019 and now I'm out of work. For me, it started to go downhill significantly for SATS, after having experienced several centres where steam baths didn't work. I asked the various employees in those places why they were closed, and got different answers all the places. Either they were out of service and there was a call for technician or they kept breaking up etc. Some places I found out it was to save, but they weren't allowed to say that officially. But they promised aThey probably had to open up again - the head office had promised. Then came the message (after 1-2 months of frustration) that they now shut down all steam baths to save (so they didn't have to close centers) and then that the sauna was also closed (in most places). For me it was all the reason to be in SATS and not another cheaper center. However, the crucial thing has been that they have lied to their customers and run a super bad style in relation to information (or lack thereof).I have now resigned as a consequence, as I cannot possibly support a company that is so indifferent to their core customers.

name: Jesper Krabbe
