Dampbad og sauna, har de sidste par √•r v√¶ret eneste ekstra gode hos jer, der har holdt mig fra at skifte. Nu lukkede i dampbad og derefter sauna, n√¶sten alle steder. Der er nu 5 centre med sauna. Jeg har s√• benyttet den p√• Nyg√•rdsvej og har hver eneste af de sidste 4 uger fortalt i receptionen at gulvet sejler i bakterier og n√¶sten halvdelen af b√¶nkene er belagt med et tykt lag gr√∏n alge/skimmel/bakteriesuppe og halvr√•dne bredder. 4 uger og der er ikke sket en fl√∏jtende fis. Det er sundhedsskadeligt og jeres service og reng√∏ring er lige ud sagt elendigt. I giver ikke jeres receptionister nogen form for handlemuligheder, ud over at skrive til en, antageligt blind og d√∏v centerchef, der tydeligt aldrig har st√•et p√• gulvet og unders√∏gt hvad s√∏ren det egenligt er som i s√¶lger og byder kunderne. Jeg kommer til at melde jer til sundhedsmyndighederne, da i √•benbart ikke selv kan tage det mindste ansvar i jeres centre og har afmonteret enhver form for logisk t√¶nkning hos jeres ansatte med en hovedl√∏s og frav√¶rende topstyring. S√• snart er der nok desv√¶rre kun 4 saunaer i brug. √òv. Men hvis jeg kan redde andre for at blive syge i jeres center, s√• m√• det v√¶re den vej det g√•r.Som det n√¶ste kommer jeg til at melde mig ud, hvilket ogs√• h√¶nger sammen med, at p√• trods af alt bliver ringere, s√• s√¶tter i prisen p√• mit logbuy medlemskab op med 17%. Hvorfor betale endnu mere for endnu mindre?Har i regnet p√• hvad i kunne spare ved at slukke hver tredje spotlampe i stedet for saunaen? Der er n√¶ppe nogen der dropper medlemskabet fordi der er lidt mere m√∏rkt, men i kommer uden tvivl til at miste mange medlemmer p√• slukket dampbad og sauna. Jeg kan desv√¶rre konkludere at jeres m√•de at drive forretning p√• er lige s√• elendig som jeres reng√∏ring. De tiltag i g√∏r nu vil ramme jeres toplinje h√•rdere end de costbesparelser i finder frem. Det kan umuligt blive en profitabel strategi. Hvis i har haft eksterne p√• til at finde p√• disse tiltag, s√• b√∏r i f√• pengene tilbage.Nye ejere, ny ledelse og en regul√¶r turn-around ligner en n√∏dvendighed.Farvel til de 5383 kr. backlog i havde p√• mig i 2023. T√¶nker ikke det var besparelsen p√• sauna, besparelserne p√• reng√∏ring og en anmeldelse til myndighederne v√¶rd. Farvel
translated_review: Hello Sats, now the limit is reached. I have been with you for 7 years. Gradually, the service and cleaning have become worse and worse. Steam bath and sauna, the last few years have been the only extra good with you who have kept me from changing. Now closed in steam bath and then sauna, almost everywhere. There are now 5 centres with sauna. I have then used it at Nyg√•rdsvej and have every one of the last 4 weeks told at the reception that the floor is sailing in bacteria and almost half of the benches are coated with a thick layer of green algae/smold/bactory soup and half rotten widths. 4 weeks and there has been no whistling bullshit. It's harmful to health and your service and cleaning is just plainly miserable. You don't give your receptionists any kind of options, besides writing to one, presumably blind and deaf center manager, who clearly has never stood on the floor and examined what is so obvious as you sell and offer customers. I'm going to report you to the health authorities, as you obviously cannot take the least of your own.answer in your centers and have removed any kind of logical thinking from your employees with a headless and absent top management. As soon as there are unfortunately only 4 saunas in use. Practice. But if I can save others to get sick in your center, then it must be the way it goes.As the next thing I'm going to report out, which is also due to the fact that, despite everything, the price of my logbuy membership increases by 17%. Why pay even less?Has you calculated what?You could save by turning off every third spot lamp instead of the sauna? There is hardly anyone who drops membership because it is a little more dark, but you will undoubtedly lose many members on off steam bath and sauna. I can unfortunately conclude that your way of doing business is as miserable as your cleaning. The measures you are doing now will hit your top line harder than the cost savings you find out. It can't possibly be a profitable strategy. If you've had externals on to come up withNew owners, new management and a regular turn-around look like a necessity.Goodbye to the 5383 DKK backlog you had on me in 2023. L√¶kre nye maskiner og forbedringer bliver ved og nye maskiner kommer til .Personale er flinke, hj√¶lpsomme  og engagerede og smilende og det fantastisk og m√∏de smil p√• vej ind og blive smilet til n√•r man skal af sted igen. Reng√∏ringen er i top, der muligheder for at k√∏be l√¶kre tr√¶ningsudstyr og jeg kan faktisk ikke kritisere meget hvad s√•dan noget ang√•r  siden Ros skal gives n√•r Ros er fortjent og Ros fortjener SATS i den grad.Der var mulighed for at k√∏be billig kaffe/cappuchino og lign. under Fitness.dk fra et par maskiner og denne mulighed savner jeg.Hvorfor giver jeg s√• kun tre stjerner n√•r jeg ville faktisk give hele fem stjerner? For det ikke skal v√¶re nok, s√• er dem der √∏nsker at opsige deres abonnement efter lukningen af wellness faciliteterne, nu bundet til at  betale december med. translated_review: While the Christmas lights burn in undisturbed full bloom in the streets and shops of Copenhagen, one must look for a long time for a more arrogant and tone-deaf handling of the "energy crisis" than the way in which SATS is currently handled. Where their biggest competitor, Fitness world, renovates and invests in their centers, one sees worn machines falling apart constAnt, empty soap dispensers and bath facilities that have not seen a sponge since they took over Fitness DK, at SATSES centres. With the unnotified closure of now also their saunas, SATS has again proven that they put the profit higher than the customer, especially because this significant deterioration of the facilities does not result in a reduction in the monthly performance of customers. For that should not be enough, those who want to cancel their subscription after the closure of the wellness facilities are now bound to aIt's crazy that the management of SATS again hopes that customers will let their stunt pass, especially after their lack of action during the corona shutdown. It's obvious that SATS hasn't learned much in their time outside the Copenhagen market, and this rate from them should almost mean the beginning of SATS' second sale of their centres in Copenhagen. "Rather a closed Steam room than a closed gym" but dear SATS management, a center can shame be closed by being disrespectful aboutI can only recommend that you look for a much cheaper fitness subscription, and better customer service than the one at SATS, since according to them, what made SATS' centers special is only perks that can be taken from you overnight.

Then it is curious that the year's account for 2019 mentions the importancefor SATS around the social aspect offered by the sauna and steam bath as well as in the 2021 YEAR REPORT where it is mentioned that SATS centers historically all are established with sauna and steam bath as part of the concept, so I think SATS might move on to the difficult balance of truth boom when they try to repel sauna and steam bath from their concept - it's not comfortable SATS!! 5/12-2022: Thank you for reply Andy, but is it no more comfortable just to admit in changing your concept instead of continuing to tellthe members who disagree with you that the sauna and steam bath are NOT part of your core product? it is in direct contradiction with what you write in your annual reports - it gives much more respect that you tell the truth that you want to save money because electricity and gas have become expensive! we can all understand that and then it must be up to the members whether they want to be part of SATS or not.

translated_review: As so many others have written lately, SATS has decided to shut down their wellness facilities. The same procedure as at the steam baths - without official communication from SATS member service.The prices have increased continuously over the years, but now they can no longer be defended. SATS has become an expensive chain of facilities that are worse than their competitors that make it at half the price.There are many members who are dissatisfied with the decision, even though SATS publicly argues on Trustpilot that it is only "a few of our members" who use these facilities.It is a sad development for SATS that they no longer differentiate on a single parameter.Bader facilities and staff as behind the desk in most centres lack a course in providing good customer service.

You're always running some nice offer for new customers, of course in an attempt to attract them, but perhapsYou could also find ways to give existing members some good offers every now and then, it is after all your regular customers who are holding hands under you.There is a picture that your service is deficient, the quality of your centres only gets worse every year, and with an energy crisis you have shut down the steam baths without me being compensated as a consumer. Your greater range of facilities has otherwise always made a difference to whether I am a member of SATS or Fitness world. Right now there is no researchThe fact that you are staggeringly expensive, which makes you look money-grubbing, especially when quality and service have not followed your price increases. Trainers and Teams:-)

Det ligger t√¶t p√• mit arbejde og det har et stort funktionelt rum. Maskiner bliver hurtigt repareret. Det gjorde det IKKE i Roskilde.Alle steder bliver jeg m√∏dt af et positivt personale. Og er glad for at v√¶re i SATS. N√•r der er udfordringer p√• reng√∏ring og andet, g√•r jeg til personalet og p√•peger det. Det bliver oftest modtaget positivt og der bliver tit reageret p√• det hurtigt.Jeg har kropslige udfordringer pga. skader og arbejder mig stadig fremad med min tr√¶ner. Derfor betyder det meget, at de dage hvor motivationen ikke er h√∏j, at blive m√∏dt med positivitet og forst√•else - n√•r nu jeg har tvunget mig selv afsted - da jeg ved det er vejen fremad :-).
translated_review: It was very challenging that Roskilde had to be renovated. Finding a new center to come in. Change center? What about my personal trainer?I chose to stay in line with my personal trainer, It worked and works well for me with a trainer in a longer run. I train in Vesterport with my trainer. A small place that lacks a larger functional area. We find out together.I work out in N√¶rum this morning. It works well. It is close to my work and it has a large functional roughness.m. Machines are quickly repaired. It did NOT do so in Roskilde.All places I am greeted by a positive staff. And are happy to be in SATS. When there are challenges on cleaning and other things, I go to the staff and point it out. It is usually received positively and often responds to it quickly.I have bodily challenges due to injuries and still work my way forward with my trainer. Therefore, it means a lot that the days where motivation is not high, to be met with positivity and forstoe - now that I have forced myself away - as I know it is the way forward:-).

For nogle uger siden vil jeg betegne vandet s√• varmt som Quooker vand som sidenhen "bare" er blevet rigtig varmt. Der er ikke mulighed for at regulere temp. I √∏vrigt er der virkelig klamt derude - m√•ske en id√© at f√• en studentermedhj√¶lper tilbage ml. 16-18 n√•r det er v√¶rst?Personalet er rigtig s√∏de og im√∏dekommende, men det hiver kun den samlede betragtning op fra 1 til 2 stjerner! SATS - I er ikke de billigste i markedet please g√∏r det bedre.Hilsen MichaelP.S. Var i Glostrup i g√•r at samme grund som foroven.. meget bedre!

A few weeks ago I will betthe water is as hot as Quooker water as since "just" has become really hot. There is no possibility of regulating temp. Besides, there is really disgusting out there - perhaps an idea to get a student assistant back ml. 16-18 when it is worst?The staff is really nice and welcoming, but it only pulls the overall view up from 1 to 2 stars! name: T. J. Jacobsen
title: 15 √•r som medlem - farvel og tak
review: Jeg har nu v√¶ret medlem i 1826 dage (5 √•r) siden min seneste anmeldelse, og har netop opsagt mit medlemskab i SATS. Efter sammenlagt 15 √•r.Det har jeg gjort fordi virksomheden over en l√¶ngere periode, i √∏vrigt med tilsyneladende fuldt overl√¶g, har forringet det jeg betaler for. Muligheder som kontakt til de enkelte centre er helt sl√∏jfet og det skaber stor irritation. Man kan ikke engang ringe til medlemsservice og blive stillet videre - og medlemsservice ved ikke noget om de enkelte centre. De kan udelukkende hj√¶lpe med medlemskab.Jeg er enormt stor fan af wellness-afdelingerne, som jeg mener er n√¶rmest det eneste virkelige parameter SATS har for at holde deres pris s√• h√∏jt oppe ift. konkurrenterne. Hvis ellers bare sauna og dampbade rent faktisk var i drift og blev h√•ndteret korrekt. Men nej. Suk. Det forekommer umanerligt ofte, at wellness er indstillet forkert eller slet ikke virker. Men m√•ske mest irriterende er dog, at centerchefer, personale, interne reparat√∏rer og medlemsservice, allesammen ikke ved noget om saunaovne. Deres evindelige forklaring om "√∏h ja, sauna er kortsluttet da nogen har h√¶ldt vand i" passer IKKE. S√¶t jer nu ordentlig ind i tingene! Det der skaber kortslutninger er normale saunasten, som ikke skiftes regelm√¶ssigt hvert kvartal. De fl√¶kker og forvitrer langsomt. Det grus/sm√•sten skader varmelegemer og samler sig i bunden af ovnen, hvor det f√∏rer til kortslutning og fejlstr√∏m p√• elgruppen ude i sikringsskabet. L√∏sningen er at l√¶re at skifte saunasten - eller k√∏be keramiske saunasten, som holder 5-7 gange l√¶ngere end de normale sten. Det forsinker selvf√∏lgelig frekvensen af ens reng√∏ring af saunaovne, men det skal immerv√¶k g√∏res.Som jeg tidligere har skrevet begriber jeg ikke hvorfor SATS ikke har smidt "Status for Wellness" for hvert center i deres ellers udm√¶rkede app, s√•dan s√• os kunder lynhurtigt kan se om fx dampbadene i vores favoritcentre virker eller ej.Men man har √•benbart kunder nok. Sikken skam.****************Gammel anmeldelse:God oplevelse men med mange irritationsmomenter: Jeg har v√¶ret medlem i 3662 dage (10 √•r). Generelt synes jeg k√¶den l√∏bende tager kritikken til sig og forbedrer. Ofte opst√•r der dog rigtigt irriterende oplevelser, som kunne have v√¶ret undg√•et.
translated_review: I have now been a member for 1826 days (5 years) since my last review, and have just terminated my membership in SATS. After a total of 15 years, I have done so because the company over a long period of time, by the way, has deliberately deteriorated what I pay for. Options such as contact with the individual centres are completely looped and this causes great irritation. You can't even call member service and be transferred - and member service doesn't know anything about the individual centres. They can excludeI am a huge fan of the wellness departments, which I believe is almost the only real parameter SATS has to keep their price so high up in terms of competitors. If otherwise just sauna and steam baths were actually in operation and were handled correctly. But no. Suk. It seems unmanly often that wellness is set incorrectly or not working at all. However, perhaps most annoying is that center managers, staff, internal repairers and member service, all of which do not know nTheir eternal explanation about "Oh yes, the sauna is short-circuited as someone has poured water in" does NOT fit. Now get properly into things! What creates short-circuits is normal sauna stones, which are not regularly changed every quarter. They split and weather slowly. The gravel/bitch damages heating elements and collects at the bottom of the oven, where it leads to short-circuits and fault currents on the electric group out in the safety cabinet. The solution is to learn how to change the sauna stone - or buy ceramic sauna stones, sI don't understand why SATS hasn't thrown the "Status for Wellness" for every center in their otherwise excellent app, so that we customers can quickly see whether, for example, the steam baths in our favourite centres work or not.But you obviously have enough customers. What a shame.************Old review:Good experience but with many annoyances: JI have been a member for 3662 days (10 years). In general, I think the chain constantly takes the criticism to heart and improves. Often, however, there are really annoying experiences that could have been avoided.

Compared to other centres, the equipment looks like something from a museum and there is an incredibly poor ventilation in the gym, which makes it difficult for members to breathe without having to feel like a sauna (ironic, since SATS sauna and steam baths are more than often defective).is the person who likes to train a little later in the day, so be aware that this SATS closes at 19:00 on a Saturday and 20:00 on a Friday and Sunday. In addition, haveI, along with others, seen employee specially treated individual favored members who do not follow the rules (for example sandals like footwear) This I have never experienced in my time at Fitness world where we have only been received with open arms and helpfulness. It makes no sense to choose SATS Taastrup as they do no better on any points. If the center itself does not destroy your desire to train, then the manager should probably do so.

name: Anne Lykkeskov
title: Verdens mest absurde administration
review: Verdens mest absurde administrationDet er sv√¶rt at vide, hvor man skal begynde med at beskrive omfanget af inkompetence hos SATS - ikke mit lokale center, som jeg faktisk er godt tilfreds med. Det har bare vist sig umuligt for mig at v√¶re medlem, fordi administrationen endnu ikke, efter 3 m√•neder, har kunnet f√• min betalingsaftale til at virke.Jeg har oprettet aftalen 3 gange, min bank har bekr√¶ftet, at aftalen er aktiv, men SATS har stadig ikke fundet ud af at f√• den til at fungere.De er umulige at komme i kontakt med (s√∏rger for at skjule kontaktdata fuldst√¶ndigt p√• hjemmesiden, ligesom de skjuler abonnementspriserne).Jeg har vist skrevet 10 mails til dem undervejs, hvor jeg pr√∏ver at l√∏se problemet. De fleste f√•r jeg ikke svar p√• - eller de skriver, at de har set, jeg har skrevet, men mailen er tom! eller de kan ikke √•bne vedh√¶ftede filer!, ingen af delene har jeg nogensinde haft problemer med ift nogen andre modtagere.De f√• gange, jeg har f√•et svar, skriver de at alt er fint, aftalen er oprettet. Blot for s√• alligevel ikke at h√¶ve kontingentet, og blokere min adgang til centeret.Midt i processen med at f√• l√∏st problemet, sender de pludselig en opkr√¶vning med posten. Her vil de have mig til at betale et bel√∏b pr 1. juli - og s√• kan jeg den 12. juli g√• ind p√• hjemmesiden for at se, hvad betalingen d√¶kkede!! formentlig et rykkergebyr, p√• trods af mine ih√¶rdige fors√∏g p√• at f√• lov til at betale. T√¶nk at sende en opkr√¶vning, hvor man undlader at skrive, hvad de opkr√¶vede bel√∏b d√¶kker - og have en kundeside p√• hjemmesiden, hvor man heller ikke kan f√• oplyst - f√∏r 12 dage efter, at betalingen skal falde - hvad man egentlig betaler for!!!Jeg t√∏r slet ikke t√¶nke p√•, hvor meget tid jeg har brugt p√• dette, men det er som at sl√• i en dyne. Jeg f√•r ikke svar p√• mine mails, og problemet bliver ikke l√∏st. Jeg har m√∏dt inkompetence f√∏r, men aldrig i denne skala.Som sagt er jeg glad for mit lokale center og vil virkelig gerne finde en l√∏sning, s√• jeg kan betale mit abonnement. Men m√•ske m√• jeg opgive pga den absurde inkompetence i SATSs administration.S√• hvis du har andre muligheder end at abonnere hos SATS, s√• g√∏r det, det kan spare dig for mange √¶rgelser!
translated_review: The world's most absurd administrationIt's hard to know where to begin by describing the extent of incompetence of SATS - not my local centre, which I am actually pleased with. It has just proved impossible for me to be a member, because the administration has not yet, after 3 months, been able to make my payment agreement work.I have created the agreement three times, my bank has confirmed that the agreement is active, but SATS has still not found out how to make it work.They are impossible to get intoI have shown that I have written 10 emails to them along the way, where I am trying to solve the problem. Most of them I don't get answers to - or they write that they have seen I have written, but the mail is empty! or they can't open attachments!, none of them have I ever had problems with if any other recipients.The few times I have received an answer, they write that everything is fine, the agreement is created. Just forso anyway not to raise the quota, and block my access to the center.At length in the process of solving the problem, they suddenly send a charge by mail. Here they want me to pay an amount by July 1st - and then on July 12th I can go to the website to see what the payment covered!! presumably a reminder fee, despite my strenuous attempts to be allowed to pay. Imagine sending a charge where one fails to write what the collected amounts cover - and have a customer page at hjI dare not think about how much time I have spent on this, but it's like hitting in a duvet. I don't get answers to my emails, and the problem isn't solved. I've met incompetence before, but never on this scale.As I said, I'm happy with my local center and would really like to find a solution, so I can pay my subscription. But maybe I have to give up because of the absurd incompetence.Nce in SATS' administration.So if you have other options than to subscribe to SATS, then do so, it can save you a lot of trouble!

Det lykkedes dog endelig til sidst, hvor jeg fik at vide, at jeg kunne f√• tilbagebetalt det bel√∏b, jeg havde betalt for det fulde medlemsskab i seks m√•neder i et fysisk SATS center. name: Mads W√ºnsche Olsen

review: Belv oprettet i centeret og udleverede kortoplysninger til mnd. betaling - tjekker pbs for aftaler der skulle v√¶re oprettet - der findes ikke nogle. T√¶nker det nok tr√¶kkes p√• kortet, afventer. G√•r i centeret i hele m√•neden er blokeret 3 sidste gange ingen ved hvorfor indtil den 4 person, der for√¶ller mig, der ligger en rykker og en ubetalt regning. Medarbejderen synes det er underligt da der allerede ligger betalingsoplysninger og korrekt konto - Vi dobbelt tjekker selvf√∏lgelig. Men hun siger at jeg nok kommer til at betale for rykkeren ogs√•.. Ringer til kundeservice dagen efter - fort√¶ller mig at PBS aftalen jeg ikke kan finde nogle steder i bank eller PBS app ikke er accepteret. Rykkeren fjernes givetvis og skynder mig ind og smider betalingen p√• kortet i stedet. Irriterende at skulle bruge s√• meget tid p√• det mest simple abonnement i verden.
translated_review: Belv created in the center and provided card information for mnd. payment - checking pbs for agreements that should be created - there are no ones. Thinking it probably drawn on the map, waiting. Going to the center throughout the month is blocked 3 last times no one knows why until the 4 person who tells me there is a reminder and an unpaid bill. The employee finds it strange as there is already payment information and correct account - We double check of course. But she says that I probably camemore to pay for the reminder too.. Calling customer service the next day - tells me that the PBS agreement I can't find anywhere in the bank or PBS app isn't accepted. The shaker will be removed and rushed in and dropped the payment on the card instead. Irritating to spend so much time on the most simple subscription in the world.

name: Asger Risom

review: En forn√∏jelse!Nemt at blive oprettet, ligetil at m√∏de ind, gode faciliteter og dejlig stemning.
translated_review: A pleasure!Easy to be created, easy to meet in, good facilities and nice atmosphere.

name: Ulrik Nikolajsen

translated_review: SUPER annoying company.Although by mistake another customer has entered my e-mail and SATS cannot be contacted directly by phone and they seem not to be able to solve the problem after 2 inquiries - so I'll be spammed with e-mails about test hours etc.If they have so little control of things I don't want to be a customer either.

name: Andrew Lindarstein
title: Jeg bor lige ved siden af SATS p√•‚Ä¶
review: Jeg bor lige ved siden af SATS p√• Amager Strandvej, og undrer mig over, at det ikke kan lade sig g√∏re at f√• et abonnement, der passer til en s√∏mand som mig, der er p√• havet halvdelen af √•ret. St√•r det til SATS, skal jeg betale for 12 m√•neder om √•ret, selv om jeg kun er hjemme 6 m√•neder om √•ret. For mig betyder det, at skal jeg v√¶re medlem af SATS, s√• kr√¶ver det, at jeg skal betale dobbelt for de m√•neder jeg er hjemme. Alternativt kan jeg betale 100 kr. pr. gang, hvilket er bliver endnu dyrere, da jeg tr√¶ner regelm√¶ssigt. S√• k√¶re SATS, kan det virkelig v√¶re rigtigt, at I skal v√¶re s√• rigide, at I ikke kan finde ud af at lave et abonnement, der passer til en s√∏mand som mig???Det kan andre fitness k√¶der alts√• godt finde ud af...:-(
translated_review: I live right next to SATS on Amager Strandvej, and wondering that it is not possible to get a subscription that suits a sailor like me who is at sea half of the year. If it stands for SATS, I have to pay for 12 months a year, even though I am only at home 6 months a year. For me, it means that I have to be a member of SATS, then it requires me to pay double for the months I am at home. Alternatively, I can pay 100 DKK per time, which is becoming even more expensive as I trainregularly. So dear SATS, can it really be true that you must be so rigid that you cannot find a subscription suitable for a sailor like me????Other fitness chains can find that out...:-(

name: Louise Clausen
title: D√•rlig service ifm omkl√¶dning/bad
review: Virkelig for d√•rligt at komme i et center over 10 √•r og det nu tredje gang man skal melde ind til b√•de leder og personale at varmereguleringen i omkl√¶dningsrummets bad ikke fungerer optimalt. Bad og wellness skal bare virke optimalt n√•r man kommer som medlem og betaler hver m√•ned. Man br√¶nder sig ligefrem under bruseren og m√• g√• ind og ud af badet flere gange. Sidst fik jeg bare at vide at jeg kunne skifte bruser og de ville kigge p√• det. Idag stod vi et par i k√∏ foran de brusere der virker bedst. Lyser i omkl√¶dningsrummet fungerer heller ikke alle steder og det virker som man er i evig byggeprojekt. Virkelig d√•rlig service.
translated_review: Really too bad to go to a center over 10 years and now the third time you have to report to both the manager and staff that the heat regulation in the dressing room bath doesn't work optimally. Bath and wellness just have to work optimally when you come as a member and pay every month. You actually burn yourself in the shower and have to go in and out of the shower several times. Last time I was just told that I could change the shower and they would look at it. Today we stood a couple in line in front of the showers that work best. Lights in oThe magnifying room also doesn't work everywhere and it seems like you're in eternal construction project. Really bad service.

name: Abz Cooliz

review: Jeg havde mistet min pung tilbage i september m√•ned hvor jeg s√• havde t√¶nkt mit medlemskab var sat i bero, og nu her i februar fik jeg s√• en mail med rykker og et skyldigt bel√∏b p√• 1000kr.Med al ro og orden forklarede jeg min situation til kundeservice og specifikt en medarbejder ved navn Andy.Med smil p√• l√¶ben kom vi igennem situationen sammen.
translated_review: I had lost my wallet back in September when I had thought my membership had been suspended, and now in February I received an email with reminders and a guilty sum of DKK 1000.With all calm and order, I explained my situation to customer service and specifically an employee named Andy.With a smile on my lip, we came through the situation together.

name: Maxim Valeur
title: T√•rnh√∏jepriser, d√•rlig service og d√•rlige systemer
review: Har meldt mig ud af Sats, grundet de t√•rnh√∏jepriser, men pludselig kommer der rykkergebyr, uden at f√• nogen notifikation omkring hvorfor. Jeg ringer s√• til en Mark og forklarer ham hvad der er sket. Hvortil han svarer flabet og siger at de bare er s√•dan det er. Hvis betalingen ikke g√•r igennem 1. Gang s√• kommer der rykker p√• med det samme.Sindssyg koncept, d√•rlig service - herligt at jeg er ude af SATS, de nogle krejlere.
translated_review: Has reported me out of Sats, due to the towering prices, but suddenly there comes the push fee, without getting any notification about why. I then call a Mark and explain to him what has happened. To which he answers the flab and says they're just like that. If the payment doesn't go through the 1st time then it comes on immediately.Insane concept, bad service - great that I'm out of SATS, the some crooks.

name: Simon
title: For mange mennesker
review: Sats Sydhavn aflyser holdtimer flere gange om ugen. Derudover er der generelt alt for mange mennesker, s√• der er meget tr√¶ngt i centeret. Tr√¶ner fremadrettet i Fisketorvet, hvor pladsen er bedre.
translated_review: Sats Sydhavn cancels team hours several times a week. In addition, there are generally too many people, so there is much crowded in the center. Trains forward in the Fisketorvet, where the square is better.

name: WS
title: Utrolig skuffende h√•ndtering af kunder.
review: Utrolig skuffende h√•ndtering af kunder.Jeg har erhvervet to kunder til SATS og derigennem f√•et gavekort til brug i SATS. Uden at have brugt disse gavekort viser det sig at de efter ingen tid er udl√∏bet. S√• nu st√•r jeg med to ubrugelige gavekort som tak for at have indhentet nye kunder til SATS. Falsk markedsf√∏ring, d√•rlig stil og generelt ikke en m√•de at behandle sine kunder p√•. Efter flere beskeder til deres kundeservice skriver jeg nu denne anmeldelse. Vil ikke anbefale SATS til folk efter denne oplevelse.
translated_review: I have acquired two customers for SATS and thus received vouchers for use in SATS. Without using these vouchers, it turns out that after no time has elapsed. So now I have two useless vouchers as thanks for obtaining new customers for SATS. Fake marketing, bad style and generally not a way to treat its customers. After several messages to their customer service I now write this review. I will not recommend SATS to people after this experience..

name: Simon Heide

name: Kristian Lildholdt
title: Venligt personale men lidt slidte omkl√¶dningsrum
review: Gode centre, med gode oplevelser fra man kommer ind ad d√∏ren; der bliver altid sagt ‚Äúhej!‚Äù og holdtr√¶nerne er venlige og im√∏dekommende.Jeg ville dig √∏nske at de var bedre til at finde erstatningstr√¶nere i stedt for at aflyse hold. Det er desv√¶rre et sket lidt ofte p√• det seneste - alt rimelighed er det blandt andetogs√• pga. corona.Jeg h√•ber ogs√• at omkl√¶dningsfaciliteterne vil blive rengjort lidt oftere, og at skabene var bedre vedligeholdt - de er ikke medlemsprisen v√¶rdige.Jeg tr√¶ner i Sydhavn, Valby og Vesterbro(har OK omkl√¶dning).
translated_review: Good centers, with good experiences from entering the door; it is always said hello!‚Ä¢ and the team trainers are friendly and welcoming.I wish they were better at finding replacement trainers instead to cancel teams.Unfortunately, this has happened a little often lately - all reasonable things are also due to corona.I also hope that the dressing facilities will be cleaned a little more often and that the cupboards were better maintained - they are not worthy of the membership price.I work out in South Harbour, Valby and Vesterbro(has OK changing).

name: Tomas Gorrissen

translated_review: Have faithfully paid under corona, got a gift certificate on a smaller part of my payment. Thought I'd give them some air before I cashed them. I shouldn't have done that. And at all mega call customer service

name: Rune
title: Efter 3 √•rs medlem
review: Efter 3 √•rs medlem, blev som kunde under hele corona, fik 2 gange et gavekort p√• 200kr , da jeg i dag gik der op med min datter for at k√∏be noget at drikke for mine gavekort, fik jeg besked p√• at gavekortene var annulleret p√• grund af corona var slut, d√•rligt center og service det samme.God dag derude
translated_review: After 3 years of membership, as a customer throughout Corona, I received a gift certificate of DKK 200, when today I went up with my daughter to buy something to drink for my gift cards, I was told that the gift cards were cancelled because of corona's end, bad center and service the same.

name: Sofie Rasch
title: Umuligt at afmelde nyhedsbreve
review: Jeg har nu af to omgange fors√∏gt at afmelde mig jeres nyhedsbreve - efter at jeg ikke l√¶ngere er medlem hos jer. Dels fungerer den del af jeres hjemmeside ikke, s√• man kan ikke selv afmelde. Herefter skev jeg en mail til jeres medlemsservice-mail og fik en bekr√¶ftigelse fra Patrick om, at jeg nu var afmeldt. Men jeg modtager stadig mails fra jer minimum 2 gange om ugen. Har nu igen skrevet til medlemsservice-mailen. translated_review: I have now tried to unsubscribe your newsletters for two rounds - after I am no longer a member of your website. On the one hand, that part of your website does not work, so you cannot unsubscribe yourself. After that, I made an email to your member service email and received a confirmation from Patrick that I was now unsubscribed. But I still receive emails from you at least 2 times a week. I have now again written to the member service email. Can it really be that such a small problem can't just be solved in such a large company'sIt seems like a joke.

name: malthe holbek
title: Normalt laver jeg aldrig en trustpilot
review: Normalt laver jeg aldrig en trustpilot, men desv√¶rre kan jeg ikke undg√• det denne her gang. Min k√¶reste og jeg skulle op og tr√¶ne, det der s√• sker er at min k√¶reste er blevet blokeret fra at kunne komme ind og tr√¶ne. Vi siger s√• til ‚ÄúAlexander‚Äù, hvad er problemet hvorfor kan vi ikke komme ind og tr√¶ne. (Sats Fisketorvet). Alexander oplyser os s√•, at min k√¶reste er blevet sendt til inkasso, p√• trods af vi intet brev eller anden form for information har f√•et om en manglende betaling, hun er tilmeldt betalingsservice s√• vi regner jo med det bare k√∏rer som det skal. Alexander fort√¶ller os at han ikke kan g√∏re noget derfra, hvor at en anden kvindelig medarbejder med en meget flabet adf√¶rd kommer uden at vide noget om sagen, og begynde at snakke nedg√∏rende til os. Da vi ringer til inkasso, lover de at ringe tilbage til os men vi har nu efter en UGE stadig intet h√∏rt. Det er da en m√¶rkelig m√•de at drive forretning p√•, at sende jeres kunder til inkasso uden nogen yderligere info, og n√•r man sp√∏rger ind til hvad vi skal g√∏re st√•r jeres medarbejdere som et stort sp√∏rgsm√•lstegn og snakker nedladende til en. Fy for‚Ä¶.
translated_review: Normally I never make a trust pilot, but unfortunately I can't avoid it this time. My girlfriend and I had to go up and train, what happens then is that my girlfriend has been blocked from being able to come in and train. We then tell Alexander, what's the problem why can't we come in and train. (Sats Fisketorvet). Alexander then informs us that my girlfriend has been sent to the debt collection, despite we no letter or other information has been given about a missing payment, she has signed up for paymentservice so we're counting on it just running as it should. Alexander tells us that he can't do anything from there, where another female employee with a very lame behavior comes without knowing anything about the case, and start talking demeaningly to us. When we call the debt collection, they promise to call us back but we have now after a WEEK still heard nothing. That's a strange way of doing business, sending your customers to debt collection without any further information, and when you ask what we are doingAll right, your employees stand as a big question mark and talk condescendingly to one.

name: Luna H. Knudsen

review: Jeg synes det er rigtig √¶rgerligt at i lukker s√• tidligt. Det er meget sv√¶rt at f√• det hele til at h√¶nge sammen, og f√• det bedste ud af sin tr√¶ning med de svage √•bningstider. Jeg ved ikke om jeres personale er nogle der vil drikke hjernen ud hver eneste weekend. Men i er n√∏dt til at hyre mere personale som kan bemande fredag, l√∏rdag og s√∏ndag aften.
translated_review: I think it's really a shame that you close so early. It's very difficult to get it all together, and make the best of your training with the weak opening hours. I don't know if your staff are going to drink your brains out every weekend. But you have to hire more staff to man Friday, Saturday and Sunday evening.

name: robert

review: Jeg er faktisk glad for center Frederikssund og medarbejder der ned men Sats f√•r en stjerne alligevel fordi hver gang mand melder ude eller s√¶tter medlemskab p√• pause g√•r det galt. Meldt ude November (har bevis p√• mail)  og de stadig sender giro og trusler at den er ikke betalt.

name: Nicola gozzi

translated_review: Called customer support with a problem, they said they would look at it 1 hour after it was done and I could spend my day constructively instead of having to write back and forth as you normally do in such cases Many thanks from here

name: Jonas Ibsen
title: Flere negative oplevelser
review: Min oplevelse af at have medlemsskab hos SATS har det seneste lange stykke tid v√¶ret negativ.Jeg oplever ofte at centeret i Fields er uhumsk og personalet ikke tager situationen ift. corona s√¶rlig seri√∏st, da flere af spritdispensere aldrig er fyldt op.Toiletterne flyder over med papir. Og her er det ligemeget om det er Fields eller Blox jeg bes√∏ger.Det virker absurd at man som medlem, hovedparten af gangene man bes√∏ger jeres centre skal st√• med denne oplevelse, n√•r der st√•r 3-4 medarbejdere bagved disken og I i forvejen ikke er landets billigste tr√¶ningstilbud. Normalt holder jeg igen ift. negative anmeldelser. Nu har jeg s√• forrige uge tilmeldt mig de tre Challenges som er at finde via. SATS appen.Pludselig opdager jeg at flere at mine registeret tr√¶ninger ikke er registreret i appen under disse challenges. Jeg henvender mig til personalet i Fields, s√∏ndag d. 16, som sender problemstillingen videre til kundeservice, som om mandagen via. chatfunktionen beder mig om at skrive en mail til kundeservice.Kundeservice kan intet g√∏re og beder mig om at henvende mig til personalet i et at centrene. Jeg synes de negative oplevelser har st√•et p√• for l√¶nge og h√•ber I vil tag denne kritik seri√∏st.Svar: 21/1-2022Hej Andy & co.Ift. l√∏sningen af registrering af ens tr√¶nings-scan under hver enkelt challenges, s√• er det egentlig blot s√• simpelt at afmelde sig og tilmelde sig igen. Dette var et l√∏sningsforslag jeg fik fra en kollega. Jeg synes derfor det er lidt tankev√¶kkende at ikke en I jeres system enten ikke er bekendt med denne simple l√∏sning eller har videreformidlet dette forslag videre.
translated_review: My experience of having a membership with SATS has been negative for a long time.I often find that the centre in Fields is ugly and the staff doesn't take the situation around. corona very seriously, as several of the alcohol dispensers are never filled up.The toilets flow over with paper.And here it doesn't matter whether it's Fields or Blox I visit.It seems absurd that as a member, most of the times you visit your centers, you have to stand with this experience when there are 3-4 employees behind the disk oI have now signed up for the three Challenges that are available via the. SATS app. Suddenly, I find that more of my registered trainings are not registered in the app during these challenges. I am addressing the staff in Fields on Sunday 16, which forwards the issue to customer service, as on Monday through the chat function asks me to write an email to customer service.CustomersI think the negative experiences have been going on for too long and hope you will take this criticism seriously.Answer: 21/1-2022Hello Andy & co.If you have the solution to register your training scan under each chalenges, it is really only so simple to unsubscribe and sign up again. This was a solution I received from a colleague. I therefore find it a little thought-provoking that not an In your system is either not familiar withthis simple solution or has passed on this proposal.

name: Jesper Zackariah Kure
title: Maskiner defekte

name: Claus Larsen

name: Kasper Niepoort

review: Jeg skulle melde mig selv ud af af sats men, det kan jeg √•benbart ikke f√• lov til f√•r intet at vide om hvorfor jeg ikke kan. Har kontaktet deres kundeservice flere gange til ingen hj√¶lp
translated_review: I was supposed to turn myself out of bet but, apparently, I can't be allowed to know why I can't. Have contacted their customer service several times for no help

name: Adam

review: Fantastisk fitness centre. Personalet er meget im√∏dekommende og g√∏r altid deres bedste for at hj√¶lpe. F√∏ler det kun er en selv der kan g√∏re noget forket.

name: Louis Kalles√∏e
title: Man kan ikke melde sig ud!!!
review: Man kan ikke melde sig ud!!!! Der gik op til flere m√•neder f√∏r jeg var ude! Og betalte alle de m√•neder hvor rigtig skulle ha v√¶ret ude af sats!SCAM SCAM SCAM!!!

name: Alfred
title: Desv√¶rre er der lang vej endnu
review: Skulle op og tr√¶ne her 1. juledag i centeret p√• Nyg√•rdsvej - de var s√• lukket selvom der intet stod i appen om √¶ndrede √•bningstider - udelukkende at der var god kapacitet og √•bent til kl. 20. Stik modsat til SATS egne k√¶rnev√¶rdier jf. 2020 √•rsrapporten.Simpelthen s√• √¶rgerligt hvordan tillid kan forsvinde fuldst√¶ndigt p√• et √∏jeblik. Selvf√∏lgelig er det dybt jammerligt at d√∏rmagneten til mandeomkl√¶dningen i deres center i Parken ikke har virket i de sidste 2-3 uger, at check-in terminalerne har v√¶ret nede hele december og at man kan have mere h√•b i at vinde eurojackpotten end at der er sprit i flaskerne (.. og at flaskerne virker) men det her var godt nok en nyt niveau af middelm√•dighed.Undskylder meget hvis jeg lyder gnaven - det er bare s√• synderligt skuffende n√•r man virkeligt pr√∏ver at have ja-hatten p√• og tillid i at de n√¶sten 5000 fuldtids√¶kvivalente der er i SATS nok skal l√∏fte opgaven. Jeg √∏nsker virkeligt en god oplevelse - jeg arbejder selv med kundeoplevelser og ved hvor sv√¶rt det kan v√¶re at l√¶se intentionerne bag s√•dan en anmeldelse.Men k√¶re SATS, hvis I virkeligt gerne vil transformere jeres forretning og positionere jer som f√∏rende i digitalisering s√• er I n√∏dsagede til at prioritere basale funktioner som √•bningstider i appen s√• man ikke m√• k√∏re skuffet hen til centeret og se at den reelle information h√¶nger p√• et A4. Jeg m√∏dte flere kunder der var kede af det fordi I netop har spildt deres allervigtigste aktiv - det eneste ikke genanvendelige her i livet - nemlig deres tid. Og den (manglende) tillid vinder man kun tilbage ved at ligge sig fladt ned, anerkende de markante svagheder og blive bedre - lidt ligesom n√•r man tr√¶ner hypertrofi :-).
translated_review: Should go up and train here on Christmas Day at the center at Nyg√•rdsvej - they were so closed even though there was nothing in the app about changed opening hours - only that there was good capacity and open until 20. Stick opposite to SATS own carnage values cf. the 2020 annual report.Simply how confidence can disappear completely in an instant. Of course, it is deeply regrettable that the door magnet for the men's changing at their center in the Park has not worked in the last 2-3 weeks that the check-in terminals have been down wholeI really want a good experience - I'm working with customer experiences and know how hard it can be to read in December and that you can have more hope in winning the Eurojackpot than that there is alcohol in the bottles (... and that the bottles work) but this was a new level of mediocrity.Apologies a lot if I sound grumpy - it's just very disappointing when you really try to wear the yes-hat and trust that the almost 5,000 full-time equivalent in SATS will do the job. I really want a good experience - I work with customer experiences and know how hard it can be to read inBut dear SATS, if you really want to transform your business and position yourself as a leader in digitalization, you have to prioritize basic functions such as opening hours in the app so you can't drive disappointed to the center and see that the real information hangs on an A4. I met several customers who were upset because you have just wasted their most important asset - the only thing not reusable in life - for their time. And the (missing) tillid only wins back by lying flat, recognizing the marked weaknesses and getting better - a bit like training hypertrophy:-).

translated_review: Dear Sats, I really need help to solve a gothic knot between my center manager and my team instructor.It is the case that in Taastrup, before decommissioning, there were core, dance aerobic and body flow in continuation of each other Monday and Wednesday morning.Which I have used and gained lots of energy, power and joy.Now here after shutdown, the center manager, without mentioning it to the instructor and practitioners, has taken body flow of the program. This means that our instructor must take other place toso now the teams, 6 in total, Monday and Wednesday, have been reduced to 2 teams on Wednesdays. The director, who has also had regular and loyal practitioners in SATS for many years, will continue to train us both Monday and Wednesday, starting from today, provided that there is at least body flow on the program. This will not happen until 22 August according to the center leader. On 22 August, our faithfuland loyal instructor highly likely found another place to be instructor.So, because I know that it has been possible before, and because it is important for me, my own health and joy, I reach out to you in this untraditional way, have not been able to find either mail or phone number to the head office, for intrusively pray that you can help solve this knot between center manager and instructor so that we customers of SATS can enjoy being allowed to train again. The alternative for me isto find another place to train, among other things because there are + 20 on the waiting list on other teams.This does not require what SATS must be set in the world to offer training for your members.I look forward to hearing from you, asap, so that I can again start training up to at least 6 times a week.If not with you, then somewhere else.Center Leader in T√•strup has my contact information.Summer greetings from a hopeful member

Do not believe your eyes: if your SATS account says your subscription is paused, it may actually be different. 3. Big issues with invoices. SATS doesn't know what it is at all. It's enough for them to send you a charge in the payment service, and you should believe them, what are you paying for this time. 4. Inkasso. No one is insured against getting an debt collection, and there is no salvation.I haven't got no invoice, no reminder, no debt warningand the BAMS collection case. ‚Ä¢ Technical errors ‚Ä¢ As SATS has profit from these errors ‚Ä¢ It's funny. Dear SATS, please pay for your mistakes.There is no point in going to court to get 1000 DKK back. This counts SATS with. I no longer have the receipt for the resignation because one trusts that the employee has done his job. On my rate profile it stands as inactive August. I can't insert link so google it: consumer ombudsman. dk/what is/frequently-spoken-questions/movers-and-inkasso

Kort historie:Jeg melder mig ud i maj m√•ned, da jeg grundet Corona m.m. Ikke kan bruge centeret (h√∏rer dog intet fra dem) f√•r f√∏rst en mail fra dem slut juni om at mit medlemskab er oph√∏rt. name: Ahmed

review: Dette er en kopi fra email send den 24/8-2020. Har stadig ikke modtaget svar. Eller evt bede dem om at g√•, ligesom med mig. Til dette svare hun "at jeg skal overholde reglerne" da jeg sp√∏rger efter den √∏verste leder svare hun at det er hende selv. Mens vi diskutere kommer hendes kollega og s√• √¶ndre tonen sig og hendes svar bliver nu til at der findes en leder over hende. Men hun vil ikke udlevere navn eller kontakt oplysninger p√• personen. Mens jeg st√•r og udfylder min opsigelse kommer der 7 mennesker ind, og hun sp√∏rger kun 1 af de ud af de 7 om de har h√•ndkl√¶de med. Stadig til trods for at der er mange i centeret som ikke benytter h√•ndkl√¶der i samme tidspunkt. F√∏ler mig diskrimineret og uretf√¶rdigt behandlet. Synes ikke dette kan v√¶re rigtigt.Har t√¶nk mig at lave en anmeldes af forl√∏bet p√• trustpilot s√•fremt jeg ikke h√∏re fra jer.
translated_review: This is a copy from email send on 24/8-2020. Has still not received an answer. Maybe there will be the answer here: Hello SATS.I hereby submit a complaint against an employee in SATS in Glostrup "Christine" The case As I enter and scan my phone I am asked if I have a towel with. To this I reply no. Christine insists that I have to buy one or toy home after that. I point out that more in the training center do not use towels and that if she would force me to buy one she mustor possibly ask them to go, as with me. To this she answers "that I must abide by the rules" when I ask for the chief leader she answers that it is herself. As we discuss comes her colleague and then change the tone and her answer becomes that there is a leader over her. But she will not provide the name or contact information on the person. While I am filling in my resignation 7 people come in, and she asks only 1 out of the 7 about the hStill in spite of the fact that there are many people in the center who do not use towels at the same time. Feel discriminated against and unfairly treated. Don't think this can be right.Imagine making a report of the course on trustpilot if I don't hear from you.

review: ‚ÄúSats H√∏rsholm‚ÄùFint center med god plads i kardioomr√•det. Kan v√¶ret overfyldt i tr√¶ningsomr√•det i primetime. God beliggenhed, og frisk luft omkring centeret. Dog et lille omkl√¶dningsrum.

name: c.√∏
title: Aldrig oplevet et s√• elendigt firma
review: Aldrig oplevet et s√• elendigt firma. Det kan godt v√¶re de tror, at fordi de har 'l√¶kre' faciliteter (hvilket de ikke har), at s√• kan man have Danmarks d√•rligste kundeservice.Er stadig i chok over deres behandling af kunder under corona!
translated_review: Never experienced such a miserable company. It may well be they think that because they have 'hot' facilities (which they do not have), you can have Denmark's worst customer service.Are still in shock at their treatment of customers under corona!

review: Gode faciliteter og god service hos personalet. Jeg har desuden flere gange gjort brug af personlig tr√¶ner og har synes det var alletiders. S√• jeg er godt tilfreds med SATS Amager.

review: De stj√¶ler fra deres medlemmer og n√¶gter at lade dem udmelde sig
translated_review: They steal from their members and refuse to allow them to resign

name: Lone Jensen
title: Jeg tr√¶ner flere gange ugentlig p√•‚Ä¶
review: Jeg tr√¶ner flere gange ugentlig p√• flere forskellige hold og i maskiner. Jeg er super tilfreds. Instrukt√∏rerne er arrangeret og velforberedte. Personlig tr√¶ner har hjulpet mig med at f√• en perfekt start.
translated_review: I train several times a week on several different teams and in machines. I am super satisfied. The instructors are arranged and well prepared. Personal trainer has helped me get a perfect start.

name: Jeppe
title: Hold jer langt v√¶k fra Sats
review: Hold jer langt v√¶k fra Sats! Jeg har tidligere tr√¶net inde i vogterhuset i Odense mens Sats ejede det. Siden hen har Sats solgt centeret til Fitness 1 og p√• ingen m√•de givet mig mulighed for at f√•r de penge som jeg havde st√•ende p√• min fitnesskonto. Ydermere bliver de ved med at tr√¶kke penge fra min konto selvom jeg er blevet overdraget til fitness 1. Dette har gjort at jeg har blokkerede for alle betalinger til dem. Nu er jeg s√• begyndt at modtage rykkere for et medlemskab jeg ikke har. Det er det rene tyveri og jeg h√•ber der er nogle der har modet samt midlerne til hive sats i retten. Det er jo det rene tyveri. Der helt sikkert massere af tidligere medlemmer som endnu ikke har opdaget, at sats stadigv√¶k tr√¶kker penge fra deres konto og jeg vil anbefale dem at f√• tjekket op p√• det med det samme!
translated_review: Stay far away from Sats! I have previously trained inside the Guardian House in Odense while Sats owned it. Since then, Sats has sold the center to Fitness 1 and in no way allowed me to get the money that I had standing on my fitness account. Furthermore, they keep pulling money from my account even though I have been transferred to fitness 1. This has made me block all payments to them. Now I'm starting to receive reminders for a membership I don't have. It's just a thief.eri and I hope there are some who have the courage as well as the means of pulling the rate into court. It's pure theft. There certainly plenty of former members who have not yet discovered that the rate still withdraws money from their account and I would recommend them to get checked up on it immediately!

name: THOMAS
title: Find et andet fitness center !!!
review: Jeg har v√¶ret medlem af FitnessDK siden de for knap 20 √•r siden √•bnede og senere blev overtaget af SATS. Jeg er selvst√¶ndig og har derfor kunnet lade min virksomhed betale for mit abonnement. Grundet skader har jeg i flere omgange m√•tte s√¶tte mit abonnement i bero hvilket blev meddelt til afdelingen p√• Ros Torv.Via bankafstemning i min virksomhed opdager jeg s√• at de alligevel har trukket penge hver eneste m√•ned for det fulde abonnement som de ovenik√∏bet havde h√¶vet ca 30% i pris s√• det var blevet meget dyrere - uden nogen form for oplysning til mig p√• noget tidspunkt !!!  En arrogant og iskold kundeservice vil ikke refundere de 7 m√•neder de trak for fordi jeg ikke skriftligt kunne bevise at jeg havde henvendt mig p√• Ros Torv i Roskilde. Tiden g√•r og FitnessDK bliver til SATS og i P√•sken 2019 har de gratis tr√¶ning. Dog skulle det registreres p√• ens navn og ekspedienten p√• Ros Torv fort√¶ller mig at der stod kr 541 i godskrivning p√• min konto.Ok t√¶nker jeg. Kan du ikke bare udbetale det ? Nej det kunne hun ikke. Jeg tr√¶ner 2 gange og kommer desv√¶rre ikke rigtig igang og tilbage igen.I november 2019 opdager jeg s√• at de er begyndt at tr√¶kke penge for mit abonnement igen fra min virksomhedskonto. Og havde gjort det 5 gange siden p√•sken.Dvs de bare havde brugt mine gamle oplysninger uden mit samtykke og tilmeldt betalingsservice p√•ny.Jeg bliver rasende og ringer til deres ikke eksisterende kundeservice og beder dem refundere alt det de har trukket.De kunne godt se jeg slet ikke havde v√¶ret i tr√¶ningscenteret en eneste gang. Men det ville de ikke.S√• i stedet gik jeg i netbanken og slettede betalingsservice aftalen.Dette resulterede s√• I af jeg i februar 2020 begyndte at f√• rykkere for mit abonnement som jeg havde opsagt.Jeg protesterede selvf√∏lgelig men denne gang skriftligt. Her blev jeg igen m√∏dt af en utrolig arrogant og fuldst√¶ndig ligeglad medarbejder som overhovedet ikke gad s√¶tte sig ind i deres urimelige og gr√•dige behandling. Men han skriver dog han vil udmelde mig pr 31/3-2020Jeg protesterer igen og udtrykker at jeg forl√¶ngst har udmeldt mig og de skal betale mig penge retur for de mange m√•neder de uberettiget har trukket for, hvortil svaret var "jeg har sagt hvad der skulle siges".. ingen forst√•else what so ever.N√• men tiden g√•r s√•..... Min store s√∏n p√• 17 √•r vil gerne starte op med tr√¶ning og v√¶lger SATS fordi hans venner ogs√• tr√¶ner der. Men da han er 17√•r gammel fort√¶ller de at de ikke kan f√• lov at tilmelde hans konto til betalingsservice uden for√¶ldres konto da han er under 18 √•r.S√• vi tog sammen derud ig√•r 20/8-2020.Det hele tastes ind og jeg oplyser denne gang min private bank konto til brug for betalingsservice aftalen. Men pludselig siger ekspedienten at det kunne de ikke alligevel fordi der stod en restance p√• min konto p√• ca kr 1350 mener jeg det var.Jeg bliver m√•ll√∏s og ogs√• samtidig meget gal over at skulle st√• i den situation over for min s√∏n.Selvf√∏lgelig ville jeg ikke betale de penge som jeg ikke skylder, og der var ingen mulighed for flexibilitet selv om min s√∏n intet har med min sag at g√∏re. Det hele ender med at vi m√• g√• vores vej igen og min s√∏ns mor m√• s√• tage sig af det i stedet.Jeg er s√• frustreret over deres d√•rlige behandling af mig at jeg nu overvejer at politianmelde dem for uberettiget at have trukket penge i √•revis fra min virksomhedskonto.Overvejer ogs√• forbrugerklagen√¶vnet men da den oprindelige aftale var oprettet som en virksomhedsordning i dav√¶rende FitnessDK er der nok ikke de store chancer for at de vil tage sagen, da styrelsen jo kun er for private forbrugere Jeg har et k√¶mpe netv√¶rk og har delt min oplevelse via flere sociale medier og kan bestemt ikke anbefale at tr√¶ne hos dem grundet deres kundeservice som ikke er eksisterende og deres gr√•dige politik med total mangel p√• forst√•else.
translated_review: I have been a member of the FitnessDK since they opened almost 20 years ago and later were taken over by SATS. I am self-employed and have therefore been able to pay my subscription for my company. For several times I have had to suspend my subscription, which was announced to the Ros Torv department.Via bank vote in my company I find that they have nevertheless withdrawn money every month for the full subscription they had even raised about 30% in price so it had become very expensiveAn arrogant and ice-cold customer service will not refund the 7 months they withdrew for because I could not prove in writing that I had approached Ros Torv in Roskilde. Time and FitnessDK turn into SATS and in Easter 2019 they have free training. However, it had to be registered on one's name and the clerk at Ros Torv tells me that there was DKK 541 in credit in my account.Ok I think. Can't you just pay it out? No, she couldn't?I train twice and unfortunately don't really start and come back again.In November 2019 I discover that they have started to withdraw money for my subscription again from my company account.And had done so 5 times since Easter.Since they had just used my old information without my consent and signed up for payment service again, I get furious and call their non-existing customer service and ask them to refund everything they've drawn.They could see I hadn't been at the gym at all an enesBut they didn't want to.So instead I went to the netbank and deleted the payment service agreement.So in February 2020 you began to get reminders for my subscription as I had quit.I protested of course but this time in writing. Here again I was met by an incredibly arrogant and completely indifferent employee who didn't want to get into their unreasonable and greedy treatment at all.But he writes however he will sign me out at 31/3-2020I protest again and expressthat I have long since signed up and they have to pay me back money for the many months they have wrongly drawn for, to which the answer was "I have said what should be said"... no understanding what so ever.Well, time goes by so.... My big 17-year-old son would like to start training and choose SATS because his friends also train there.But since he is 17 years old they tell them that they can't register his account for payment service without parents' account when he is under 18 years old.The year 20/8-2020.It all entered and I inform my private bank account this time for use in the payment service agreement. But suddenly the clerk says they couldn't anyway because there was a arrears in my account of about kr 1350 I think it was.I get speechless and also very mad at having to face my son in that situation.Of course I wouldn't pay the money that I don't owe, and there was no possibility of flexibility even if my son had nothing to do with my case.I'm so frustrated by their bad treatment of me that I'm now thinking of police reporting them for unfairly withdrawing money for years from my business account.Also considering the Consumer Complaints Board, but since the original agreement was set up as a company arrangement in the then FitnessDK, there are probably not many chances that they will take the case, since the Board is only for private consumers I have a huge none piece and has shared my experience through several social media and certainly cannot recommend training with them due to their customer service which is not existing and their greedy policy with total lack of understanding.

name: Sine

name: mathias

review: Hold da k√¶ft... Det sejler jo inde hos dem. D. 29/03-2019 Fik jeg en bekr√¶ftelses mail som f√∏lgende: "Hej MathiasAlt er betalt, jeg bekr√¶fter at du ikke har noget udest√•ende til Sats l√¶ngere.Hav en god weekend.Med venlig hilsenDiana"P√• trods af dette, har jeg i dag modtaget et rykkerbrev i postkassen fra Inkasso firmaet "Intrum" som mener at jeg skylder dem over 2000 kr i forbindelse med resg√¶ld fra Sats, samt at de truer mig med retsag. Sikke en m√•de at drive en virksomhed. Lige til at lukke op og skide i.
translated_review: Holy shit... It sails inside them. On 29/03-2019 I got a confirmation email like the following: "Hi MathiasAlt has been paid, I confirm that you have no outstanding claim to Sats anymore.Have a good weekend.Diana"Despite this, today I have received a reminder from the collection company "Indrum" which believes that I owe them over 2,000 kroner in relation to the debt from Sats, and that they threaten me with justice. What a way to run a business. Just to shut up and shit in.

name: Simone

review: ELENDIG oplevelse med SATS!Jeg tilmelder mig da de tilbyder 2 m√•neders gratis tr√¶ning + oprettelseDa vi tager der op en gruppe mennesker f√•r vi afvide der er INGEN binding! selv p√• min private profil st√•r der ingen binding!Nu st√•r jeg idag alligevel med en regning der skal betales, trods vi alle fik afvide at der ingen binding var. (Vi har alle modtaget en regning der skal betales!)Deres medlems kundeservice er lukket og det har den v√¶ret lige siden Juni f√∏rste gang jeg meldte mig ind.Jeg har fors√∏gt at sende e-mail ind og der er lange ventetider. P√• min e-mail fik jeg afvide et andet bel√∏b der skulle betales end det bel√∏b jeg har f√•et p√• mit brev!Jeg har ingen jeg kan ringe og klage til og ingen der kan kigge der tager sig rigtigt af min sag og hj√¶lper med en l√∏sning!!!Der er ikke styr p√• noget!Man sender emails men ikke alle ens sp√∏rgsm√•l bliver ikke besvaret!Den d√•rligeste oplevelse jeg har haft med et firma!HOLD JER V√ÜK FRA SATS!!!
translated_review: I enroll as they offer 2 months free training + creationWhen we take up a group of people we get no binding! Even on my private profile there is no binding!Now I stand with a bill to be paid anyway, despite all of us knowing that there was no binding. On my e-mail I got a different amount to be paid than the amount I have received on my letter!I have no one I can call and complain to and no one who can look who takes proper care of my case and helps with a solution!!!There is no control!You send emails but not all of your questions are not answered!The worst experience I have had with a company!HOLD YOU WAY FROM SATS!!!

translated_review: Worst customer service in the industry.Cheats and steals customers' money to survive. Pathetic way to run a company.

name: Joachim Birkelund

review: Top service n√•r jeg rammer SATS H√∏rsholm, Kim som er assisterende manager her g√∏r sit arbejde til ug. Han g√∏r en forskel og er grunden til man kommer igen.

Igennem de mange √•r har jeg pr√∏vet jeres kundeservice i forskellige centre mange gange, og jeg er n√∏d til at sige at jeres nuv√¶rende bemanding i Gentofte (is√¶r Emil og Daniel), er det mest smilende og glade jeg nogensinde har m√∏dt! translated_review: Sats Roskilde...Have their been a faithful customer for many years, but their arrogant persoMale I've had enough of!.. KUNDESERVICE VENTETID 4UGERJeg klager p√• fridag.
translated_review: 2 hours Risskov YEARHUS Fittness1 Vericenter on 26/7 due to FORMER SATS CONCERT membership transferred from SATS to Fitness1 (without consent what is quite another company and CVR NR) Forced middleship inherited from SATS.. BETALT 199.DKK then could terminate Fitness1 to date 30.08.2020. Ifg. FITNESS1 my middleship continues in SATS BUYENHAVN AND I BORE IN YEARHOUSE (disclosure in March 2020!!).I call and SATS customer see no answer (42 min in line and no queue number).. COULDDEERVICE VENTETID 4UGERI complain on the day off..

name: Niels Kibshede
title: M√¶rkelig regning
review: Hvad er det dog for en m√•de at behandle sine trofaste kunder p√• ?SATS sender sender mig et indbetalingskort/ faktura p√• den sk√¶ve bel√∏b 180,46 kr til betaling 03.08.2020.Eneste oplysning p√• faktura er citat:"Du kan se specifikationen for din opkr√¶vning p√• sats.com. G√• ind under "mine sider" og klik p√• "mine indstillinger" for at finde din faktura."1) Hvad er lige grunden til at sats ikke p√• denne trykte faktura kan oplyse om grunden til fakturaen og hvad den opkr√¶ver for?2) N√•r man s√• bruger tid p√• at logge p√• for at finde sin faktura...s√• findes den ikke. Der er kun en rubrik som hedder kvitteringer. S√• n√•r du har betalt din faktura kan du senere se hvad d√¶len du har betalt for. 3) Det m√¶rkeligste er at jeg p√• min f√∏rste tr√¶ningsdag efter gen√•bning var ved kassen og betalte det s√¶dvanlige m√•nedlige bel√∏b (som jeg nu har gjort i samfulde 8 √•r jeg har v√¶ret medlem i Fitness.dk som nu desv√¶rre hedder Sats)En betaling som jeg/man heller ikke kan se i "mine sider".Hvorfor skal det v√¶re s√• sv√¶rt ?
translated_review: What kind of a way to process your trusted customers?SATS sends me a deposit card/invoice on the crooked amount of DKK 180.46 for payment 03.08.2020.One thing on invoice is quote:"You can see the specification for your charge on rate.com. Go under "my pages" and click "my settings" to find your invoice."1) What is the reason why you cannot bet on this printed invoice to indicate the reason for the invoice and what it collects for?2) When you spend time loggingThere is only one box called receipts. So once you have paid your invoice you can later see what the hell you paid for. 3) The strangest thing is that on my first training day after reopening I was at the checkout and paid the usual monthly amount (as I have now done in the same 8 years I have been a member of Fitness.dk as now sadly called Sats)A payment that I/man can't see in "my pages" either.Why should it be so difficult?

name: Jonas
title: Forf√¶rdeligt
review: Forf√¶rdeligt! fik lovet mine penge tilbage som de fejlagtigt trak i marts, april og maj. ville f√• dem tilbage i starten af juni og det er sen juli nu. Forf√¶rdelig kundeservice og kujonisk.
translated_review: Terrible! was promised my money back which they mistakenly withdrew in March, April and May. would get them back in early June and it is late July now. Terrible customer service and cowardly.

name: Christian
title: Kundeservice eller mafia
review: 8 December 2019 er jeg i SATS Frederiksberg da jeg har besluttet at opsige mit medlemskab efter 8 √•r. Ekspedienten der har vagten den p√•g√¶ldende dag fort√¶ller, at jeg ikke beh√∏ver at melde mig ud da jeg jo bare kan ‚Äùs√¶tte mit medlemskab p√• standby og selv aktivere det n√•r jeg igen √∏nsker at tr√¶ne i centeret‚Äù. Min betaling for den resterende del af December ville blive godtgjort n√•r jeg igen √∏nskede at v√¶re aktiv. Jeg syntes det l√∏d som et udm√¶rket forslag og vi aftalte at det blot blev sat i bero. Til min store overraskelse modtager jeg et girokort ultimo juni 2020 for betaling af medlemskab Juni.  Jeg ringer efterf√∏lgende til centeret og meddeler, at jeg ikke kan acceptere betalingen da jeg jo ikke har aktiveret mit abonnement p√• ny og heller ikke v√¶ret til tr√¶ning siden December 2019. Medarbejderen meddelte at de j√¶vnf√∏r deres nye forretningsbetingelser have aktiveret alle medlemmer pr 1/5 2020. Alle havde modtaget denne information og jeg havde kun mulighed for at s√¶tte abonnement i bero et begr√¶nset antal m√•neder, hvilket ogs√• fremgik af deres nye medlemsbetingelser. Han meddeler desuden at jeg skal foretage udmeldingen via deres hjemme side og at jeg ogs√• skal betale for Juni m√•ned. P√• hjemmesiden skal man for at kunne gennemf√∏re udmelding undervejs f√∏rst godkende deres nye forretningsbetingelser‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. Ugen efter min telefonsamtale henvender jeg mig igen i Sats Frederiksberg i h√•bet om at f√• en afklaring p√• deres alternative forretningsmetoder, der mest af alt minder om mafia. Jeg taler med Centerlederen der vil se hvad han kan g√∏re og dern√¶st kontante mig telefonisk n√•r han har talt med deres hovedkontor. Han meddelere mig ved samme lejlighed at der kan g√• op til fire uger da de har mange henvendelser‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.Det er n√¶sten fire uger siden jeg var i kontakt med Sats og I dag D 21/7 modtager jeg et rykkerbrev fra Sats med gebyr plus betaling af Juni m√•ned !Brevet er i √∏vrigt sendt som noreply. Har du lyst til at v√¶re den n√¶ste ?
translated_review: 8 December 2019 I am in SATS Frederiksberg as I have decided to terminate my membership after 8 years. The clerk who is on the shift on that day tells me that I don't have to resign because I can just put my membership on standby and activate it myself when I again want to train in the center. My payment for the remainder of December would be reimbursed when I wanted to be active again. I thought it sounded like an excellent proposal and we agreed that it was simply suspended. To my sI am surprised to receive a giro card by the end of June 2020 for payment of membership June. I subsequently call the center and announce that I cannot accept the payment because I haven't re-enabled my subscription and haven't been to training since December 2019. The employee announced that they had activated all members by 1/5 2020 in line with their new terms of business. Everyone had received this information and I had only the opportunity to suspend a limited number of subscriptions.In addition, he informs me that I have to make the announcement via their home page and that I also have to pay for the month of June. In order to complete the announcement along the way, you must first approve their new business conditions...... The week after my phone conversation I turn to Sats Frederiksberg again in the hope of getting clarification of their alternative business methods, most of all similar to the Mafia.will see what he can do and then cash me by phone after he has talked to their headquarters. He informs me on the same occasion that it can take up to four weeks as they have many inquiries......It's almost four weeks since I was in contact with Sats and Today D 21/7 I receive a reminder from Sats with fee plus payment of the June month!The letter has also been sent as noreply. Do you want to be next?

name: Pernille Neuschwang
title: Umuligt at melde sig ud!
review: Har fors√∏gt at melde mig ud siden 1/4, men h√∏rer intet fra deres medlemsservice! Ej heller nogen hj√¶lp at hente i sit lokale center! Men opkr√¶vninger og rykkere det har de tid til! Magen til uprofessionelt firma skal man lede l√¶nge efter...f√∏j!!!
translated_review: Has tried to report me out since 1/4, but hears nothing from their member service! Nor any help to pick up from your local center! But they have time for collections and reminders! Just like unprofessional company you have to look for long after...add!!!

name: Leyla Mohammad
title: Hold dig v√¶k fra Sats!!!
review: De snyder med at sige at ens medlemskab er stoppet og de suger penge fra en. Deres kundeservice i deres fysisk butik i valby er s√• skidt. Der er tale om racisme og forskelsbehandling. Alle andre dansker bliver behandlede en del bedre end jeg. Jeg er s√• skuffet over den d√•rlige oplevelse. Jeg har f√•et s√• mange af venner til at blive tilmeldt. Og det fortryder jeg st√¶rkt..Jeg klager over dem meget snart da de har taget mange penge fra mig og n√¶gter at betale mig.  S√• g√∏r dig en tjeneste og ikke bliv tilmeldt hos s√•dan nogen snyder!!!
translated_review: They cheat on saying that one's membership has stopped and they suck money from one. Their customer service in their physical store in valby is so bad. It's racism and discrimination. All other Danes are treated a lot better than I. I'm so disappointed in the bad experience. I've got so many of friends to sign up. And I very much regret that. I complain about them very soon as they have taken away a lot of money and refuse to pay me. So do you a favor and don't get registered.With someone like that cheating!!!

name: Michael Helmersen
title: Forskellige strategier - forskellige center og forskellige maskiner
review: i forhold til prisen og s√• m√∏der man deres cykelsal....Forskellige cykler og de k√∏rer IKKE samme koncept. I det ene center er der en slags maskiner i det andet en helt anden slags. Deres instrukt√∏r m√• v√¶re instrukt√∏r andre steder og sidder og reklamer med at "kom herover - her er det meget bedre!!"Ogs√• personale - deres l√∏nninger er ikke s√¶rlig h√∏je dette g√∏r der er uskiftning HELE tiden !!
translated_review: in relation to the price and then you meet their bike hall...Different bikes and they don't run the same concept. In one center there is a kind of machine in another quite different kind. Their instructor must be an instructor elsewhere and sit and advertise that "come over here - here it's much better!!" Also staff - their salaries are not very high this makes there is unchanging ALL the time!!

name: Maria Skovl√∏ber
title: Ikke brug Sats!
review: Da der var Corona nedlukning, har de ikke sat ens betaling p√• pause, og man har betalt omkring 250 i m√•neden i n√¶sten 3 m√•neder og det eneste man f√•r tilbage er 200 kroner som kan bruges p√• mad og drikke i deres butik, men hvad hj√¶lper det n√•r de nu har solgt deres centre til Esbjerg til fitness one. You can't call them and they don't answer their emails.

name: karsten henriksen
title: SATS Taastrup
review: SATS Taastrup Et stort center med k√¶mpe potentiale hvis man fornyer lidt som flere andre SATS centre har gjort. men man f√∏ler sig velkommen og i gode h√¶nder fra start til slut. Jeg har f√∏r tr√¶net i Fitness World men har meldte mig ud og fulgte efter Centerleder Kasper som var i mit gamle center men som nu er i Taastrup og m√• indr√∏mme at jeg er kun positiv indtil videre over de nye rammer Tak til jer
translated_review: SATS Taastrup A great center with huge potential if you renew a little like several other SATS centres have done. But you feel welcome and in good hands from start to finish. I have previously trained in Fitness World but have joined Center leader Kasper who was in my old center but who is now in Taastrup and must admit that I am only positive so far over the new frameworks Thank you to you

name: Anne
title: Jeg har fuldkommen den samme‚Ä¶
review: Jeg har fuldkommen den samme opfattelse. Pr√∏vede i marts at melde mig ud, melder var lukket. April trak de fuld pris for medlemskab, det er aldrig blevet betalt tilbage, og stadig umuligt at melde sig ud. Endelig i juni kunne jeg f√• kontakt, men kunne kun melde mig ud ved at accepter betingelserne, som ikke kunne √•bnes og l√¶ses, s√• det turde jeg ikke. S√• skriver jeg og dirigeres om til Norge!!!  Men stadig ingen accept p√• udmeldelse. Girokort p√• betaling af juli, selvom jeg havde betalt fuld pris for april, s√• jeg kunne kun melde mig ud ved at betale 2 m√•neders kontingent. Den eneste respons fra Sats er en masse mail om jeg ikke har fortrudt, ikke et ord om dobbelt betaling for udmeldelse, s√• der t√∏r jeg ikke blive medlem igen.
translated_review: I have quite the same view. Attempted in March to resign, reporter was closed. April withdrew the full price for membership, it has never been paid back, and still impossible to withdraw. Finally in June I could get in touch, but could only sign out by accepting the conditions which could not be opened and read, so I dared not. Then I write and directed about to Norway!!! But still no acceptance of resignation. Girokort on payment of July, although I had paid full price for April,so I could only resign by paying 2 months' fee. The only response from Sats is a lot of mail if I haven't regretted, not a word about double payment for resignation, so I don't dare join again.

name: Nanna Bj√∂rk Barkard√≥ttir
title: Super d√•rlig kundeservice
review: Super d√•rlig kundeservice. Deres telefoner virker ikke og de siger at de har to ugers ventetid p√• mail. Udover det er det n√¶rmest umuligt at sige op hos dem. Jeg har i hvert fald oplevet mere b√∏vl en gl√¶de under mit medlemskab hos dem s√• jeg har valgt at skift. Ikke en s√¶rlig god oplevelse herfra og priserne heller ikke de bedste.
translated_review: Super bad customer service. Their phones don't work and they say that they have two weeks of waiting for mail. Besides it's almost impossible to quit with them. I have at least experienced more trouble a joy during my membership with them so I have chosen to change. Not a very good experience from here and prices also not the best.

name: Simone
title: G√Ö LANGT UDEN OM SATS
review: Jeg har fors√∏gt at opsige mit medlemskab samtlige gange igennem jeres link! Jeg f√•r ikke lov til at afslutte trin 2 s√• jeg kan gennemf√∏re n√¶ste trin for registrering af opsigelsen og dermed f√• min bekr√¶ftelse p√• min opsigelse.Jeg har v√¶ret kunde i 8 √•r.
