This is some mess and cons!!I look forward to getting confirmation that you have received my resignation from today's date 13.07.2020!!!!

name: Anne
title: D√•rlig kundeservice, snavset center
review: Min oplevelse er, at SATS er glade for dine penge, og at de sparer p√• reng√∏ringen, selv i mit s√•kaldte premium-center. Det v√¶rste for mig var, da jeg var havnet i udlandet, og derfor ikke kunne bruge centeret i en periode. Jeg fors√∏gte at melde ferie p√• forskellig vis, men det lod sig ikke g√∏re. App'en virkede ikke, hjemmesiden virkede ikke, og kundeservice-medarbejderen kunne ikke f√• det til at virke - men bad mig "g√• ned i centeret og melde ferie". Jeg oplyste, at jeg jo var rejst til Norge i starten af m√•neden og ville ikke at komme hjem til Danmark, f√∏r et par uger hen i m√•neden efter - og det var derfor en ekstraordin√¶r situation, og jeg havde brug for deres hj√¶lp til at lave pause i mit abonnement, n√•r jeg nu ikke kunne f√• det til at fungere online. Jeg bad dem ydmygt om, at hj√¶lpe mig i denne situation, og til sidst var der en kundeservicemedarbejder, der sagde, at han nok skulle skrive det ind i deres system. Det gjorde han s√• bare ikke. Jeg fik lov at betale for hele perioden, fik flere gange talt med kundeservicemedarbejdere uden pli, der n√¶rmest beskyldte mig for at lyve. Det er ikke en kundeorienteret organisation, men det modsatte. Dog virkede de personlige tr√¶nere ofte til at v√¶re b√•de dygtige og motiverede.Mht. reng√∏ringen af centeret: er glad for at jeg ikke skal g√• der nu, hvor der er corona-tider. F√∏r corona var der det samme snavs p√• maskinerne dag efter dag. Jeg f√∏lte nogen gange, at det var mig der gjorde dem mest rent. Det virkede som om, at de aldrig gjorde rent ind i revner og spr√¶kker, hvor der kunne samle sig snavs og st√∏v, men kun t√∏rrede maskinernes overflader af. Mange medlemmer t√∏rrede ikke maskinerne af efter brug, og der var ingen konsekvens eller h√∏flige henstillinger fra medarbejdernes side. Det virkede ikke til, at nogen tog s√¶rligt ansvar for noget.
translated_review: My experience is that SATS is fond of your money and that they save on cleaning, even in my so-called premium centre. The worst thing for me was when I got abroad and therefore could not use the center for a period of time. I tried to report holidays in different ways, but it wasn't possible. The app didn't work, the website didn't work, and the customer service employee couldn't make it work - but asked me to "go down to the center and report vacation."I asked them humbly to help me in this situation, and finally there was a customer service officer who said that he would probably write it into their system. He just didn't. I was allowed to pay for the whole period, got several times spoken meIt is not a customer-oriented organization, but the opposite. However, the personal trainers often seemed to be both skilled and motivated.As far as cleaning the center is concerned, I am glad that I should not go there now when there are corona times. Before corona there was the same dirt on the machines day after day. I sometimes felt that I was the one who made them the most clean. It seemed like they never cleaned up cracks and cracks,which could collect dirt and dust, but only wiped off the surfaces of the machines. Many members did not wipe off the machines after use, and there was no consequence or polite recommendations on the part of the employees. It did not seem that anyone took special responsibility for anything.

name: Benjamin Wagner
title: 1 stjerne er for megetüò° hvorf√•r f√•r vi‚Ä¶
review: 1 stjerne er for meget hvorf√•r f√•r vi som tidligere medlemmer ikke vores penge retur for April m√•ned som lovet, i svarer ikke l√¶ngere p√• mails  hvormange skal snydes Samtidig n√¶gtede i min kones opsigelse , da i ikke havde l√¶st jeres mail og derfor var hun stadig medlem Jeg h√•ber der kommer et gruppe s√∏gsm√•l mod jeg for alle de fejlagtige opkr√¶vninger i har udf√∏rt fra april og frem .

name: TonnyBrix Hansen

name: Nic Kruse
title: Forskelsbehandling i SATS H√∏rsholm - bliv v√¶k!
review: Personalet i SATS H√∏rsholm er uengageret, ligeglade og dovne. Alle, p√• n√¶r en enkelt ung mand, bruger mere tid p√• deres telefoner og p√• at gemme sig i personalerummet, end de g√∏r p√• at betjene receptionen. Desuden er personalet ogs√• i stor grad dobbeltmoralske og f√∏lger ikke de regler der ellers er p√•kr√¶vet af medlemmerne (spritte maskiner af, ikke optage maskiner ved bare at sidde p√• telefonen, rydde op efter sig selv)Jeg har selv fors√∏gt at bede en enkelt af receptionisterne (han var p√• arbejde d. 12/7) som tr√¶nede, om at l√¶gge v√¶gtene p√• plads og spritte af, hvortil han svarede: ‚ÄúDet skal du ikke blande dig i‚Äù og ‚Äújeg arbejder her, s√• hvis du ikke vil blacklistes, skal du bare blande dig udenom‚Äù.D√•rlige oplevelser gang p√• gang.Jeg h√•ber at Centerlederen kan f√• styr p√• sit personale.
translated_review: The staff of SATS H√∏rsholm are unengaged, indifferent and lazy. Everyone, except a single young man, spends more time on their phones and hiding in the staff room than they do on operating the reception. Furthermore, staff are also very much double moral and do not follow the rules that are otherwise required by members (drinked machines, not recording machines by just sitting on the phone, cleaning up after themselves) I myself tried to ask one of the receptionists (he was at work on 12/7) sabout training, about putting the weights in place and bouncing off where he replied: "Don't interfere with that and I work here, so if you don't want to blacklist, just stay out of it.Bad experiences time and time again.I hope that the Centre Manager can get his staff together.

review: Man bliver oprigtigt rasende af SATS kundeservice.Glem alt om at v√¶re kunde i en virksomhed som respekterer sine medlemmer.Man f√•r ikke svar p√• henvendelser, og l√∏fter bliver ikke holdt.Jeg h√•ber virkelig du v√¶lger et andet sted at tr√¶ne.

translated_review: It's impossible to sign out, their systems don't work and they don't take the phones in customer service. If you send an email there's 4-5 weeks of response time. They charge money for membership even if we have several months of benefit. There's only 1 thing you can do and that's blocking the rates in the payment service

name: Christian Andersen

Jeg har fuld forst√•else for travlhed i denne periode men travlhed og intet svar siden april m√•ned er under al kritik !!Hilsen Meget utilfreds kunde !!!

Se vores hjemmeside, hvor du kan finde svar p√• de mest stillede sp√∏rgsm√•l.  Du kan se vores arbejde med at tilbyde sikker tr√¶ning for dig nu, hvor vi √•bner igen p√• Du kan ogs√• l√¶se mere om vores gen√•bning her. og i vores information e-mail du har modtaget.Pas p√• dig selv! SATSTil orientering, hvis du ogs√• st√•r og skal have din penge, og de ikke g√∏r det. S√• bare s√∏g p√• google, og s√• kommer der en fin artikel fra dr, der beskriver at det er ulovligt.
translated_review: Generally expensive, without improving the service (i.e. better during fitness.dk and cheaper)...Besides that, it is ridiculous that they have still not returned the money that they owe me for over 2 months...+ They also do not answer the support...This answer over 20 days ago(JEP over 20 DAYS):Dear Member,Thank you for your request.Finally, we welcome our members back to our centers again!We fully understand that you have important questions and our ambition is to give you an answer when we can, but unfortunately skyou expect a longer processing time than usual at this time, but we promise we will return to you. See our website where you can find answers to the most asked questions. You can see our work to offer safe training for you now, when we open again on You can also read more about our reopening here. and in our information email you received. Take care of yourself! SATSFor information, if you also stand and need to have your money and they don't do it. So just search for google and then there will be aThat's a fine article from Dr. Keating. He says it's illegal.

name: Tina
title: Umuligt at standse PT forl√∏b med PBS aftale
review: Jeg startede et Personlig Tr√¶ner forl√∏b med PBS aftale som jeg fra start sagde op s√• jeg kun skulle have 3 mdr. som er minimum. SATS bekr√¶ftede flere gange at det er opsagt (b√•de ved receptionen i Gentoftegade og via medlemsservice), men de bliver ved med at tr√¶kke pengene (Kr.2400 + andre bel√∏b for PT som jeg ikke forst√•r ud over medlemsprisen) Det som jeg troede var en enkel aftale p√• 3 x Kr 2400,- viste sig at blive en meget dyr og uoverskuelig aftale som det endnu ikke er lykkedes mig at komme ud af. Jeg har netop gennemg√•et alle fakturaer siden aftalens start, og kan se at de har trukket 11.230 for PT aftalen selv om jeg fra start kun √∏nskede (og ikke har modtaget mere) end 3 mdr. af 2.400,-  Alts√• kr. 4.030,- mere end det aftalen l√∏d p√•. Man kan ikke ringe til SATS, og der er op 4 ugers svartid p√• e-mail. De l√∏ber med pengene og lukker telefonerne....Egentlig utroligt at man kan drive forretning med s√•  lav forretningsetik og ingen kundeservice. T√¶nker ikke det kan v√¶re lovligt bare at h√¶ve kundernes penge som det behager dem.Man kan selvf√∏lgelig altid bede banken tilbagef√∏re bel√∏bet, men irriterende at skulle bruge tid p√• det fordi SATS ikke har styr p√• (eller svindler med) deres opkr√¶vninger. S√• jeg vil advare alle mod at indg√• en s√•dan aftale, den er umulig at sige op igen, s√• jeg t√¶nker den eneste l√∏sning er at melde sig helt ud af SATS, og lukke sit kreditkort for at stoppe de ulovlige opkr√¶vninger. review: FitnessDK/Sats har v√¶ret en lidt blandet oplevelse.Personalet er generelt en positiv oplevelse med venlig og god kundeservice.Instrukt√∏rerne er b√•de underholdende - og garant for god tr√¶ning.Udstyret svinger meget fra center til center - nogle lokationer har helt nyt udstyr, andre steder er v√¶sentlig mere slidt, is√¶r spinningudstyret tr√¶nger nogle steder til en markant opgradering.Prisen er den samme hele √•ret til trods for at der er f√¶rre hold om sommeren.Der opkr√¶ves et ekstragebyr v. holdtr√¶ning, der overstiger en normal tr√¶ningstime, hvilket p√• sin vis er OK, s√•fremt man som kunde f√•r rabat, n√•r leverand√∏ren reducerer produktet i sommerm√•nederne.Tilbuddet om at ‚Äúman kan pr√∏ve noget nyt‚Äù sikrer leverand√∏rens interesser - ikke kundens.Hvis jeg s√¶tter medlemskabet i bero eller melder mig ud om sommeren, kan jeg ikke tr√¶ne - og skal i√∏vrigt betale for at blive meldt ind igen.Betingelserne v. indmelding specificerer IKKE hvor mange hold, som Sats er forpligtet til at tilbyde p√• m√•nedsbasis - til geng√¶ld st√•r der en masse om hvilke forpligtelser, som KUNDEN har.I min optik s√• skubber man problemet med s√¶sonudsving over p√• kunderne og det er ikke OK.Klientellet er desv√¶rre ikke altid en lige positiv oplevelse.Der er uforholdsm√¶ssigt meget kvindefnidder med kliker og konstante sm√•konflikter, som tager alt for meget fokus fra tr√¶ningen - et af de mere bizarre eksempler er feks. meget voksne mennesker, som stejlt holder p√• at de skal st√• et bestemt sted under holdtr√¶ningen.....Jeg har skiftet center og hold flere gange i et fors√∏g p√• at f√• en bedre tr√¶ning - uden den store succes.Dilemmaet er til at f√• √∏je p√• - hvad g√∏r man i oplevelsesindustrien, n√•r nogle grupper af kunder forpester ens produkt? Nu har jeg meldt mig ud og h√•ber at min n√¶ste tr√¶ningsaktivitet bliver en positiv oplevelse.
translated_review: FitnessDK/Sats has been a slightly mixed experience.The staff is generally a positive experience with friendly and good customer service.The instructors are both entertaining - and guaranteeing good training.The equipment varies a lot from center to center - some locations have completely new equipment, others are considerably more worn out, especially the spinning equipment needs a significant upgrade.The price is the same throughout the year, despite the fact that there are fewer teams in the summer.The offer that you can try something new ensures the interests of the supplier - not the customer's.If I suspend or resign in the summer, I can't train - and I have to pay to be registered again.The conditions v. registration do NOT specify the number of teams that Sats is required to offer on a monthly basis - in return for which it stands dis a lot about what the KUNDEN has.In my optics, you push the problem of seasonal fluctuations onto customers and that's not OK. Unfortunately, the client is not always a positive experience.There are disproportionately high levels of women with cliques and constant small conflicts that take too much focus from the training - one of the more bizarre examples is, for example, very adult people who keep them standing in a certain place during the team training.....I have changed the center and hold more pals.In an attempt to get a better training - without the great success.The dilemma is to see - what do you do in the experience industry when some groups of customers pester your product? Now I have resigned and hope that my next training activity will be a positive experience.

Gavekortet er udl√∏bet for 2 dage siden.Og s√• modtager jeg f√∏lgende mail (Husk lige at jeg har afmeldt mig):K√¶re medlem,Tak for din foresp√∏rgsel.Endelig byder vi vores medlemmer velkommen tilbage til vores centre igen!Vi forst√•r fuldt ud, at du har vigtige sp√∏rgsm√•l, og vores ambition er at give dig et svar, n√•r vi kan, men desv√¶rre skal du p√• dette tidspunkt forvente en l√¶ngere behandlingstid end normalt, men vi lover ...SATS, JEG VIL HAVE MINE PENGE ‚Äì THAT'S IT!

Here at the end of the afternoon I receive the following two mails from thehere I get some kind of newsletter with gift cards that they claim I have chosen.The gift card has expired 2 days ago.And then I receive the following email (Remember that I have signed up):Dear Member, thank you for your request.Finally, we welcome our members back to our centers again!We fully understand that you have important questions and our ambition is to give you an answer when we can, but unfortunately at this point you must expect a longer treatment.time than usual, but we promise...SATS, I WILL HAVE MY PENGE THAT'S IT!

title: SATS holdte hvad de lovede
review: Jeg mener nok man kan sige at det har v√¶ret noget af en omv√¶ltning for alle at Danmark lukkede ned i midten af marts, bestemt ogs√• for virksomheder, og s√• is√¶r da man stort set ikke vidste hvad der ville ske fra myndigheders side fra den ene dag til den anden. S√• vidt jeg ved skete nedlukningen kun √©n eller to dage f√∏r betalingsservices automatiske m√•nedlige forberedelse af betalinger for april m√•ned, og samtidigt skulle virksomhederne utroligt hurtigt finde ud af hvordan de s√• skulle k√∏re deres virksomheder og finde ud af hvilke services de nu kunne tilbyde som ville v√¶re noget deres kunder kunne bruge. Jeg kan levende forestille mig at det m√• havde v√¶ret en smertefuld og kaotisk proces hvor det lige tager noget tid at p√• fuldt styr p√• det og at ikke alt g√•r som det burde g√∏re. Jeg m√• sige at for mig kommunikerede SATS klart nok og omst√¶ndighederne taget i betragtning valgte jeg alts√• at se tiden an og stole p√• at SATS ville g√∏re noget fornuftigt for mig som kunde og g√∏re det som de sagde de ville if√∏lge deres e-mails. Det er s√• min oplevelse at det netop er det de har gjort. Jeg valgte ogs√• at g√• over til et online abonnement til nedsat pris, selvom jeg ikke har brugt det meget, fordi jeg meget n√∏dig vil risikere at undv√¶re SATS i fremtiden. N√•r jeg logger ind p√• deres hjemmeside kan jeg se at min abonnementspris ikke er korrekt og det er selvf√∏lgelig ikke s√•dan det skal v√¶re, til geng√¶ld er bel√∏bet p√• Betalingsservice for maj m√•ned korrekt og inkluderer den lovede kompensation. Desuden synes jeg at det virkelig er lykkedes dem at lave nogle gode online tr√¶ningstilbud og for mit vedkommende har SATS i det mindste holdt hvad de lovede.
translated_review: I think it might be said that it has been quite a upheaval for everyone that Denmark shut down in mid-March, certainly also for companies, and so especially since it was virtually unknown what would happen from the authorities from one day to the next. As far as I know, the decommissioning happened only one or two days before payment services automatic monthly preparation of payments for the month of April, and at the same time companies had to find out very quickly how to run their businesses.I can imagine that it must have been a painful and chaotic process, where it just takes some time to get on top of it and not everything going as it should. I have to say that for me sats communicated clearly enough and given the circumstances I chose to look at the time and trust that SATS would do something sensible for me as a customer and do what they said they would according to theree-mails. This is my experience that it is exactly what they have done. I also chose to switch to an online subscription at reduced price, even though I haven't used it much, because I very much do not want to risk without SATS in the future. When I log in to their website I can see that my subscription price is not correct and that's not how it should be, in return the payment service amount for the month of May is correct and includes the promised compensation. Besides, I think it workscorpses have managed to make some good online training offers and, for my part, SATS has at least kept what they promised.

name: Toke
title: Svarede du ikke, s√• h√¶nger du ikke p√• medlemskabet (ref: Malin Selander)
review: Quote DR nyheder. Viser h√•b (devis). Jeg er nu sikker p√• at det nok skal l√∏se sig. 1 stjerne herfra, pga. processen og Q&A p√• SATS hjemmeside ikke er opdateret med klare information ref. dem som SATS's Malin Selander er quotet for i DR nyheder. F√• hjemmesiden opdateret og send mere information ud til medlemmerne!Min datter p√• 15 √•r er, lige som andre, endt med et digitalt medlemskab, som hun ikke benytter og vil have. Vi s√• ikke mailen i tide og har derfor ikke reageret p√• den f√∏r idag, hvor det er for sent. Medlemskabet er nu digitalt og fastl√•st. Quote fra DR.dk i dag: - Man kan ikke bare indg√• aftaler p√• vegne af folk, fordi de ikke siger nej tak. Der er man n√∏dt til at vente p√•, at forbrugeren vender tilbage. Og jeg undrer mig s√•re over, at man ikke bare laver det til et tilbud, i stedet for at man i princippet l√•ser forbrugerne. Det er efter min bedste overbevisning ikke lovligt, siger Martha N√∏r Kjeldsen (Forbrugerr√•det)SATS understreger, at hvis et medlem ikke har f√•et svaret p√• den udsendte email med valgmuligheder, s√• h√¶nger man ikke p√• det digitale medlemsskab.- Vores digitale medlemsskab er meget v√¶rdsat hos medlemmerne, derfor besluttede vi at tilbyde det til en lavere pris. Men hvis man ikke n√•ede at kontakte os i tide, kan man fortsat lave det om og for eksempel s√¶tte det i bero, skriver Malin Selander.
translated_review: Quote DR news. Shows hope (devis). I am now sure it will work out. 1 star from here, due to the process and Q&A on the SATS website is not updated with clear information ref. those for which SATS's Malin Selander is quoted in DR news. Get the website updated and send out more information to members!My daughter in 15 years is, like others, ended up with a digital membership that she doesn't use and wants to have. We didn't see the mail in time and have therefore not responded to it until today when it's too late.The membership is now digital and locked. Quote from DR.dk today: - You can't just make deals on behalf of people because they don't say no thanks. There you have to wait for the consumer to return. And I'm surprised that you don't just make it into an offer, instead of locking the consumers in principle. It's not legal, according to my best opinion, Martha N√∏r Kjeldsen (Consumers' Council)SATS stresses that if a member hasn't received the reply to the email sent byoptions, so you don't hang on to the digital membership.- Our digital membership is highly appreciated by members, therefore we decided to offer it at a lower price. However, if you didn't reach us in time, you can continue to change it and, for example, put it on hold, writes Malin Selander.

name: Jens
title: SATS har gjort f√∏lgene mod deres‚Ä¶
review: SATS har gjort f√∏lgene mod deres medlemmer:1. Oprettet et digitalt medlemskab til medlemmer til 129 kr/mnd uden aktivt samtykke fra medlemmer.2. Skrevet at hvis man opsiger sit medlemskab, mens de holder lukket, kommer ens medlemsperiode til at blive forl√¶nget med tilsvarende periode. Man b√∏r altid have krav p√• at h√¶ve en aftale.3. Opkr√¶vet fuld medlemskab for betaling i april (selvom fitness centret er lukket), dog med kompensering. Problemet med kompensering er at der var et lille vindue til at v√¶lge kompensering, og hvis man ikke tog et aktivt valgt, fik man en kompensering i form af et digitalt medlemskab til 129 kr/mnd. 4. Sendt rykkerbreve for abonnement, hvis man ikke betalte abonnement for april for et lukket center. Selvom de f√∏r havde sagt ens medlemskab var sat i bero.5. Skrevet den 12. Marts "All memberships are automatically put on hold during this period. You do not have to take any action." selvom der efterf√∏lgene har v√¶ret behov for aktive valg den 16. og 30. Marts. I mailen fra 30. Marts stod det aktive valg i bunden af mailen og kunne overses.
translated_review: SATS has done the following against their members:1. Created a digital membership for members to 129 DKK/mnd without the active consent of members.2. Written that if you terminate your membership while they are closed, your membership period will be extended by corresponding period. You should always be entitled to withdraw an agreement.3. Full membership for payment in April (although the fitness center is closed), however with compensation. The problem with compensation is that there was a small window to choose the comp4. If you didn't take an active choice, you got a compensation in the form of a digital membership to 129 DKK/mnd. 4. Posted newsletters for subscription if you didn't pay subscription for a closed center for April. Although they had previously said your membership was suspended.5. Posted on March 12 "All members are automatically put on hold during this period. You do not have to take any action." Although there was a need for active choices on March 16 and 30. In the mail from March 30, you did not have to take any action."the active choice at the bottom of the mail and could be overlooked.

name: Laura Kinnunen
title: Jeg har nu siden start marts haft‚Ä¶
review: Jeg har nu siden start marts haft planer om at opsige mit medlemskab hos sats - ikke fordi jeg har v√¶ret utilfreds med centeret, men da jeg st√•r og skal flytte. Hertil ramte coronakrisen s√•, og jeg skrev en mail d. 7. april om at jeg √∏nsker at opsige fra dags dato. P√• hjemmesiden st√•r der at man ved opsigelse betaler for l√∏bende m√•ned + 1 m√•ned og at det er samme regler her under corona, og dette fik jeg ogs√• som svar p√• min email. Dertil svarede jeg selvf√∏lgelig at jeg ikke vil betale for l√∏bende m√•ned + 1 m√•ned n√•r centrene er lukket, og fik s√• til svar at mit medlemskab i stedet vil blive forl√¶nget s√• l√¶nge centeret er lukket. Det vil s√• sige at s√•fremt SATS √•bner op igen d.10. juni skal jeg betale for juni ud samt juli m√•ned i stedet for april og maj, p√• trods af at jeg p√• dette tidspunkt slet ikke bor i byen hvor mit center er tilknyttet og alts√• ikke vil have mulighed for at tr√¶ne der? Derudover har jeg nu p√• en mail korrespondance over 4 emails hver gang spurgt ind til hvorn√•r jeg f√•r refunderet de penge jeg har betalt for i den lukkede periode, og hver gang er mit sp√∏rgsm√•l bare blevet ignoreret og i stedet har jeg bare f√•et et flabet svar om, at mine mails og indvendinger ikke √¶ndrer p√• noget. SATS l√•ser alts√• deres kunder til et abonnement de slet ikke √∏nsker at have og ignorerer blot sp√∏rgsm√•l ang√•ende kompensation, samt tvinger mig til at betale for et produkt om 3 m√•neder som jeg slet ikke kan bruge, p√• trods af at jeg har opsagt mit medlemskab i april? Er m√•ll√∏s over den inkompetente og uprofessionelle behandling jeg har f√•et, og mit syn p√• sats har i den grad √¶ndret sig.- Laura
translated_review: I have now since the beginning of March had plans to terminate my membership at the rate - not because I have been unhappy with the center, but because I have to move. Then the corona crisis hit, and I wrote an email on April 7 that I want to terminate from today's date. On the website it says that at termination you pay for the current month + 1 month and that it is the same rules here under corona, and this I also received in response to my email. Of course I replied that I will not pay for the current month + 1This means that if SATS opens up again on 10 June I will have to pay for June out as well as July month instead of April and May, despite the fact that at this time I do not live in the city where my center is affiliated and thus will not have the opportunity to train there? In addition, I have now asked about when I will be reimbursed the penI have paid for in the closed period, and every time my question has just been ignored and instead I have just got a sloppy answer that my mails and objections do not change anything. SATS locks their customers to a subscription they don't want to have and ignores just questions about compensation, and forces me to pay for a product in 3 months that I can't use at all, despite my resignation in April? Is speechless about the incompetent and unprofessio?I have received some treatment, and my view of the rate has changed so much.- Laura

name: Rasha
title: Meget d√•rlig markedsf√∏ring, kundeservice og kommunikation
review: Simpelthen den d√•rlige service jeg har oplevet, og is√¶r i Kundeservice, som jeg har en del erfaring med selv. Det g√∏r i skam ikke s√¶rlig godt, og s√• er jeres markedsf√∏ring alt for misvisende og mangler information omkring ens mulighed for afmelding af abonnement. Folk har krav p√• sine penge, n√•r de ikke f√•r leveret varen, ogs√• under Corona - det er ingen undtagelse!
translated_review: Simply the bad service I have experienced, and especially in Customer Service, with which I have a lot of experience. It doesn't do very well, and then your marketing is too misleading and lacks information about your ability to unsubscribe. People are entitled to their money when they don't get the product, even under Corona - that's no exception!

name: Emil Krarup Hatt
title: Rigtig fin k√¶de med gode hold
review: Jeg har nu v√¶ret medlem af sats i halvandet √•r, hvor jeg har betalt mit medlemskab √•rligt. Inden coronaen har sats altid tilbudt super gode holdtr√¶ninger og haft indbydende centre. Da coronaen lukkede landet ned, satte sats selv mit medlemskab i bero med automatisk forl√¶ngelse af perioden lige s√• l√¶nge som nedlukningen har varet. Jeg kan ikke genkende den kritik, som de i √∏jeblikket bliver ramt af.Det prim√¶re jeg savnede inden coronaen, var mere udbredt h√•ndsprit i centrene, men mon ikke den nye virkelighed kommer til at √¶ndre det.
translated_review: I have now been a member of the movement for a year and a half, where I have paid my membership annually. Before the corona the rate has always offered super good team training and had inviting centers. When the corona shut down the country, the rate even put my membership in line with the automatic extension of the period as long as the shutdown has lasted. I don't recognize the criticism that they are currently being hit by.The main thing I missed before the corona was more widespread hand alcohol in the centers, but I don't suppose the new realityis going to change it.

name: Louise
title: Virkelig en d√•rlige behandling af‚Ä¶
review: Virkelig en d√•rlige behandling af kunderne
translated_review: Really a poor treatment of customers

name: Husain
title: Bondefangeri
review: Jeg har nu i snart en m√•neds tid fors√∏gt at melde mig ud af Sats. Men de bliver ved med at sende copy paste mails til mig, om alternative tr√¶ningsmuligheder og jeg har alts√• skrevet til dem, at det √∏nsker jeg ikke. Jeg √∏nsker blot at melde mig ud!!!!
translated_review: I have been trying to get out of Sats for almost a month now. But they keep sending copy paste mails to me about alternative training options and I have written to them that I don't want to. I just want to sign up!!!

translated_review: They draw money from your account when membership is suspended. They lose many members if they do not choose to enter into dialogue with their customers. Other companies are contact just by mail or by phone. They do not respond to inquiries. Weird customer service or lack of it.

name: Ulrik Tandrup
title: Penge tilbage - hvorn√•r?
review: Da der ikke er nogen der ved hvorn√•r I √•bner igen er I s√• ved at betale pengen tilbage for april m√•ned? Hvorn√•r kan vi regne med at de bliver betalt tilbage?
translated_review: Since no one knows when to open again, are you paying back the money for the month of April? When can we expect them to be paid back?

name: Anne Sofie
title: Bondefangeri
review: Jeg m√• desv√¶rre melde mig i koret af klagere, der ikke kan opsige og stadig bliver opkr√¶vet flere m√•neders ubrugeligt medlemsskab. Helt uacceptabelt af Sats at skaffe likviditet fra sine kunder ved at bondefange dem p√• denne m√•de hvor man ikke kan opsige sit medlemsskab til trods for at man intet som helst f√•r for pengene. For et selskab der b√•de f√•r fuld support af regeringens hj√¶lpepakker for husleje og √∏vrige faste udgifter samt l√∏nkompensation, er det helt uacceptabelt at fastholde sine kunder p√• denne m√•de. Sats' kundeservice er desuden p√• absolut laveste niveau; jeg har ringet mindst 10 gange uden at komme igennem. Rykkere og betalingsp√•mindelser har de dog ingen problemer med at sende. Man skulle tro at de kunne overf√∏re nogle af de mange centeransatte til telefonerne for at servicere deres kunder! Helt uh√∏rt og jeg har sat mine ben for sidste gang i Sats ovenp√• denne behandling.
translated_review: Unfortunately, I have to join the chorus of complainants who cannot terminate and are still being charged months of useless membership. Quite unacceptable by Sats to provide liquidity from its customers by capturing them in this way where you cannot terminate your membership despite the fact that you get nothing at all for the money. For a company that gets both full support from the government's help packages for rent and other fixed expenses as well as wage compensation, it is quite unacceptable to keep its customers on thisI have called at least 10 times without getting through. However, they have no problems with sending. You would think that they could transfer some of the many center employees to the phones to service their customers! Quite unheard of and I have set my feet for the last time in Sats on top of this treatment.

name: Sakaria
title: Ualmindeligt d√•rligt k√∏bmandskab
review: Jeg har som s√• mange andre f√•et trukket et m√•nedligt bel√∏b selvom centrene er lukket. Derudover s√• svarer Sats ikke p√• min mail om opsigelse af medlemskab samt tilbagebetaling af de penge der er trukket. T√¶nk at man i 2020, kan finde p√• at h√¶ve penge n√•r man ikke kan levere varen/ydelsen, det er simpelhen d√•rligt at at man s√• heller ikke engang ikke f√•r et svar p√• ens mail.
translated_review: Like many others, I have been paid a monthly amount even though the centres are closed. It can't be right that you withdraw money from my account and at the same time my membership is paused so I can't terminate my membership. In addition, Sats doesn't reply to my email about termination of membership and the refund of the money that has been drawn. I can't believe that in 2020, you'll be able to withdraw money when you can't deliver the item/service, it's simply bad that you don't even get an answer to yours.e-mail.

name: Mathias

Derudover har de elendige kundeservicemedarbejdere, svarer 2-3 uger efter (og desuden har de lukket for telefoner), og n√•r man kontakter dem p√• facebook er de uvidende (men rykkere kan de sagtens sende ud????). F√•r at vide i en mail at jeg har f√•et "kompensationsmails", hvilket jeg ikke har modtaget?! Som skrevet i anmeldelser under, er jeg ikke den eneste der oplever dette. Skam jer. Pinligt firma
translated_review: Unprofessional, amateur company. Sends reminders out for a subscription I can't pay for. In addition, they have miserable customer service employees, responds 2-3 weeks after (and additionally they have closed phones), and when you contact them on facebook they are ignorant (but reminders can they easily send out???). Getting to know in an email that I have received "compensation emails" which I haven't received?! As written in reviews below, I'm not the only one who experiences this. Shame you. Awkward company

name: Rasmus R√∏mer Hansen
title: Som s√• mange andre er jeg blevet‚Ä¶
review: Som s√• mange andre er jeg blevet opkr√¶vet m√•nedligt gebyr selvom, at centrene er lukket landet over. Jeg anvender ikke onlinetr√¶ning og har endda tidligere valgt at f√• refunderet mit medlemsgebyr i perioden, hvor centrene er lukket. Det er simpelthen for d√•rligt og respektl√∏st overfor jeres kunder, at i p√•tvunget tr√¶kker penge for en service, man ikke kan bruge. Jeg har fors√∏gt at opsige mit abonnement, men dette kan √•bentbart ikke lade sig g√∏re, da abonnementet er p√• pause (?). translated_review: Like so many others, I have been charged monthly fees even though the centres have been closed across the country. I do not use online training and have even previously chosen to get my membership fee refunded during the period when the centres are closed. It is simply too bad and disrespectful for your customers that you are forced to withdraw money for a service you cannot use. I have tried to cancel my subscription, but this obviously cannot be done as the subscription is paused (?).You can even withdraw money when the subscription is paused??? I have even tried to delete my MasterCard from your side, but it can't be done either (believes it's a breach of some data laws...).

name: Joakim Skjellerup
title: SATS har lovet kunderne
review: SATS har lovet kunderne, at der ikke skulle betales medlemskab under Coronakrisen, MEN nej - de tr√¶kker stadig pengene p√• kontoen og du kan ikke √¶ndre medlemskabet p√• hjemmesiden og i disse tider tager de heller ikke telefonen. Dog sender de gladligt en rykker ud, hvis du afviser betalingen :-)Tak for denne omgang SATS!Tak for jeres tilbagemelding SATS - Da regningen er lavet den 15.03. vil jeg f√∏rst blive krediteret i maj m√•ned. - Det kan da ikke v√¶re mit problem - Lav en kreditnota og betegn dette som en opsigelse af medlemskabet. Lidt konstruktiv kritik - Jeres kommunikation til medlemmerne er elendig og misvisende. Det er nok ikke uden grund at I f√•r d√•rlige anmeldelser. Derudover er det fr√¶kt at lukke for hjemmesiden, s√• man ikke kan opsige eller rette medlemskabet og hvorfor alverden lukke telefonerne - s√• f√•r I da f√∏rst en shitstorm p√• nettet. Kom I gang og opf√∏r jer ordentligt!
translated_review: SATS has promised customers that membership should not be paid during the Corona crisis, BUT no - they are still pulling the money on the account and you cannot change the membership on the website and in these times they are not taking the phone either. However, they happily send a pusher out if you refuse the payment:-)Thank you for this game SATS!Thanks for your feedback SATS - Since the bill is made on 15.03. I will only be credited in May. - That can't be my problem - Make a credit note and sign this as a credit noteA little constructive criticism - your communication to the members is miserable and misleading. It is probably not without reason that you get bad reviews. In addition, it is naughty to close the website so that you can't cancel or correct membership and why the world closes the phones - then you get a shit storm on the web. Get started and behave properly!

name: Martin Hjort
title: Ubeskrivelig d√•rlig opf√∏rsel
review: fik f√∏rst at vide at medlemskab var sat p√• hold grundet situationen , hvilket er naturligt i lyset af situationen, s√• f√•r man at vide at man at man uden at man har √∏nsket dette, er overg√•et til noget man kalder digitalt medlemskab, at det samtidig er umuligt at komme i kontakt med SATS er ubeskriveligt d√•rlig opf√∏rsel overfor sine medlemmer, Jeg m√• ogs√• i lighed med andre se at jeg bliver opkr√¶vet det fulde bel√∏b
translated_review: was first told that membership was put on hold due to the situation, which is natural in view of the situation, then one is told that without wishing to do so, one is transferred to something one calls digital membership, that at the same time it is impossible to get in touch with SATS is indescribably bad behavior towards one's members, I must also see that I am charged the full amount

name: heidi madsen
title: kundeservice lukket
review: Min medlemskab blev lavet om efter covid-19 til et onlinemedlemskab som skulle v√¶re billigere. Efterf√∏lgende er jeg opkr√¶vet fuld pris. Det er ikke muligt at komme i kontakt med deres kundeservice som er lukket alle dage frem til 11 maj.

review: Jeg har aldrig oplevet s√• ringe service.Jeg kan se at SATS s√• p√¶nt herinde skriver at man skal kontakte dem p√• diverse mails hvis man er utilfreds, men det duer desv√¶rre bare ikke hvis man aldrig f√•r et svar tilbage. Derfor slutter jeg mine frustrationer om denne tr√¶ningsk√¶de herinde, i h√•b om at man m√•ske bliver h√∏rt her, da det er det eneste sted jeg mangler...Jeg meldte mig ind i SATS Valby, hvor min k√¶reste har v√¶ret medlem i et √•rs tid, og da han startede hos SATS var der f√¶lles spa-/wellness omr√•de, hvor der var dampbad, sauna og jacuzzi. Disse faciliteter tiltalte mig meget, og derfor valgte jeg dette center/k√¶de fremfor en billigere l√∏sning. Dog ville jeg sikre mig dette stadig var nogle faciliteter centeret tilb√∏d, s√• jeg m√∏dte personligt op hos centeret. Til den ansatte spurgte min k√¶reste og jeg om der fortsat var de samme faciliteter i centerets ‚Äòwellness'omr√•de, som der var i starten af 2019, hvor at hun forsikrede os om at det var der. I det formoder man at der er dampbad, sauna og jacuzzi - hvad end det s√• er opdelt eller f√¶lles. Min k√¶reste har haft en lang periode med en skulderskade som har gjort ham ude af stand til at komme i centeret, og da han fortsat betalte for sit meget dyre medlemsskab og prisen i hans abonnement ikke var √¶ndret, formodede vi at der ikke var blevet √¶ndret - SOM lovet af den ansatte. F√òRSTE (og eneste gang) jeg satte mine f√∏dder i tr√¶ningscenteret fandt jeg dog ud af at jeg var blevet misvejledt i forhold til at wellness omr√•det 1) ikke har et jacuzzi, og 2) ikke har det f√¶lles - som jeg havde kunne se igennem med, hvis faciliteterne havde v√¶ret det samme. I f√∏lge SATS' betingelser i kontrakten har man 14-dages fuld returret, hvis medlemskabet ikke var blevet brugt. Jeg t√¶nkte at fordi jeg kun havde v√¶ret nede p√• deres l√∏beb√•nd i 30 minutter og misvejledning fra deres side, kunne dette sagtens lade sig g√∏re. S√• jeg gik direkte hjem og skrev til SATS, hvori der stod der kunne g√• op til 5 hverdage f√∏r man modtog svar. Der gik s√• bare 10 hverdage f√∏r jeg SELV m√•tte ringe og h√∏re hvad der skete med den sag. Og MAGEN til d√•rlig kundeservice skal man lede l√¶nge efter. Der bliver hverken taget ansvar, og den m√•de man bliver tiltalt p√• er simpelthen s√• pinlig. T√¶nk at man ikke har mere respekt for sig selv og sit arbejde. Den unge kvinde var ikke l√∏sningsorienteret og var sindsyg respektl√∏s i sin m√•de at tale p√•. Hun sagde direkte at 'vi misvejleder ikke' og p√•stod jeg l√∏j. Den 31/1-2020, f√•r jeg efter de 14 dage ENDELIG personlig svar pr mail fra centerlederen fra SATS Valby, hvor han beder mig uddybe h√¶ndelsen, hvilket jeg g√∏r. Det er i dag d. 17/2 og en m√•ned efter jeg var der f√∏rste gang (og eneste gang), og intet er sket efterf√∏lgende. Ingen l√∏sning, intet svar ydeligere fra SATS Valby. Vil p√• ingen m√•de anbefale denne k√¶de til nogen, og magen til mangel p√• at tage ansvar og have respekt for sit fag skal man s√∏rme lede l√¶nge efter. Og grundet S√Ö d√•rlig service valgte jeg og min k√¶reste at opsige vores abonnementer, hvorfor man m√•ske heller ikke ydeligere har svaret p√• mine frustrationer fra SATS Valby.
translated_review: I have never experienced such poor service.I can see that SATS so neatly writes in here that you should contact them on various emails if you are unhappy, but unfortunately it just doesn't work out if you never get an answer back. Therefore, I end my frustrations about this training chain in here, hoping that you might be heard here, because it's the only place I need...I joined SATS Valby, where my girlfriend has been a member for a year, and when he started at SATS there was a shared spa/wellness area, hour there were steam baths, sauna and jacuzzi. These facilities appealed to me a lot, and therefore I chose this center/chain rather than a cheaper solution. However, I wanted to make sure this was still some facilities the center offered, so I personally came to the center. To the employee asked my girlfriend and I if there were still the same facilities in the center's wellness area as there was in early 2019 where she assured us that it was there. In that case, it was assumed that there was steam bath, sauna and jacuzzi - hvaMy boyfriend has had a long period of shoulder injury that has made him unable to get to the center, and when he continued to pay for his very expensive membership and the price of his subscription had not changed, we assumed that there had been no change - as promised by the employee. First (and only time) I put my feet in the gym I found out, however, that I had been misguided by the wellness area 1) does not have a jacuzzi, and 2) do not have theI thought that because I had only been down on their treadmills for 30 minutes and misguidance on their part, this could easily be done. So I went straight home and wrote to SATS, which said it could go up to 5 working days before you received an answer. It was only 10 working days before I had to call andThe young woman was not solution-oriented and was insanely disrespectful in her way of speaking. She said directly that 'we are not misadvising' and claimed I lied. On 31/1-2020, after the 14 days, I get personal answers by email from the center leader from SATS Valby, whereHe asks me to elaborate on the incident, which I do. It is today the 17/2 and a month after I was there for the first time (and only time) and nothing has happened afterwards. No solution, no answer any more from SATS Valby. Will in no way recommend this chain to anyone, and similar to the lack of taking responsibility and having respect for his profession one must look for long after. And due to such bad service I and my boyfriend chose to cancel our subscriptions, why one may not have further replied to my rustrations from SATS Valby.

name: Martin
title: SATS i Odense p√• Nyborgvej
review: SATS i Odense p√• Nyborgvej Jeg har tr√¶net i centret i de sidste 10 √•r da det b√•de hed exerzice, Fitnessdk osv. Men dem der har gjort det v√¶rst indtil videre er SATS.. Jeg har endda v√¶ret inde p√• kontoret pga mine tidligere anmeldelser. Jeg har pointeret flere gange med ting som er galt og hver gang siger de at jeg skal have mange tak for at sige tingene og at de vil f√∏lge op p√• det, hvilket der aldrig kommer noget ud af. Jeg vil smide punktere op her s√• folk kan se hvad de g√•r ind til. 1. Det vrimler med mennesker fra Vollsmose som st√•r og tisser i badet, r√•ber og skriger i tr√¶ningscentret og kaster med ting efter hinanden (ja nogle gange efter andre mennesker der oppe) 2. Parkeringspladsen er ikke blevet tegnet op, s√• hver anden gang man skal hjem, s√• skal man ind og sige i receptionen at man ikke kan f√• sin bil ud. Og her er t√•lmodighed en god ting at v√¶re i besiddelse af. 3. Der er n√¶rmest ingen mandlige medarbejdere som kan tjekke op p√• alt det ballade der er i baderummene, s√• selvom man siger at der st√•r to kratluskere og h√¶lder proteinshake i saunaen s√• kan de ikke g√∏re noget fordi deres kvindelig ansatte ikke kan g√• der ud. 4. Deres Diamond medlemskab som koster p√• den anden side af 800 kr. skulle v√¶re eksklusivt og give en f√∏lelse af at man kommer til et sted hvor man f√•r en god behandling, s√• er det ret tr√¶ls at man skal st√• og finde v√¶rdi genstande som de kan f√• i depositum for det h√•ndkl√¶de man skal l√•ne som er med i medlemskabet. Og n√•r man skal hjem s√• skal man nogen gange st√• og vente i 5 min nede i receptionen for at f√• sine v√¶rdigenstande med hjem. 5. Selvom personerne i receptionen ser at folk k√∏re op og holder der hvor cyklerne skal v√¶re s√• bliver der ikke sagt noget fordi de ikke t√∏r at sige noget til folk som ikke er danskere. 6. Der er et st√∏rre antal af indvandre som ikke opf√∏re sig ordenligt der oppe, men der er ikke rigtig nogen som t√∏r sige noget til dem. Hvis det er danskere som en sj√¶ldent gang laver noget s√• er de der med det samme! 7. Tit n√•r jeg er p√• l√∏beb√•ndet, crosstraineren eller en af de andre maskiner s√• plejer jeg at bruge mit tr√•dl√∏se headset til at lave nogle telefonopkald i forbindelse med mit arbejde osv. Jeg taler altid stille og roligt og st√•r ikke stille imens. Alligevel kommer der altid en hen og siger at jeg ikke m√• snakke i telefon, s√• skal jeg g√• ud i sofaerne (2 meter fra maskinerne) Men der kan sagtens st√• 6 personer p√• l√∏beb√•ndene og r√•be p√• arabisk til hinanden i 30-40 min. igennem hele lokalet uden at der bliver sagt noget. Det sker HVER dag! 8. Crossfit omr√•det bliver reklameret med at v√¶re tilg√¶ngelig i hele √•bningstiden, men n√•r man kommer der ned n√•r der er de s√•kaldte crossfit-hold s√• bliver man m√∏dt med s√¶tninger som "den kan du ikke g√• i gang med for den skal vi bruge p√• et tidspunkt" s√• der er n√¶rmest ikke nogen ting man kan bruge (selvom de faktisk st√•r i en rundkreds og snakker om √∏velserne de skal lave og slet ikke bruger s√• meget som 1 maskine endnu) 9. Selvom medarbejderne ser at alle dem fra Vollsmose tr√¶ner i deres store beskidte udend√∏rssko s√• siger de ikke det mindste, men de kan sagtens komme hen til alle med hvid hud og stille sp√∏rgsm√•l s√•som "m√• jeg se hvor dit h√•ndkl√¶de er" og "har du indd√∏rssko med".. det er s√• diskriminerende. 10. Baderummets udluftning har n√¶rmest aldrig virket tror jeg. P√• et skilt p√• d√∏ren er der et billede af hvordan man t√¶nder udluftningen (det er et billede af skamlen som st√•r ved d√∏ren som man skal s√¶tte i klemme i d√∏ren s√• d√∏ren √•bner sig 30 cm) og dette er ikke engang en joke. Det er s√•dan at man t√¶nder udluftningen. Forstil jer 20-30 mennesker i omkl√¶dningen som bruger varmt vand, h√•rt√∏rre og sauna. Man kan ikke holde ud at v√¶re der inde i 5 min og man f√∏ler n√¶sten at man skal besvime. Jeg kunne skrive meget mere, men stopper her. Skal jeg sige en god ting om det center s√• er det at deres medarbejder Julie g√∏r et fantastisk stykke arbejde og er venlig og smilende hver gang. Den eneste grund til at jeg tr√¶ner der er fordi jeg bor 1 min derfra. Kan ikke anbefale dette tr√¶ningscenter.
translated_review: STS in Odense on Nyborgvej I have been training in the center for the last 10 years as it was both called exerzice, Fitnessdk etc. But those who have done the worst so far are SATS.. I've even been in the office because of my previous reviews. I've pointed out several times with things that are wrong and every time they say I have to have a lot of thanks for saying things and that they will follow up on it, which never comes out of. I'll throw points up here so people can see what they're going into. 1.Patience is a good thing to be in possession of. 3. There are almost no male employees who can check up on all the troubles in the bathrooms, so even though they say it says it says it says it's a good thing to be in possession of. 3. There are almost no male employees who can check up on all the troubles in the bathrooms.4. Their Diamond membership that costs on the other side of DKK 800 should be exclusive and give a feeling that you get to a place where you get good treatment, then it's pretty bad that you have to stand and find valuable items that they can get in deposit for the towel that you need to borrow that is part of the membership. And when you have to go home you have to stand and wait for 5 minutes down5. Even though the people at the reception see that people are driving up and holding where the bikes should be, nothing is said because they dare not say anything to people who are not Danes. 6. There are a larger number of immigrants who do not behave properly up there, but there is not really anyone who dares to say anything to them. If it's Danes who rarely do anything, then they are there immediately! 7. Tit when I'm on the treadmill, the cross trainer orOne of the other machines I usually use my wireless headset to make phone calls in connection with my work etc. I always talk quietly and do not stand still while. Nevertheless, someone always comes to tell me not to talk on the phone, so I have to go to the sofas (2 meters from the machines) but there can easily stand 6 people on the treadmills and shout Arabic to each other for 30-40 minutes. throughout the room without saying anything. It happens EVERY day! 8. Crossfit areais advertised to be available throughout the opening hours, but when you get down there when there are the so-called crossfit teams, you are met with phrases like "you can't get started with it because we need to use it at a time" so there's practically nothing you can use (although they actually stand in a circle talking about the exercises they have to do and don't use as much as 1 machine yet) 9. Even though the employees see that all those from Vollsmose train in their big dirty outdoor shoes saythey are not the least, but they can easily come to anyone with white skin and ask questions such as "I can see where your towel is" and "you have indoor shoes with"... it's so discriminatory. 10. The bathroom ventilation has almost never worked I think. On a sign on the door there is a picture of how to turn on the vent (it's a picture of the stool standing at the door that you have to squeeze in the door so the door opens up 30 cm) and this is not even a joke. It's such that you turn on the vent. FYou can't stand being there for 5 minutes and you almost feel you have to faint. I could write a lot more but stop here. Should I say a good thing about the center then it is that their employee Julie does a great job and is friendly and smiling every time. The only reason I work out there is because I live 1 min from there. Can't recommend this gym.

Nu kan jeg ikke til en anden gang tr√¶ne med min ven uden at blive overv√•get.De kan sige hvad de vil om min anmeldelse, men det der er ikke just okay. Hvis det er s√•dan de tager imod deres nye medlemmer, synes jeg godt nok at de skal √¶ndre deres politik.Jeg ved godt deres personlige tr√¶nere lever af det de g√∏r, men det er n√¶sten lige f√∏r jeg ikke m√• spotte min makker.

It turns out when I was training yesterday, there have been 2 notes after this incident happened and I end up calling down to the center and getting the talk with their manager....I still think it's a strange policy to have that I can't train with my partner without being monitored and deeply harassed.and tried different centers, this is the most strange thing I've ever been exposed to. Efter 1 m√•ned,har de sendt mig en regning p√• 400kr, forst√•r ikke hvad jeg betaler 400 for eftersom jeg fik gratis oprettelse og rabat p√• opholdet da jeg er studerende. Endvidere ser jeg de stadig √∏nsker betaling fra mig efter 2 m√•ned, selvom jeg sku havde v√¶ret opsagt! s√• jeg v√¶lger at ringe ind og kontakte SATS jeg f√•r lov til at st√• i k√∏ i telefonen i 2 timer mens den siger at jeg er nr 1 i k√∏en! translated_review: Never been a member to a more poor fitness center in my life. When I signed up, I said in the expedition that I wanted only 1 month trial period and therefore would be terminated with immediate notice. After 1 month, they have sent me a bill of 400kr, do not understand what I pay 400 for since I got free creation and discount on the stay since I am a student. Furthermore, I see they still want payment from me after 2 months, although I should have been terminated! so I choose to call in andcontact SATS I am allowed to queue on the phone for 2 hours while it says I am number 1 in the queue! But has no answer received on either phone calls or mail, on the contrary I have only been sent reminders for reminders. :( Don't know who is responsible for the center, but needs to be tightened up on the services it is heIt's safe.

title: 5 stjerner

name: Freja Wedenborg
title: Uretm√¶ssig opkr√¶vning
review: Jeg kan se, at der er flere herinde, der har p√•peget SATS' uretm√¶ssige opkr√¶vninger via inkasso-firmaet Intrum, som er i strid med Forbrugerstyrelsens regler. Det har jeg ogs√• oplevet.Jeg havde tidligere p√• √•ret nogle problemer med mit medlemskab hos SATS, fordi SATS ved en fejl var kommet til at stoppe min betalingsserviceaftale.SATS kundeservice fik opklaret problemet, og jeg fik en skriftlig bekr√¶ftelse p√•, at jeg ikke skulle betale rykkergebyrer, men kun de m√•neders kontingent, jeg manglede, da fejlen l√• hos SATS. Det betalte jeg i mit lokale center.Efterf√∏lgende fik jeg alligevel en opkr√¶vning fra Intrum p√• det bel√∏b, jeg havde betalt, samt et rykkergebyr. Jeg skrev til Intrum, at det m√•tte v√¶re en fejl, eftersom at bel√∏bet er betalt. Jeg har ikke modtaget svar p√• denne mail. Nu har jeg i stedet f√•et endnu et brev fra Intrum, hvor der st√•r, at sagen vil blive overgivet til retten og bel√∏bet er h√¶vet med med over 1000 kroner i rykkergebyrer. Jeg har nu haft fat i Intrum, som vil fors√∏ge at opklare sagen via SATS. Men faktum er, at jeg er blevet truet med retsforf√∏lgelse og store rykkergebyrer for en fejl, som ikke er min skyld, og en deraf f√∏lgende g√¶ld, som jeg har betalt som aftalt. Jeg har brugt en masse tid p√• det. Det er helt sk√∏rt!Nu venter jeg p√• at se, hvor denne sag lander, men ellers vil jeg selvf√∏lgelig melde det til Forbrugerklagen√¶vnet. Og til andre; s√∏rg endelig for at dokumentere alt, hvis I kommer i samme situation!
translated_review: I can see that there are several people in here who have pointed out SATS' irregular collections via the Indrum collection company, which is in breach of the Consumer Protection Agency's rules. I have also experienced this.Earlier this year I had some problems with my membership with SATS, because SATS had mistakenly come to stop my payment service agreement.SATS customer service had solved the problem and I received a written confirmation that I did not have to pay any reminder fees, but only the months of quota I was missing when the error lI paid that in my local center.Afterwards I received a charge from Indrum for the amount I had paid, as well as a reminder fee. I wrote to Indrum that it had to be an error, since the amount has been paid. I have not received a reply to this mail. Instead, I have received another letter from Indrum, where it says that the case will be handed over to the court and the amount has been raised by over DKK 1000 in reminder fees. I have now had a hold of Indrum, which will try to clarify the case via SATS. But the fact is that I have been threatened with prosecution and huge reminder fees for a mistake that is not my fault, and a resulting debt that I have paid as agreed. I have spent a lot of time on it. It is completely crazy!Now I am waiting to see where this case lands, but otherwise I will of course report it to the Consumer Complaints Board. And to others; please make sure to document everything if you get in the same situation!

name: Hans B√¶kgaard
title: SATS efterlever ikke afg√∏relse fra Forbrugerklagen√¶vnet
review: SATS efterlever ikke afg√∏relse fra forbrugerklagen√¶vnet og sender uberettiget tidligere kunder til inkasso.P√• trods af en afg√∏relse fra Forbrugerklagen√¶vnet der underkender et fitness centers praksis med at forlange personligt fremm√∏de ved opsigelse, forts√¶tter SATS med ubrettiget at sende tidligere kunder til inkasso - i vores tilf√¶lde inkassofirmaet Intrum.Afg√∏relsen og omtale heraf kan findes hos hhv forbrug.dk (afg√∏relse fra d- 6. maj 2019) og under nyheder d. 19. september 2019 hos danskerhverv.dk Udover at vi uberettiget er blevet opkr√¶vet medlemsgebyr, rykkergebyr og inkassogebyr og inkassosal√¶r, er har vores sag meget tilf√¶lles med mange andre anmeldelser af SATS og Intrum p√• Trustpilot.Tag jer i agt for SATS og Intrum og g√• omg√•ende til forbrugerklagen√¶vnet hvis I oplever noget lignende.
translated_review: SATS does not comply with the Consumer Complaints Board's ruling and sends unfairly former customers to the collection office.Despite a decision by the Consumer Complaints Board that overruled a fitness centre's practice of requiring personal appearance upon termination, SATS continues to send former customers unjustifiably to the collection office - in our case the Intram collection company.The decision and mention of this can be found at konsumning.dk (d-6 May 2019 decision) and under news on 19 September 2019 at danishprok.dk Udovis that we have been wrongly charged membership fee, reminder fee and collection fee and debt collection fee, our case has much in common with many other reviews of SATS and Intrum on Trustpilot.Beware of SATS and Intrum and go to the Consumer Complaints Board immediately if you experience anything similar.

name: Jonas M

They are too smart on a ride.Fitnessdk should never have been bought, I trained for years before a small break. There was good service, friendly staff who could find out how to greet, and the customer group was quite different.

name: Safak Gormez
