review: Til SATS Medlemsservice LederD. 18.11.2019 m√∏der vi op p√• SATS Ro's Torv for at h√∏re om jeres Tr√¶nings muligheder samt for at se jeres center p√• Ro's Torv.To s√∏de piger byder os velkommen og vi f√•r div. praktiske informationer om jeres Center.Vi f√•r oplyst at der foreligger medlemskabsgebyer p√• 299kr pr person.Vi bliver oprettet digitalt og der bliver taget billeder af os, ydermere √∏nskes der digitale underskrifter p√• en elektronisk plade.Under oprettelsen bliver vi ikke informeret om nogen kontrakt forhold idet der ingen kontrakt bliver pr√¶senteret, hverken for undertegnede eller min k√¶reste. Vi stiller ikke sp√∏rgsm√•lstegn ved underskrivelse p√• den digitale plade, da vi naturligvis tror at vores underskrifter omhandler Registreringskort.Dagen efter v√¶lger vi at starte vores tr√¶ning op, varigheden ender p√• ca 1 times tid. Her ser vi at SATS Ro's Torv ikke indfrier vores forventninger og min k√¶reste og jeg v√¶lger at dr√∏fte dette hjemme for at afklare hvad vi vil.Vores afg√∏relse g√•r p√• at vi vil annullere vores medlemskab.Jeg ringer d. 20 11.2019 kl 13:54 Til jeres Center p√• Ro's Torv og meddeler vores status, pigen svare f√∏lgende:"Det er vi kede af at h√∏re, jeg skal dog bede jer om at m√∏de personligt op p√• Centeret mht returnering af pengene, der vi har brug for underskrift".Det viser jeg naturligvis forst√•else for, og jf. Telefonisk aftale m√∏der vi op p√• Centeret i g√•r ca kl 20:30.Men her f√•r vi en anden besked!Her fort√¶ller endnu en anden pige os om vi ikke er blevet informeret om Kontraktvilk√•rene og samme svar f√•r hun; Nej det er vi ikke. Vi fort√¶ller igen p√• ny hvordan hele indmeldelses proccesen har v√¶ret og at vi IKKE er blevet gjort opm√¶rksomme p√• at vores digitale underskrift faktisk er til brug for en s√•kaldt kontrakt.Pigen meddeler at hun er ked af over situationen og at vi burde have blevet informeret om kontrakt vilk√•rene s√•ledes at vi s√• ville vide at en annullering ville udl√∏se indev√¶rende m√•ned plus en m√•ned. Vi g√∏r naturligvis opm√¶rksom p√• vores utilfredshed over manglende information samt processen for manglende information om jeres kontraktvilk√•r og hvad den digitale underskriftsplade ren faktisk benyttes til.Denne situation ser vi som manglende klar informationen over for kunden jf. Dansk k√∏beret og manglende information om forl√∏b. Vi im√∏deser at SATS returnere vores oprettelsesgebyr p√• 2 x 299 kr samt annullere vores medlemskab.Det bliver ikke bedre af at pigen bag telefonen p√• SATS Medlemsservice blot taler i munden p√• mig ved mit opkald til jer i dag d. 21.11.2019 kl 08:25 - ganske uh√∏fligt og manglende evne i f√∏rst at lytte samt pr√∏ve at v√¶re im√∏dekommende over for kunden.Endnu engang im√∏deser vi at SATS naturligvis im√∏deser vores h√¶ndelse og annullere medlemskabet samt returnere 2 x 299kr for oprettelse.Venlig hilsen
translated_review: At SATS Member Service LeaderD. 18.11.2019 we will meet at SATS Ro's Square to hear about your Training opportunities and to see your center at Ro's Square.Two cute girls welcome us and we will receive practical information about your Center.We will be informed that there are membership cities of 299kr per person.We will be created digitally and photos will be taken of us.In addition, digital signatures will be requested on an electronic record.We do not question signing the digital record because we naturally believe that our signatures relate to Registration Cards.The next day we choose to start our training, the duration ends in about 1 hour. Here we see that SATS Ro's Torv does not meet our expectations and my girlfriend and I choose to discuss this at home to clarify what we want.Our decision is that we will cancel ourI'll call your Center at Ro's Square on 20.11.2019 at 13:54 to announce our status, the girl responds as follows:"We're sorry to hear, however, I'll ask you to show up personally at the Center for the return of the money that we need to sign."Of course I understand that, and cf. Phone agreement we'll meet at the Centre yesterday at about 8:30 p.m.But here we get another message!Here another girl tells us if we have not been informed about the terms of the contract and the same svWe'll tell you again how the entire registration process has been and that we have NOT been informed that our digital signature is actually for the use of a so-called contract.The girl announces that she is sorry about the situation and that we should have been informed about the contract terms so that we would then know that a cancellation would trigger this month plus a month. Of course, we point out our dissatisfaction with the lack of information and process.we see this situation as a lack of clear information about your contract terms and what the digital signature plate is actually used for.This situation is seen as a lack of clear information to the customer cf. Danish Purchaser and lack of information about the programme.We expect SATS to return our creation fee of 2 x 299 DKK and cancel our membership.It is not better that the girl behind the phone at SATS Member Service just speaks to me at my call to you today on 21.11.2019 at 08:25 - quite rudely andInability to listen first and try to be accommodating to the customer.Once again, we expect SATS to meet our event and cancel the membership and return 2 x 299kr for creation.

name: Y D
title: Elendige medarbejder, d√•rlig service pisse ul√¶kker center (Roskilde)!!
review: Elendige medarbejder i Roskilde, til geng√¶ld er de rigtige god til at modarbejde, mister n√¶rmest lysten til at tr√¶ne, n√•r man m√∏der op!!!!!!Ingen hyggeegne is√¶r i Roskilde!!!! Jeg har skrevet en mail til sats for flere m√•neder siden, men ingen svare modtaget!! Der st√•r p√• deres hjemmeside at de svar inden for 3 dag!! Tro den skal de lave om til 3 √•r!!! Nu har jeg endelige f√•et mig til at melde ud!!! Og jeg vil r√•de alle til det, p√• ingen m√•der kan sats anbefales!!!
translated_review: Losing an employee in Roskilde, on the other hand, they are really good at counter-working, losing the desire to train when you show up!!!!!!No cozy areas especially in Roskilde!!! I have written an email at rate several months ago, but no answer received!! It says on their website that they answer within 3 days!! Believe it they will change to 3 years!!! I have finally made me report out!! And I will advise everyone to it, in no way can the rate be recommended!!!!

name: Andreas Bech
title: Pas p√• med at v√¶lge SATS
review: Pas p√• med at v√¶lge SATSJeg var medlem af SATS indtil starten af 2019, og betalte via betalingsservice. Havde opsagt mit abonnement, men af en eller anden √•rsag gik betalingen for den sidste m√•ned ikke igennem via PBS.Mere end 6 m√•neder efter, f√•r jeg s√• et brev fra deres inkassopartner Intrum med et gebyr p√• 100 kroner. Helt uden varsel. Medlemsservice i SATS oplyser, at de ved en fejl ikke har f√•et sendt en rykker (uden gebyr), og at de derfor har overgivet sagen til  Intrum.Og Intrum har (if√∏lge SATS) derfor sendt rykker uden gebyr, som sjovt nok heller aldrig er dukket op. S√• nu - ud af det bl√• - f√•r jeg en rykker fra Intrum med et gebyr. Jeg har tilbudt SATS at betale mit udest√•ende med det samme (uden gebyret), men det kan ikke komme p√• tale - ej heller selvom de ved fejl ikke fik sendt en p√•mindelse, som de ellers plejer. Det er - ret belejligt - ude af deres h√¶nder. De vil ikke engang refundere gebyret p√• 100 kr., hvis jeg betaler det til Intrum. Ikke just im√∏dekommende kundeservice. S√• t√¶nk over det, hvis I overvejer SATS. G√•r der kuk i betalingen, risikerer I - helt uden varsel - at blive kontaktet af deres inkassopartner.*******************Update pga. af svar fra SATS:I skriver, at jeg "ikke har reageret p√• Intrums fremsendte betalingsvarsel i tide hvorfor de har p√•lagt et rykkergebyr af 100 kr. for sen betaling."Jeg har allerede fortalt jer, at jeg ikke har modtaget s√•dan et varsel fra Intrum - men her er I fuldst√¶ndig toned√∏ve.Jeg har nu talt med Stine fra Intrum igen, og hun bekr√¶fter, at Intrum IKKE har sendt noget varsel. De har kun sendt det inkassovarsel med rykkeren. Det er lidt skr√¶mmende at Intrum f√∏rst forklarer at kunne se, at SATS har sendt 2-3 rykkere (hvilket SATS adspurgt hertil fort√¶ller IKKE er tilf√¶ldet) - og SATS derefter forklarer at Intrum derfor, forud for inkassovarsel med rykker, har sendt et varsel uden rykker (hvilket Intrum adspurgt hertil fort√¶ller HELLER IKKE er tilf√¶ldet) Begge parter p√•st√•r s√•ledes at den anden har sendt et varsel, hvilket begge parter afviser. SATS afviser dog alligevel at tage ansvar i sagen, og dermed bekr√¶fter SATS det, jeg skriver: At man som medlem af SATS uden varsel risikerer at blive kontaktet af deres inkassopartner.
translated_review: Beware of choosing SATSI was a member of SATS until the beginning of 2019 and paid via payment service. Had cancelled my subscription, but for some reason the payment for the last month did not go through via PBS.More than 6 months later, I get a letter from their debt collection partner Indrum with a fee of DKK 100. Without notice. Member's service in SATS states that they have not been sent a reminder (without charge) and that they have therefore handed the case over to Indrum.And Indrum has (according to SATS) deSo now - out of the blue - I get a pusher from Indrum with a fee. I've offered SATS to pay my outstanding immediately (without the fee), but it can't be said - even if they accidentally didn't get a reminder sent as they used to. It's - quite conveniently - out of their hands. They won't even refund the fee of 100 DKK if I pay it to Indrum. Not exactly welcoming customer service. So think about it,if you are considering SATS. If the payment is closed, you risk being contacted without notice by their debt collection partner.********************Update due to the response from SATS:I write that I have not responded to Indrum's sent payment notice in time for which they have charged a late payment fee of DKK 100."I have already told you that I have not received such notice from Indrum - but here you are completely deaf.I have now spoken to Stine from Indrum again, and she confirms that Indrum I have not received such notice from Indrum - but here you are completely deaf.The KKE has sent some notice. They have only sent the collection notice with the reminder. It is a bit scary that Intrum first explains to be able to see that SATS has sent 2-3 reminders (which SATS surveyed for this tells is NOT the case) - and SATS then explains that Intrum therefore, prior to the collection warning with reminders, has sent a notice without reminder (which Intrum asked for it tells HELLER is NOT the case) Thus both parties claim that the other has sent a notice, which both parties reject.However, it does look to take responsibility in the matter, and thus SATS confirms what I write: that as a member of SATS you risk being contacted without notice by their debt collection partner.

name: Rikke Nielsen
title: Fantastisk sted og meget servicemindede‚Ä¶
review: Fantastisk sted og meget servicemindede medarbejdere. Jeg f√∏ler mig altid velkommen.
translated_review: Great place and very service-minded employees. I always feel welcome.

name: Gabriella Anna Sommer
title: D√•rlig service og snyd ved pt kontrakter
review: De er alt for dyre til den service de udbyder. Der er ingen gennemsigtighed i deres priser og deres kontrakter med tilk√∏bt personlig tr√¶ner kan de ikke fremvise. Derimod misbruger de din underskrift til at g√∏re hvad de vil.
translated_review: They are far too expensive for the service they provide. There is no transparency in their prices and their contracts with purchased personal trainer they cannot show. However, they abuse your signature to do whatever they want.

name: kunde
title: Reng√∏ring
review: Jeg er glad for mit medlemskab i SATS men syntes godt nok de er faldet lidt af p√• den n√•r det kommer til reng√∏ring.
translated_review: I appreciate my membership in SATS but I think they've dropped off a bit when it comes to cleaning.

name: K Rasmussen
title: Betalingsservice, gebyr: 9,75 pr m√•ned
review: I disse tider, hvor der er fokus p√• gebyrer er det fr√¶kt at tage over 9kr pr m√•ned i gebyr. Det er knap 120,- kr om √•ret - og det er kun for √©t medlem. S√• fx for 500 medlemmer er der knap 60.000,-kr/√•ret i gebyrer. Hvorfor synes I selv det er rimeligt at v√¶re med til?
translated_review: In these times, when there is a focus on fees, it is naughty to charge over 9kr per month. It is barely 120,- kr per year - and it is only for one member. So for 500 members, for example, there are barely 60 000,- kr/year in fees. Why do you think it is reasonable to participate?

name: Anita Olsen
title: Fornyer ikke efter 9 √•rs uafbrudt medlemsskab
review: Jeg har gennem de fleste √•r haft et firmamedlemsskab, men m√•tte i 2017 acceptere en k√¶mpe prisstigning fra 3.245 kr. √•rligt til 4.389 kr. √•rligt, da min nye arbejdsgiver ikke havde en firmaordning med Fitnessdk. Det var en k√¶mpeprisstigning at sluge, men jeg valgte at acceptere den, da jeg har v√¶ret rigtig glad for Fitnessdk‚Äôs holdtr√¶ning og instrukt√∏rer. I forbindelse med fornyelse (som jeg var indstillet p√•) blev jeg imidlertid konfronteret med en √•rlig pris p√• 5.748 kr. for et tilsvarende medlemskab hos nu SATS (31% prisstigning!!!).Det synes jeg er en helt urimelig prisstigning, da der er tale om et helt tilsvarende medlemskab og ikke en overgang fra virksomheds- til privat medlemskab. Det er samtidig helt ude af proportioner med priser fra sammenlignelige k√¶der, og derfor kommer jeg ikke til at forny for 10. √•r i tr√¶k.Ud over at f√∏le at jeg har f√•et en helt urimelig √¶ndring af mine vilk√•r, er jeg ogs√• uforst√•elig over for, at SATS p√• den m√•de skr√¶mmer ellers gode, loyale kunder v√¶k.
translated_review: For most years I have had a company membership, but in 2017 I had to accept a huge price increase from 3,245 DKK annually to 4,389 DKK annually, as my new employer did not have a company scheme with Fitnessdk. It was a huge price increase to swallow, but I chose to accept it, as I have been very fond of Fitnessdk's team training and instructors. However, in connection with renewal (for which I was prepared) I was confronted with an annual price of 5,748 DKK for a corresponding membership withNow SATS (31% price increase!!!).I think this is a totally unreasonable price increase, as it is a very similar membership and not a transition from company to private membership.It is at the same time completely out of proportion with prices from comparable chains, and therefore I will not be renewing for 10 years in a row.Besides feeling that I have had a completely unreasonable change in my terms, I am also incomprehensible that SATS in this way scare away otherwise good, loyal customers.

name: Lars Nordenb√¶k
title: Jeg har modtaget en uberettiget rykker til INKASSO!
review: Jeg har modtaget en uberettiget rykker fra SATS til inkasso. Da jeg meldte mig ind i centeret, var det d. 15 i mdr og √•benbart midt i deres betaling og der gik koks i det fra deres side. De blev ved med at sende mig rykker selv om jeg flere gange var nede i deres center for at tilmelde mig betaling service. Der blev til sidst styr p√• det.MEN da jeg s√• melder mig ud af centeret modtager de ikke betaling fra mig IGEN p√• PBS som jeg selvf√∏lelig troede der var styr p√•.Her n√¶sten et √•r efter modtager jeg et brev fra inkasso, hvor der er kommet mange rykker p√•. Har intet f√•et p√• mail eller telefon. Pr√∏ver at snakke med en fra hovedkontoret, der er dybt uforskammet og er fuldst√¶ndig lige glad med det er dem der har lavet en fejl.Det skal siges jeg har meldt mig ind i centeret igen og betalt flere fakturaer efterf√∏lgende men INTET h√∏rt fra SATS f√∏r inkasso brevet kommer.Det er simple hen s√• elendig service fra deres side og DERES fejl! Jeg melder mig selvf√∏lelig ud af centeret igen efter mange √•rs medlemsskab og kommer ALDRIG tilbage og vil frar√•de alle at melde sig ind i det center!!!
translated_review: I received an unjustified move from SATS to debt collection. When I joined the center, it was 15 months and evidently in the middle of their payment and there was coke in it from their side. They kept sending me reminders even though I was several times down at their center to sign up for payment service. It was finally sorted out.But then when I quit the center they didn't receive payment from me AGAINly on PBS which I thought was under control.Here almost a year after I receive a letterI haven't gotten anything on the mail or phone. Trying to talk to someone from the head office who is deeply rude and is completely unhappy with it is they who made a mistake. I have to say I have joined the center again and paid several invoices afterwards but NOT heard from the SATS before the collection letter arrives.It's simple to such miserable service on their part and THEIR mistakes! I naturally report out of the center again after many years of membership and commis NEVER back and will advise everyone not to join that center!!!

name: Cecilie M.
review: Jeg meldte mig ind i fitnessDK i slut 2018. I starten af dette √•r fandt jeg en billig flybillet til Japan og valgte at rejse afsted. Jeg g√•r ned i SATS nogle timer efter at jeg havde k√∏bt flybilletten, for man SKAL ned i deres center for at melde sig ud. Jeg fort√¶ller den unge pige at jeg gerne vil melde mig ud, hun kigger op og ned af mig, med et arrogant halvt grinende smil og siger "er du sikker p√• det?". Hun fort√¶ller mig at jeg har hele m√•neden som vi er i, og jeg stadig vil betale for kommende m√•ned. Det er fint med mig, det st√•r i deres betingelser, s√• det ved jeg godt allerede, ingen problemer der! Hun siger efterf√∏lgende at jeg er blevet udmeldt og smiler arrogant igen og siger, "ha en go dag s√∏de".Jeg har nu v√¶ret p√• min rejse siden slut februar og jeg har betalt for et medlemskab lige siden. dette fandt jeg dog ud af, fordi jeg fik tjekket mit dankort fra Danmark. Alle mine regninger er kommet ind p√• min anden konto, fra en anden bank, men SATS var stadig hos min danske bank og har v√¶ret trukket hver m√•ned, hele √•ret.Da jeg ikke fik dokumentation p√• at jeg udmeldte mig selv, kan jeg derfor intet g√∏re. Selvom at pigen ikke gav mig nogen form for papirer med da jeg forlod stedet. jeg f√∏ler mig rigtig d√•rligt behandlet og er ked af alle de penge jeg har mistet..
translated_review: I joined the gym in the end of 2018. At the beginning of this year I found a cheap flight to Japan and chose to leave. I go down to SATS some hours after I bought the plane ticket, because you MUST go down to their center to sign up. I tell the young girl that I want to sign up, she looks up and down, with an arrogant half laughing smile and says "Are you sure about it?". She tells me that I have the whole month as we are in, and I will still pay for coming month.It's fine with me, it's in their terms, so I already know that, no problems there! She says afterwards that I've been registered and smiling arrogantly again and say, "Have a good day sweet."I've been on my journey since late February and I've been paying for a membership ever since. However, I found out this because I checked my Dankort from Denmark. All my bills have entered my second account, from another bank, but SATS was still with my Danish bank and have been withdrawn from my bank.When I didn't get proof that I volunteered myself, I can't do anything. Although the girl didn't give me any kind of paperwork when I left the place. I feel really badly treated and sorry for all the money I lost..

name: Arni
title: Opsiger i Lyngby centeret og betaler‚Ä¶
review: Opsiger i Lyngby centeret og betaler for hele opsigelses perioden men f√•r stadigv√¶k regninger. Det viser sig at det jeg har betalt i opsigelse er en dag tr√¶ning. S√• personen i centeret har opsagt mig og solgt mig en dags billet og s√• har jeg f√•et rykkere og ekstra regninger. S√• jeg kommer til at betale for en dags tr√¶ning og rykker gebyr forbi personelet ikke ved hvad de laver.
translated_review: Assays at the Lyngby Center and pays for the entire termination period but still gets bills. It turns out that what I paid in termination is one day training. So the person at the center has quit me and sold me a day ticket and then I've got reminders and extra bills. So I'm going to pay for a day's training and move the fee past the personnel doesn't know what they're doing.

name: Stine
title: Sats i Valby torvegade - 2500 kbh
review: Sats i Valby Torvegade 17, 2500 K√∏benhavnDen v√¶rste service og arrogance. L√¶nge har vi bedt om at f√• musik med lavere lyd, men desv√¶rre svarer de altid, at de ikke kan. Nogle af medarbejderne svarer aldrig venligt. Jeg vil ikke skrive navnene her, men jeg vil skrive en mail til kundernes service, der is√¶r informerer om en bestemt pige, at hun aldrig g√∏r sit job korrekt og venligt, hun er ikke den eneste.
translated_review: Sats in Valby Torvegade 17, 2500 CopenhagenThe worst service and arrogance. Long we have asked to get music with lower sound, but unfortunately they always answer that they can't. Some of the employees never answer friendlyly. I won't write the names here, but I will write an email to the customers' service, which in particular informs about a particular girl that she never does her job correctly and kindly, she is not the only one.

name: Magnus Kamarinum
title: SATS snyder dig! Pas godt p√•!
review: Fy for den!!! Efter at have v√¶ret medlem i nogle m√•neder, uden nogensinde at benytte mig af deres tr√¶ningscenter, var jeg i Juni nede i centeret for opsigelse af mit abonnoment. Det var selvf√∏lgelig intet problem, og samtidig betalte jeg dem de penge jeg var bagud med regningen. Dette var jo selvf√∏lgelig intet problem hellere! MEN n√•r jeg s√• ringer til dem i august for at sp√∏rge hvorfor jeg stadig f√•r regninger sendende, f√•r jeg oplyst at jeg stadig er medlem, og at de aldrig har modtaget en opsigelse... hmm..N√•h, men jeg t√¶nker at det m√•tte v√¶re en fejl, og beder om at f√• snakket med den der stod for min opsigelse. Det f√•r jeg s√• lov til (da de godt kunne se hvem havde modtaget min betaling) og fik s√• oplyst af ham, at han p√• ingen m√•de kunne huske at jeg havde opsagt mit dav√¶rende abonnoment, og at jeg i givet fald skulle have underskrevet en opsigelse, som de siger at der ogs√• st√•r oplyst i deres betingelser, som jeg har underskrevet.Da jeg var der for at oprette mig som kunde, skulle jeg underskrive noget digitalt, og da jeg spurgte hvad jeg skulle underskrive, fik jeg blot oplyst, at det kunne jeg g√• ind p√• deres hjemmeside og se n√•r jeg kom hjem, men hvis jeg skulle f√• det tilbud de havde k√∏rende, skulle dette underskrives her og nu.. alts√• i blinde, da jeg ikke m√•tte se betingelserne.S√• nu m√•tte jeg f√• opsagt mit abonnoment p√• ny, og blev dette selvf√∏lgelig gjort via mail. S√• jeg nu er s√• super heldig at have betalt for flere m√•neder oveni, + f√•et rykkergebyr og intrum ind over, da jeg jo ikke ville betale for opsagt abonnoment, og ingen hj√¶lp f√•et fra Sats, p√• trods af flere opringninger til hovedkontoret for at pr√∏ve at finde en l√∏sning!
translated_review: Few for it!!! After being a member for a few months, without ever taking advantage of their gym, I was in June down at the center for the termination of my subscription. Of course, that was no problem, and at the same time I paid them the money I was behind on the bill. Of course, this was no problem!BUT when I called them in August to ask why I still get bills sending, I am told that I am still a member and that they have never received a resignation... hmm..Well, but I think it might be a mistake, and ask to have a word with the person responsible for my resignation. I am then allowed to do so (when they could see who had received my payment) and were so informed by him that he could not remember that I had terminated my then subscription, and that if so, I should have signed a letter of resignation, which they say is also stated in their terms, which I signed.When I was there to establish myself as a customer, I had to sign somethingdigitally, and when I asked what to sign, I was just informed that I could go into their website and see when I came home, but if I were to get the offer they had been making, this should be signed here and now... in the blind, as I was not allowed to see the terms.So now I had to withdraw my subscription anew, and was of course done by mail. So I am now so super lucky to have paid for several months on top, + got the reminder fee and intrum over, since I didn't want to betaLes for quitting the subscription, and no help received from Sats, despite several calls to the head office to try to find a solution!

name: Jakob Bay
title: Elendig kundeservice
review: Elendig kundeservice, og inkompetent personale.Jeg var nede for at tilmelde mig i centeret, og medarbejderen bad mig underskrive og acceptere vilk√•r p√• en digital pad. Men jeg kunne ikke f√• lov til at se mine vilk√•r, og han ville have at jeg skulle underskrive i blinde.Kunne selv finde vilk√•r p√• hjemmesiden, men jeg ved jo ikke om det er det jeg har skrevet under p√•.Samtidig tilmeldte jeg mig via en firmaordning, men blev opkr√¶vet 299 kr i oprettelse. Selvom SATS k√∏rer med gratis tilmelding lige pt. DVs at nu er jeg tvunget til at v√¶re medlem i mindst 10 m√•neder, f√∏r jeg opn√•r nogen former for rabat.Medarbejderen sagde at jeg skulle skrive ind til hovedkontoret for at f√• det krediteret, men her fik jeg bare et flabet svar med "Ingen gratis tilmelding til dig..."Alt i alt, en virkelig d√•rlig start for en ny kunde... I wonder why de har problemer med at tiltr√¶kke nye kunder, og f√• √∏konomien til at l√∏be rundt...
translated_review: I was down to sign up at the center, and the employee asked me to sign and accept terms on a digital pad. But I couldn't see my terms and conditions, and he wanted me to sign blindly.Could find terms on the website, but I don't know if that's what I signed on to.At the same time I signed up via a company scheme but was charged 299 DKK in creation. Although SATS runs with free registration right at the moment. DVs thatNow I'm forced to be a member for at least 10 months before I get any kind of discount.The employee said I had to write in to the head office to get it credited, but here I just got a sloppy answer with "No free registration for you..."All in all, a really bad start for a new customer... I wonder why they have trouble attracting new customers, and getting the economy running around...

name: Hans Ove Nielsen
title: Et godt fitnesscenter, med mange muligheder for tr√¶ning. Gode maskiner, samt Holdtr√¶ning.
review: Et godt fitnesscenter
translated_review: A good gym

name: Morten Stryhn
title: Elendig kundeservice.
review: Elendig kundeservice.Der tages intet ansvar og der er ingen klare svar. Kundeservice henviser til centerledelsen, som aldrig svarer. Rykkerbreve har betalingsfrist p√• 2-3 hverdage fra modtagelse af brevet (hvilket er ulovligt) og der opkr√¶ves ind i mellem ulovlige betalingsgebyrer i centrene (som kr√¶ver mange henvendelse at f√• tilbagebetalt).N√•r man som kunde beder kundeservice om at viderebringe en besked til et center er svaret at det kan de ikke medmindre man sender en mail.Der er heller ikke nogen chefer som t√∏r st√• frem og tale med kunderne - de gemmer sig bag kundeservicefolkene!SVAR TIL SATS' SVAR:Skal vi lige f√• sandheden ind i det her. I sendte en rykker 18. september, som PostNord leverede 26. september med betalingsfrist 1. oktober. Det er aldrig kundens ansvar at I v√¶lger en langsom leverand√∏r.I sender en rykker p√• trods af, at det er jeres fejl, at betalingen ikke er registreret. Jeres personale fort√¶ller mig at der er problemer med jeres dankort-maskine og beder mig tage dokumentation med ned i centeret n√¶ste gange jeg kommer der. Jeg tager dokumentation med, men ekspedienten siger at det er l√∏st, s√• jeg skal ikke g√∏re mere - sagen er ude af verden. MEN det er sagen s√• ikke og jeg kan endda betale endnu en gang og f√• min konto i nul uden at ekspedienten siger noget om at der mangler en betaling. S√• jeres personale har flere gange fortalt mig at der ikke er noget h√¶ngeparti.Nu har jeg sendt dokumentation til jeres medlemsservice, som for √∏vrigt var ret arrogante i deres svar og ikke ville hj√¶lpe med at f√• sagen i orden. Jeg kunne bare vente p√• svar - hvis jeg havde betalt. Hun var fuldst√¶ndig ligeglad og burde ikke sidde i medlemsservice, n√•r hun ikke vil hj√¶lpe og bare henviser til processer, som passer jer og ikke hj√¶lper kunderne.Og I svarer ikke p√• hvorfor jeres ledelse ikke vil tage ansvar og tale med kunderne???
translated_review: No liability is taken and there are no clear answers. Customer service refers to the center management, which never responds. Booking letters have a payment deadline of 2-3 working days from receipt of the letter (which is illegal) and are charged in between illegal payment fees in the centers (which require many requests to be repaid).When you as a customer ask customer service to forward a message to a center, the answer is that they cannot do so unless you send an email.There are no bosses either.R who dares to stand up and talk to the customers - they are hiding behind the customer service people!ANS TO SATS' ANSWER:Should we get the truth into this?You sent a reminder September 18th, which PostNord delivered September 26th with payment deadline October 1st. It is never the customer's responsibility to choose a slow supplier.You send a reminder despite the fact that it is your fault that the payment is not registered. Your staff tells me that there are problems with your dancing machine and asks me to take documentation intoI'll bring you documentation, but the clerk says it's solved, so I don't have to do any more - the case is out of the world.But that's the case then not and I can even pay once again and get my account in zero without the clerk saying anything about the need for a payment. So your staff have told me several times that there is no hanging party.Now I have sent documentation to your member service, which by the way was quite arrogant in their answer and would not help me.I could just wait for answers - if I had paid. She was completely indifferent and shouldn't sit in the membership service when she won't help and just refers to processes that suit you and don't help the customers.And you don't answer why your management won't take responsibility and talk to the customers???

name: Alexander Christensen

name: Kenneth Koster

review: Rigtig d√•rlig kundeservice. De overholder ikke selv deres betingelser og de overholder ikke aftaleloven. De tr√¶kker penge fra ens konto uden tilladelse og de undsiger efterf√∏lgende at reff√¶rdig√∏re det. Deres betingelser g√¶lder √•benbart kun till deres fordel. Aldrig igen.

name: Mikkel Hjortebjerg Harps√∏e

review: Rigtigt d√•rligt og flabet kundeservice. ingen informationer givet om √¶ndret medlemskab Indtil man selv opdager det p√• regningen.

name: johan
title: JEG HAR MELD MIG UD AF SATS!
review: JEG HAR MELD MIG UD AF SATS!Efter at have v√¶ret medlem i Sats/FitnessDK i ca 20 √•r har jeg valgt at opsige mit medlemsskab og jeg vil advare alle der bare overvejer at melde sig ind i en fitnessklub, at undg√• Sats. Sats har m√•ske for mange medlemmer og er blevet totalt ligeglade med at "vedligeholde" sine medlemmer.Dr√•ben der fik b√¶geret at flyde over var, da jeg en aften kom ind med min lille datter for at tr√¶ne (hvor centret var i stort set tomt). Her fik jeg at vide at jeg skulle betale 90 eller 100 kr hvis jeg skulle have hende med ind. Sagen er den, at man har "altid" haft lov til at tage en ven med. Men den fordel for s.k. "platinmedlemmer" er nu sl√∏jfet fik jeg at vide. Ingen undtagelser.Dermed er den eneste m√•de Sats "honorerer" deres trofaste medlemmer gennem 20 √•r, ved at give 20% rabat n√•r man k√∏ber deres t√∏j. Halleluja! Se det er en fordel der er til at tage og f√∏le p√•!!Ingen venner med i ny og n√¶, ingen fringe benefits, ingen separate omkl√¶dningsrum, ingen gratis PT i nogle timer per √•r, ingen arrangementer. Intet. Nul.Hvis jeg sad i Sats bestyrelse s√• ville jeg sende mig selv og hele ledelsen p√• et omfattende kursus i kundevedligeholdelse. Kunderne er jeres eneste asset. At som idag pisse p√• kunder der har v√¶ret jer tro i √•revis er en katastrofekurs at g√•.S√• folks, meld jer IKKE ind i Sats. De vil gerne have dine penge, men de skider p√• dig.
translated_review: After being a member of Sats/FitnessDK for about 20 years, I have chosen to terminate my membership and I want to warn anyone who is just considering joining a fitness club to avoid Sats.Sats has perhaps too many members and has become completely indifferent to "maintaining" his members.The drop that got the cup flowing over was when one night I came in with my little daughter to train (where the center was in virtually empty). Here I was told that I had to pay 90 or 100 kr hIf I had to bring her in. The case is that you have "always" been allowed to bring a friend. But the advantage of s.k. "platin members" is now the loop I was told. No exceptions. Thus, the only way Sats "honor" their faithful members for 20 years is by giving 20% discount when buying their clothes. Hallelujah! See it is an advantage that is to take and feel!!No friends with in the news, no fring benefits, no separate dressing rooms, no free PT for some hours per year, no scarRangements. Nothing. Zero.If I sat on Sat's board then I would send myself and the entire management on a comprehensive course in customer maintenance. Customers are your only asset. That as today piss on customers who have been faithful for years is a disaster course to go.So people, don't join the Sats. They want your money, but they don't give a shit about you.

name: Kunde
title: If√∏lge min tidligere anmeldelse p√•‚Ä¶
review: If√∏lge min tidligere anmeldelse p√• trustpilot fra 2 dage siden og i henhold til sats svar via trustpilot er jeg stadig dybt forarget over s√• en elendig kundeservice.Jeg kan se p√• sats svar at i helt har "misforst√•et" hvad det handler om. Hermed ridser jeg kort historien op.Jeg har tilbage i tiden. Ca 15 √•r v√¶ret medlem af det dav√¶rende Sats, da Sats overgik til fitness dk fortsatte vi medlemskab der.For ca 1 √•r siden begyndte min mand og jeg at tr√¶ne sammen p√• det nye center i Blox og der blev vi r√•det til at √¶ndre vores abonnement til " tag en ven med" da det blev billigere samlet for os.Da dette abonnement udl√∏b den 28/6-19 var vi klar til forl√¶ngelse , der fik vi at vide at denne type abbonement ikke l√¶ngere kunne tegnes, da fitness dk var overg√•et til Sats, og derfor var vi n√∏dsaget til at oprette to abonnementer, som forl√¶ngelse af tidligere abonnement .NU KOMMER KERNEN AF DET DET HANDLER OMJeg er blevet opkr√¶vet et oprettelses gebyr p√• 299,- trods mit medlemskab de sidste 15 √•r. Sats argument er at jeg Ikke har v√¶ret medlem det sidste halve √•r og skal derfor oprettes p√• ny, hvilke i min optik er Helt forkert, da vi jo netop blev r√•det til , at skifte abonnement som nu ikke l√¶ngere er eksisterende.Summa summarum For mig handler det ikke Kun om de kroner 299,-Men om retorikken og kundeservice for loyale medlemmer, som ikke har valgt abonnementet skulle udg√•, det er Virkelig d√•rlig medlemsetik, man kunne n√¶ste lade sig hen p√• at Sats er blevet ren drift og profit det virker som om at Sats har glemt parolen at kunden har altid ret ! √Ürgerligt at i ikke taler sandt n√•r i giver et svar, hvilke g√¶lder b√•de med kundeservice og jeres svar her.MvhHanne
translated_review: According to my previous review on trustpilot from 2 days ago and according to rate response via trustpilot I am still deeply outraged by such a miserable customer service.I can see on the rate response that you have completely "misunderstood" what this is all about.In this way I briefly sketch the story up.I have back in time. About 15 years was a member of the then Sats when Sats passed to fitness dk we continued membership there.About 1 year ago my husband and I started training together at the new center in Blox and there we were advised toWhen this subscription expired on 28/6-19 we were ready for extension, we were told that this type of subscription could no longer be subscribed when the fitness dk had been transferred to Sats, and therefore we had to create two subscriptions as an extension of the previous subscription.NOW THE KIND OF IT IS COMING ABOUTI have been charged a creation fee of 299,- despite my membership for the last 15 years. Sats argument is that INot a member in the last six months and therefore need to be re-established, which in my optics is quite wrong, since we were just advised to change subscriptions that are no longer existing.Summa summarum For me it is not only about the DKK 299,-But about the rhetoric and customer service for loyal members who have not chosen the subscription should be deleted, it is really bad membership ethics that you could next let yourself that Sats has become pure operation and profit it seems that Sats has forgotten the slogan aToo bad you don't speak the truth when you give an answer, which applies both with customer service and your answer here.MvhHanne

name: August
title: Godt udstyr, uhyre d√•rlig service, og endnu v√¶rre online-portal
review: Jeg started i vinters hos SATS S√∏borg, og var s√•dan set fint tilfreds, da det er et l√¶kkert center med solidt udstyr. Min utilfredshed kom dog da jeg skulle udstationeres i 3 m√•neder og ville s√¶tte mit medlemskab i bero. Det kunne jeg ikke f√• lov til.Da jeg havde travlt i ugerne op til min udstationering havde jeg desv√¶rre ikke tid til at tr√¶ne, og dermed ikke tid til at s√¶tte mit medlemskab i bero i centeret. Da vi lever i 2019 og SATS har en online portal, gik jeg ud fra det ville v√¶re nemt at s√¶tte medlemskabet i bero. Specielt n√•r SATS skulle v√¶re en af de mere premium fitness-k√¶der.Til min store overraskelse kunne man ikke g√∏re dette p√• deres portal. Man kan faktisk stort set ikke bruge portalen til noget, da man for det meste bliver henvist til at tage kontakt til medlemsservice.Jeg skriver s√• til SATS S√∏borg om jeg kan s√¶tte mit medlemskab i bero, og forklarer at jeg er i udlandet. Jeg f√•r intet svar i en uge, s√• jeg rykker i dem. Jeg f√•r kort efter svar om at det ikke er muligt fordi de skal bruge min underskrift. Det burde de kunne klare over mail, hvilket jeg sp√∏rger om er en mulighed. Det f√•r jeg aldrig svar p√•. Det er nu i slutningen af April, s√• jeg skynder mig at opsige mit medlemskab inden jeg skal betale for 2 m√•neders opsigelse i stedet for 1. Overraskende nok kan man godt opsige sit medlemskab p√• portalen. Hvorfor er det nemmere at opsige sit medlemskab end at s√¶tte det i bero?Jeg sender efterf√∏lgende en klage til SATS' hovedkontor. Jeg f√•r svar tilbage om at min henvendelse er registreret (S 1904-3029), og jeg kan forvente svar inden for 5 hverdage. Det kommer aldrig. I mailen er det dog specificeret at man ikke kan s√¶tte sit medlemskab i bero via e-mail. Hvorfor ikke? og hvorfor st√•r det f√∏rst h√©r?S√• alt i alt en virkelig skuffende kundeservice, som endda n√¶gter at svare p√• henvendelser, og hvis de svarer er de ikke s√¶rlig im√∏dekommende. Derudover er deres medlems-portal ikke s√¶rlig brugbar.
translated_review: I started in the winter at SATS S√∏borg, and I was quite happy, as it is a delicious centre with solid equipment. Unfortunately, my dissatisfaction came when I had to be posted for 3 months and wanted to suspend my membership. I couldn't be allowed to do that.Since I was busy in the weeks leading up to my posting, I didn't have time to train, and therefore no time to put my membership on hold in the center. Since we live in 2019 and SATS have an online portal, I assumed it would be easy to put in a medleI am very surprised that you couldn't do this on their portal. In fact, you can't use the portal for anything, since you are mostly referred to contact member service.I will then write to SATS S√∏borg if I can suspend my membership and explain that I am abroad. I don't get an answer for a week, so I'll move in them. I'll get soon after the answer that it's not possible because they need my services.signature. They should be able to cope with mail, which I ask is an option. I never get an answer to that. It's now at the end of April, so I hurry to terminate my membership before I have to pay for 2 months' notice instead of 1. Surprisingly enough, you can terminate your membership on the portal. Why is it easier to terminate your membership than to suspend it?I will then send a complaint to SATS' headquarters. I get answers back that my request is registered (S.1904-3029) and I can expect answers within 5 working days. It never comes. However, it is specified in the email that you cannot suspend your membership by email. Why not? and why is it first here?So all in all a truly disappointing customer service that even refuses to respond to inquiries, and if they answer they are not very accommodating. Furthermore, their member portal is not particularly useful.

name: Elsebeth H√∏jgaard
title: Utrolig d√•rlig kundeservice
review: Nul stjerner!Jeg har v√¶ret medlem i af Fitness.dk i mange √•r og har siden april 2019 v√¶ret medlem af SATS. Jeg har oplevet utroligt meget kludder med mit medlemsskab hele tiden, men i dag tog dog prisen. Jeg kunne se p√• min opkr√¶vning, at jeg bliver opkr√¶vet 399 pr. m√•ned, og ikke 299, som er det korrekte bel√∏b for mit medlemskab. Jeg pr√∏vede som det f√∏rste at g√• ind p√• mit medlemsskab p√• sats.dk, men kunne ikke logge ind, da jeg har ikke modtaget en adgangskode og linket 'glemt adgangskode' virkede ikke. Jeg ringede derefter til kundeservice. Da jeg forklarede, at jeg ikke kunne logge ind, sagde servicemedarbejderen som det allerf√∏rste, at 'Det er fordi du ikke vil modtage mails fra os, at du ikke har f√•et en adgangskode'. Jeg forklarede s√•, at dette ikke var korrekt - jeg har aldrig sagt, at jeg ikke ville modtage mails, og jeg har i√∏vrigt modtaget masser af mails - bare ikke en med mine medlemsoplysninger. Derefter sagde hun, at det er fordi jeg har et gammelt medlemsnummer - det var en helt ny oplysning for mig. Det viser sig s√•, at jeg √•benbart har f√•et et nyt medlemsnummer, men jeg er aldrig blevet oplyst om det og jeg har ikke f√•et et nyt medlemskort. Derefter m√•tte hun medgive, at de ansatte i mit fitnesscenter havde √¶ndret mit medlemsskab til et medlemsskab, hvor jeg ganske rigtigt skal betale 299 pr m√•ned - de havde bare ikke gjort det korrekt og betalingsoplysningerne var ikke √¶ndret. De havde ladet mig forst√•, at det nye medlemsskab var i orden, men der l√• if√∏lge servicemedarbejderen en kontrakt, som ikke var underskrevet - og jeg har som sagt ikke modtaget en eneste mail med medlemsoplysninger.Jeg kan godt b√¶re over med, at der bliver beg√•et fejl, men servicemedarbejderen var under hele samtalen utrolig aggressiv - der var OVERHOVEDET ingen kundevenlighed eller nogensomhelst beklagelser af, at de har kludret s√• meget med mit medlemsskab. Det var som om, det var den st√∏rste selvf√∏lge i verden, at jeg ikke har modtaget de forn√∏dne oplysninger og mails, ikke er blevet oplyst om mit nye medlemsnummer og i √∏vrigt er blevet opkr√¶vet et fejlagtigt bel√∏b. Medarbejderen var hele tiden i forsvarsposition, selvom jeg talte venligt og bare ville have sagen opklaret. Jeg synes, man i enhver kundeservice b√∏r have medarbejdere ansat, som er gearet til at tale venligt med kunder - og som kan g√∏re indr√∏mmelser, n√•r der er blevet beg√•et ekstremt mange fejl.Og s√• synes jeg i √∏vrigt som mange andre, at oprettelsesgebyrerne hos SATS er urimelige. Servicemedarbejderen, jeg talte med i dag, pointerede netop, at problemet med mit medlemsnummer var opst√•et, fordi det ikke var et nyt medlemsskab, jeg havde tegnet, men et gammelt fitness.dk-medlemsskab, jeg havde fornyet. Alligevel m√•tte jeg betale 299 i oprettelsesgebyr. Jeg synes, det svarer til, at man skal betale ved indgangen til en forretning for at f√• lov til at komme ind og v√¶re kunde - jeg synes, de burde afskaffes helt.
translated_review: I have been a member of Fitness.dk for many years and since April 2019 I have been a member of SATS. I have experienced a lot of mess with my membership all the time, but today took the price. I could see from my charge that I'm charged 399 per month, and not 299, which is the correct amount of my membership. I tried first to enter my membership on rate.dk, but could not log in as I have not received a password and the link 'forgotten password' did not work. JI then called customer service. When I explained that I couldn't log in, the service officer said as the very first thing that 'It's because you won't receive emails from us that you haven't got a password'. I then explained that this wasn't correct - I never said that I wouldn't receive mails, and I've also received lots of mails - just not one with my membership information. Then she said that it's because I have an old member number - it was a whole new information fIt turns out that I have apparently received a new membership number, but I have never been informed about it and I have not received a new membership card. Then she had to admit that the employees of my gym had changed my membership to a membership where I actually have to pay 299 per month - they just hadn't done it correctly and the payment information hadn't changed.I have not received a single email with membership information, as I said.I can bear with the fact that mistakes have been made, but the service officer was extremely aggressive throughout the conversation - there was no customer friendliness or any regret that they have messed up so much with my membership. It was as if it were the greatest self-evident thing in the world that I have not received the necessary information and mails, have not been informed about my new membership number andThe employee was always in a defence position, although I spoke kindly and just wanted the case solved. I think that any customer service should employ employees who are geared to talk friendlyly to customers - and who can make concessions when extremely many mistakes have been made.And, like many others, I think that setting up fees at SATS are unreasonable. The service officer I spoke to today pointed out precisely that the problem ofMy membership number had arisen because it was not a new membership I had drawn, but an old fitness.dk membership that I had renewed. Nevertheless, I had to pay 299 in the creation fee. I think it is equivalent to paying at the entrance to a business to be allowed to enter and be a customer - I think they should be abolished completely.

name: Winnie
title: Rigtig gode instrukt√∏r
review: Rigtig gode instrukt√∏r, som er dygtig og hj√¶lper, n√•r man tr√¶ner p√• hold med at sikre at man ikke f√•r skader og tr√¶ner rigtigt
translated_review: Very good instructor who is skilled and helps when training on teams to make sure you don't get injuries and exercise properly

name: Jakob Villarro
title: Arrogant front desk i Fields!
review: Jeg havde ringet til SATS i Fields dagen inden mit bes√∏g for at h√∏re om mulighed for dagsbillet, om faciliteterne i √∏vrigt og om jeg skulle have noget s√¶rligt med. ‚ÄúHvis du vil i bad skal du have et h√•ndkl√¶de med og ellers kan du leje et for 20 kroner‚Äù.S√•ledes beredt checker jeg dagen efter ind p√• en dagsbillet til 99 kr. I omkl√¶dningen ser jeg straks, at skabenes l√•semekanisme er √¶ndret til nu at kr√¶ve en h√¶ngel√•s. Jeg returnerer til receptionen for at l√•ne en h√¶ngel√•s. Den kunne jeg s√• leje for 10 kroner eller k√∏be min egen. Jeg forklarer, at jeg er bes√∏gende p√• dagsbillet og at jeg rent faktisk havde forh√∏rt mig dagen i forvejen om s√•danne eventuelle detaljer. Svaret fra Michael i receptionen: ‚ÄúJa, og man skal ogs√• have tr√¶ningst√∏j med!‚ÄùDet var s√• dr√•ben for mig. Jeg mener det er en fejlvurdering at holde fast i princippet, n√•r kunden er g√¶st uden medlemskab, har betalt 99 kr. for en enkelt tr√¶ningssession og i √∏vrigt havde forh√∏rt sig dagen i forvejen. N√•r budskabet s√• tilmed leveres med nedladende arrogance, var der nul chance for at jeg ville blive i det midlertidige kundeforhold.Pengene retur og hurtigt videre til andet tr√¶ningscenter p√• Amager. Der er s√• rigeligt at v√¶lge imellem...
translated_review: I had called SATS in Fields the day before my visit to hear about the opportunity for the day ticket, about the facilities and if I wanted to bring something special. If you want to take a shower you will need a towel and otherwise you can rent one for 20 kroner. Thus, I prepared to check in the following day for a day ticket to 99 kr. In the dresser I immediately see that the locker mechanism has been changed to now require a padlock. I return to the reception to borrow a padlock.or buy my own. I explain that I am a visitor to the day ticket and that I had actually checked out the day in advance about such possible details. The answer from Michael at the reception: Yes, and you must also have a training dress with!‚Ä¢ That was so the drop for me. I think it is a mistake to stick to the principle when the customer is a guest without membership, has paid 99 DKK for a single training session and, by the way, had checked out the day in advance.Nce, there was no chance that I would stay in the temporary customer relationship.The money returned and quickly passed on to the second gym at Amager. There is so much to choose from...

name: Kunde vicki

name: Frk Betina S√∏rensen
title: At i har nogle fantastisk instrukt√∏r og‚Ä¶
review: At i har nogle fantastisk instrukt√∏r og at der er plads til at vi ogs√• kan have det sjovt os medlemmer imellem til hold timerne ( og med instrukt√∏ren) i mit tilf√¶lde is√¶r Zumba med Lela, men elsker ogs√• de √∏vrige danse hold bodyjam, sh‚Äôbam. Desv√¶rre for jeg ikke tr√¶net s√• meget andet, selv om jeg har en held det skavanker der gerne vil optr√¶nes igen og en stor livvidde. Men der er jeg ikke fysisk til at v√¶re med p√• de andre hold endnu uden at skulle lave alternative p√• stor set alle √∏velser. Og pengepungen er der ikke til genoptr√¶ning med personlig tr√¶ner, desv√¶rre. S√• jeg zumbaer den et par gange om ugen med sk√∏nne Lela Hansen p√• 8 √•r - ELSKER det

Skabe til alle, som kan afl√•ses med egen h√¶ngel√•s. Fantastisk s√∏de og smilende personale

You can choose from a lot of different teams depending on your needs and interest. There are also a lot of fine machines that you can use. Changing and bathing conditions really fine. Create for anyone who can be locked with their own padlock. Fantastic sweet and smiling staff

name: Peter

name: Finn Wichmann Lund
title: RINGE MEDLEMSSERVICE OG INGEN FORRETNINGSMORAL
review: RINGE MEDLEMSSERVICE OG INGEN FORRETNINGSMORALSats √∏nsker at etablere et brand som et Premium Tr√¶ningscenter, men det fejler fuldst√¶ndigt n√•r det kommer til deres Medlemsservice.Sats Medlemsservice er drevet af princip, hvor manglende selvindsigt og d√•rlig forretningsmoral er i h√∏js√¶det. Min datter havde indmeldt sig i januar, men m√•tte i marts erkende at hun p√• grund af sygdom ikke ville f√• brugt sit abonnement (det har jeg tilbudt Sats at dokumentere). Vi g√•r derfor ned i centeret hvor vi beder om at medlemskabet skal stoppe hurtigst muligt ‚Äì og da betingelserne er l√∏bende m√•ned + 30 dage, kan det ikke ske f√∏r udgangen af april. Det m√• vi jo s√• acceptere.Da vi kommer ind i maj f√•r vi pludselig en ny opkr√¶vning fra Sats, som viser sig at omfatte maj ‚Äì s√• vi tager ned i centeret for at unders√∏ge sagen (min datter har ikke p√• noget tidspunkt brugt sit abonnement, hvilket Sats ogs√• bekr√¶fter), og vi f√•r nu oplyst at min dattes abonnement er sat til at udl√∏be med august. Og alts√• ikke hurtigst muligt!!Vi f√•r oplyst at vi skal henvende os til deres medlemsservice ‚Äì og det er her det bliver rigtigt sjovt, for vi forventede jo at Sats hurtigt ville indse at de havde beg√•et en fejl, men det blev hurtigt til en lang og frusterende mail udveksling med deres Medlemsservice-chef, ‚ÄùJulie‚Äù. ‚ÄùJulie‚Äù √∏nskede ikke p√• noget tidspunkt at forholde sig til den mulighed, at Sats havde beg√•et en fejl ‚Äì men derimod bad os om at dokumentere at vi havde √∏nsket at opsige med udgangen af april, idet hun h√¶vder at vi har f√•et en kvittering. Dette har hun fortsat ikke √∏nsket at bevise. Hun er samtidig af den overbevisning at vi vil synes at det har v√¶ret en fantastisk oplevelse at have v√¶ret kunde hos Sats, da hun v√¶lger at godskrive os den ene af de m√•neder som fejlen har p√•f√∏rt os.Det er mig en g√•de at Sats har en strategi om at kunden skal betale uanset hvad, i stedet for at at sikre en god kundeoplevelse, i tilf√¶lde hvor kunden er kommet i klemme i forbindelse en rigtig tr√¶ls situation, hvor alle andre leverand√∏rer normalt ville lade tvivlen komme kunden til gode.Da jeg var nede at betale for medlemsskabet i sidste uge, var de 2 Sats medarbejder pinlige ber√∏rt over sagen ‚Äì s√• i det mindste er det umiddelbart kun ‚ÄùJulie‚Äù og deres Medlemsservice der har et problem.Fejl sker alle steder og hele tiden ‚Äì men ikke at ville indr√∏mme det i en sag der burde v√¶re √•benlys, m√• jo skyldes at de enten har de forkerte mennesker ansat, eller at deres forretningsmoral ikke er i sync med det brand de fors√∏ger at opbygge som et Premium Tr√¶ningscenter.
translated_review: RINGING MEMBERSHIP AND NO BUSINESS MORALSats want to establish a brand as a Premium Training Centre, but it completely fails when it comes to their Membership Service.Sat's Membership Service is driven by the principle of lack of self-insight and bad business morality. My daughter had joined in January but had to acknowledge that because of illness she would not have used her subscription (I have offered Sats to document).We must stop as soon as possible and as the conditions are running month + 30 days, it cannot happen until the end of April. We must then accept that.When we enter in May we suddenly get a new charge from Sats, which turns out to include May   ‚Ä¢ so we go down to the center to investigate the matter (my daughter has not used her subscription at any time, as Sats also confirms), and we are now informed that my date's subscription is due to expire by August. And not as soon as possible!We expected Sats to quickly realize that they had made a mistake, but it quickly became a long and frustrating mail exchange with their Member Service Manager, Julie. Julie didn't want to relate at any time to the possibility that Sats had made a mistake but asked us to prove that we had wanted to quit by the end of April, claiming that we had a receipt.g. She has still not wanted to prove this. At the same time, she is convinced that we will find it amazing to have been a customer of Sats, as she chooses to credit us for one of the months that the error has caused us.It is a mystery to me that Sats has a strategy that the customer has to pay no matter what, instead of ensuring a good customer experience, in cases where the customer has come into contact with a really bad situation, where all other suppliers would normally let the matter go.When I was down to pay for the membership last week, the 2 Sats employee was embarrassed about the matter.So at least immediately only Julie and their Member Service have a problem.Error happens everywhere and all the time but not to want to admit it in a case that should be obvious, must be because they either have the wrong people employed, or that their business morals are not in sync with the fire they are trying to build as a Premium Training Center.

name: Michael HG

Dette gav anledning til at jeg nu sidder med to rykker som desv√¶rre ikke h√¶nger sammen: Rykker 1 forfalder den 26/5 378kr. inkl. rykkegebyr 100kr.Rykker 2 forfalder den 28/5 578kr. ! inkl. rykkergebyr 100kr. (hvordan f**** ikke 478 med 578kr!!)Min telefon henvendelse d.d. den 4/6 afsl√∏rer at jeg nu allerede skylder firmaet 878kr. !!SATS Danmark har for mig kun "krone-tegn" i √∏jnene og n√¶rmest afpresser pengene ud af folk. Det er ok med lokketilbud Facebook, m√•ske ok at instruere sine medarbejdere med vildledning af medlemmet der er p√• vej ud, men fr√¶kt nok at vanskeligg√∏r udmeldingsprocedurerne og uforskammet i at true sig til betalingen jvf. ovenfor. translated_review: SATS Denmark ranks 144 out of 153 in the category Fitness & nutrition, and there's nothing to say about that. I want to join those who rated SATS Denmark with a single star. (how f***** not 478 with 578kr!!)My phone enquiry d.d. on 4/6 reveals that I already owe the company 878kr.!!!SATS Denmark has only "crown signs" in my eyes and almost blackmails the money out of people. It's okay with bait offers Facebook, maybe ok to instruct its employees with misdirection of the member who is on his way out, but fraughtily enough to make it difficult to register.I have been there three times in total, but several times in advance of the resignation.

name: Sune Jannek Serup

Synes simpelthen det er s√• ringe! - jeg sp√∏rger ekspedienten klart og tydeligt om der var noget jeg skulle v√¶re opm√¶rksom p√•, og f√•r ikke disse oplysninger at vide. Hvordan skal jeg betale for noget, n√•r jeg ikke har modtaget en faktura?!Derudover ringer jeg s√• der ind, for at finde en l√∏sning p√• det hele, hvortil jeg f√•r at vide, at jeg blot kan henvende mig personligt i sats, s√• skal vi nok f√• l√∏st problemet.Bliver s√• m√∏dt med en arrogant medarbejder, som overhovedet ikke er interesseret i at l√∏se problemet, og som blot henviser til at "jeg jo har godkendt betingelserne" - p√• trods af at jeres medarbejder har sagt noget andet end det der st√•r i jeres s√•kaldte "betingelser"Lad jer ikke narre af deres tilbud - i f√•r kun d√•rlig oplevelser ud af det RINGE! - D√•rlig service.
translated_review: Sees an offer for free creation on facebook. Then goes down to the local rate to create me. Asks if the creation is free this month, and then I get the answer that it is. Before I set up, I ask if I should only pay for the month of May?, i.e. 249 kr - I get a yes for that. Before I register, I ask if there is anything else I should be aware of when creating, to which I am told that I should only be aware that I receive an invoice that I can register paymentthen I get a bill in the mail that I suddenly have to pay for the month of June on top of, plus there is a fee of 39 kr! Just think it's so bad! - I ask the clerk clearly and clearly if there was something I should be aware of and not get this information to know. Furthermore, by mail I am told that I have paid too late, even though I have only received 1 invoice - and that is about a week after I apparently should have paid. How am I supposed to pay for something?When I haven't received an invoice?!In addition, I'll call in to find a solution to it all, to which I'm told I can only turn myself personally in the rate, and we'll solve the problem.So if we meet with an arrogant employee who isn't interested in solving the problem at all and who simply refers to the fact that "I've approved the terms" - despite the fact that your employee has said something other than what is in your so-called "conditions" Don't be fooled by theiroffer - you only get bad experiences out of it RING! - bad service.

name: Rune Trangb√¶k
title: Tyveri og ringe kundeservice
review: Til rette vedkommende, medarbejdere og andre medlemmer i SATSEt kortere medlemsskab for min k√¶reste og et mange√•rigt medlemsskab for mig er nu slut.Sidste √•r meldte min k√¶reste sig ind i dav√¶rende FitnessDK (Nu SATS). Fik efterf√∏lgende 2 stk gavekort i gave og ville benytte dem til at betale sit medlemsskab med.Pengene for gavekortene blev indsat p√• hans konto og skulle derved tr√¶kkes derfra.Herefter √¶ndredes FitnessDK til SATS. Det bet√∏d at de penge der var indsat p√• kontoen pludselig var v√¶k og der var udsted en rykker fra SATS med henblik p√• for sen betaling.SATS p√•stod at der var sendt en mail med information om manglende betaling, men da de ikke p√• noget tidpunkt havde en mail-adresse registreret var dette en direkte l√∏gn.I denne forbindelse blev han meldt ud, ogs√• uden at v√¶re informeret om dette.Efter ca. 10 henvendelser i SATS h√∏rsholm med b√•de medarbejdere og ledere involveret, og gentagne opkald til medlemsservice er det nu blevet for meget.Tidligere p√• ugen fik vi at vide at de penge der var blevet v√¶k fra kontoen var fundet og betalingen via disse kunne genoptages. 2 dage senere modtager vi en rykker grundet manglende betaling. Endnu et opkald til medlemsservice bedyrer nu at disse penge ikke alligevel findes p√• kontoen og at rykkegebyr igen skal betales.I har derved udstedt et gavekort, taget imod det, indl√∏st pengene, for s√• at lade pengene forsvinde i jeres system. Derudover tillader i jer at opkr√¶ve gebyrer for fejl i selv beg√•r.Det er pinligt, uh√∏rt, uforskammet og derudover tyveri p√• det n√¶rmeste.Jeres centre er gode, men jeres behandling af medlemmer og deres penge er direkte sk√∏desl√∏s.
translated_review: To the person concerned, employees and other members of the SATSE shorter membership for my girlfriend and a long-standing membership for me is now over.Last year my girlfriend joined the then FitnessDK (Nu SATS).FitnessDK was subsequently given 2 gift cards and wanted to use them to pay his membership with.The money for the gift cards was deposited in his account and had to be deducted from it.FitnessDK was then changed to SATS.This meant that the money deposited in the account was suddenly gone and the money was out.SATS claimed that an email had been sent with information about non-payment, but since they did not have an email address registered at any point in time, this was a direct lie.In this connection, he was reported out, even without being informed of this.After about 10 inquiries in SATS lysholm with both employees and managers involved, and repeated calls to member service have now become too much.Earlier this week we were told that the money had been2 days later we receive a reminder due to a lack of payment. Another call to the member service now states that this money is not found in the account and that the reminder fee is due again.You have thereby issued a gift card, accepted it, redeemed the money, and then let the money disappear in your system. In addition, you allow to charge charges for errors in yourself.It is embarrassing, unheard of, rude and additionally theft at the approachingYour centers are good, but your treatment of members and their money is directly careless.

Det er simpelthen pinligt!Heldigvis er der ogs√• fantastiske instrukt√∏rer ansat i SATS, men BLOX har tilsyneladende skulle spare siden de ans√¶tter instrukt√∏rer uden basale kompetencer.

Vi f√•, som ikke har dutter i √∏rerne, er tvunget til at h√∏re p√• "musik" best√•ende af sure amerikanske mandsfigurer, der kaster h√•ndtegn og spydigheder efter deres h√•rdtpr√∏vede hustruer, eller ogs√• besynger de samme sure m√¶nd euforiserende stoffer, og ledsages af deres skingre stakkels bedre halvdele ... translated_review: Field's This center has sailed for a long time, with things going even worse under the SATS sign, although you didn't think it could get worse.1. name: Finn

translated_review: Rarely have I experienced such arrogant and poor customer service! Is really crazy and this is my first Trustpilot review. Got more inquiries and advertisements for training at a lower price. Logged in to the new page and looked at it all carefully - and was constantly presented a price lower than the one I paid before, so I changed my type of member - not compared to what I wanted - only the lower price. Didn't get a receipt for the change and no message aboutwhat would happen. 2 months later I get a charge of almost twice what I normally paid!!!Send email to customer service (no answer), called them and told about the case. Furthermore, they had cancelled my payment service agreement on the old subscription - something you can't tell me about it without.It may well be that SATS doesn't raise prices if Fitness.dk's old customers - they conquer them instead. Afterwards my membership returned to the original settings - and vupti - here I got a confirmation email with my new price per month - which is then 25% higher than the old one. Sent another email to customer service about this - and with questions about what to do about it and what to do with the wrong collection: Result - no answer. As in nothing. How does SATS...

name: Anders
title: SATS er discount indeni
review: SATS har overtaget Fitness.dk-centeret p√• Frederiksberg (ved Frederiksbergcenteret), men det er der ikke kommet noget godt ud af.Tr√¶ningsprogrammerne i maskinerne, som fx cykler og crosstrainere, g√•r j√¶vnligt ned og starter forfra. Det er ekstremt irriterende, n√•r man har startet et varieret tr√¶ningsprogram, der varer en time, og det s√• g√•r ned halvvejs. Derudover er tv-signalet i maskinerne meget ustabilt, og lyden virker kun i nogle af dem (n√•r man tilslutter h√∏retelefoner).Endelig er bruserne i omkl√¶dningen elendige - mange virker ikke, andre har meget lavt vandtryk, ligesom det varme vand kommer og g√•r etc.Jeg har n√¶vnt det for de ansatte, og de er udm√¶rket godt klar over  de d√•rlige forhold, men siger, at den "centeransvarlige" ikke vil g√∏re noget ved det. Det er tydeligt, at der er sat strenge sparekrav for centeret, og det er g√•et h√•rdt ud over almindelig vedligeholdelse og reparation. Pr√∏v et andet center - m√•ske i en anden k√¶de - det kan ikke blive meget v√¶rre end her.
translated_review: SATS has taken over the Fitness.dk centre at Frederiksberg (at the Frederiksberg Centre), but nothing good has come of this.The training programmes in the machines, such as bicycles and elliptical cross trainers, go down regularly and start over again.It is extremely annoying when you start a varied training programme that lasts an hour and then goes down halfway.In addition, the TV signal in the machines is very unstable and the sound only works in some of them (when you connect the headphones).I have mentioned it to the employees, and they are well aware of the bad conditions, but say that the "centre manager" will do nothing about it. It is clear that strict austerity requirements have been set for the center, and it has gone hard on ordinary maintenance and repair. Try another center - perhaps in another chain - it can't get much worse than here.

name: Carina Petersen

Regningen kommer 1. marts i stedet til at lyde p√• 443,- da jeg stadig skal betale for den tid, hvor jeg har haft det dyre abonnement. Jeg sp√∏rger s√•, om man ikke f√•r en bekr√¶ftelse, n√•r man er inde at √¶ndre sit abonnement. Det g√∏r man s√• ikke. Derfor har jeg ikke haft den tanke, at der skulle v√¶re noget galt, da jeg b√•de 1. januar og 1. februar har betalt 238 kr. Det lokale center havde haft lignende tilf√¶lde med tidligere FitnessDK-abonnementer, som pludselig f√•r en st√∏rre regning, fordi de har √¶ndret i deres medlemskab. Fremover skal jeg s√• betale 249 frem for 238, fordi hun ikke kan lave det om til de gamle betingelser. Det er, hvad det er, men jeg kan slet slet ikke forst√•, hvorfor jeg skal betale 443. F√∏ler mig ikke s√¶rlig godt behandlet og har ikke den store lyst til at fortsat at v√¶re en del af SATS, n√•r man slet ikke kan se, at der er tale om en fejl/misforst√•else. I b√∏r virkelig s√∏rge for, at folk f√•r besked, n√•r der sker √¶ndringer i deres medlemskab. Det andet er p√• ingen m√•de i orden - man har ikke en chance.
translated_review: Hello SATSI am very unappreciated about the way you treat your members. I trained in FitnessDk, who automatically passed over to SATS at the beginning of the new year (can't remember the exact date). I get new debit cards at the beginning of January. At first I try to check if you can change your payment information on your website - you can't - you have to contact your local center. I do and change it all to my new card. I have always paid 238 to train in one center and ku1 March you pull me out 561,65 DKK. I contact the local center, which cannot see what it is due to, and ask me to contact member service. As I call today, I am told that I myself have actively been in the process of changing my subscription to a more expensive subscription back in January - I have NOT. She will not withdraw the payment, as it is impossible to do so by itself. The bill comes March 1st instead of sounding at 443,- since I still have to pay for the time,I ask if you do not get a confirmation when you change your subscription. You don't. Therefore, I haven't had the idea that there should be something wrong, since I have paid 238 DKK both on 1 January and 1 February. The local center had similar cases with previous FitnessDK subscriptions, which suddenly get a bigger bill because they have changed in their membership. In future, I have to pay 249 rather than 238 because she can't make it about aThis is what it is, but I can't understand why I have to pay 443. It's total convictry. In such a situation it has been much better to delete the payment and fix it to 249 for payment on 1 March. Doesn't feel very well treated and doesn't want to continue to be part of SATS when you can't even see that it's an error/misunderstanding. You can see that I've trained at the weekend SELV in the center in question, why would I have tohave made my subscription and not make use of such a expensive subscription?! You really should make sure that people are informed when changes are made to their membership. The other is by no means okay - you don't have a chance.
